[His]472-the man head hanging over -- like this ! ”[1937-his] [He]1937-his turned [himself]1937-his sideways to [the carriage]917-the carriage , and leaned back , with [his]1937-his face thrown up to the sky , and [his]1937-his head hanging down ; then recovered [himself]1937-his , fumbled with [his]1937-his cap , and made a bow . “ What was [he]472-the man like ? ”[1937-his] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , [he]472-the man was whiter than [the miller . All covered with dust , white as a spectre , tall as a spectre]5443-the miller . all covered with dust , white as a spectre , tall as a spectre ! ”[1939-the little crowd] The picture produced an immense sensation in [the little crowd]1939-the little crowd ; but [all eyes , without comparing notes with other eyes]1940-all eyes , without comparing notes with other eyes , looked at [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis . Perhaps , to observe whether [he]193-monsieur the marquis had any spectre on [his]193-monsieur the marquis conscience . “ Truly , [you]193-monsieur the marquis did well , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , felicitously sensible that such vermin were not to ruffle [him]193-monsieur the marquis , “ to see [a thief accompanying [[my]1836-the marquis carriage]5445-my carriage]5444-a thief accompanying my carriage , and not open that great mouth of [yours]193-monsieur the marquis . Bah ! Put [him]472-the man aside , [Monsieur Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle ! ”[1836-the marquis] [Monsieur Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle was [the Postmaster]1942-the postmaster , and [some other taxing functionary united]1943-some other taxing functionary united ; [he]195-monsieur gabelle had come out with great obsequiousness to assist at this examination , and had held the examined by the drapery of [his]195-monsieur gabelle arm in an official manner . “ Bah ! Go aside ! ”[195-monsieur gabelle] said [Monsieur Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle . “ Lay hands on [this stranger]5446-this stranger if [he]5446-this stranger seeks to lodge in [[your]193-monsieur the marquis village]5447-your village to - night , and be sure that [his]5446-this stranger business is honest , [Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle . ”[195-monsieur gabelle] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , [I]1946-some half - dozen particular friends am flattered to devote [myself]1946-some half - dozen particular friends to [your]188-monseigneur orders . ”[1946-some half - dozen particular friends] “ Did [he]5446-this stranger run away , fellow?--where is [that Accursed]5448-that accursed ? ”[1944-the accursed] [The accursed]1944-the accursed was already under [the carriage]917-the carriage with [some half - dozen particular friends]1946-some half - dozen particular friends , pointing out the chain with [his]1944-the accursed blue cap . [Some half - dozen other particular friends]1947-some half - dozen other particular friends promptly hauled [him]1944-the accursed out , and presented [him]1944-the accursed breathless to [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis . “ Did [the man]472-the man run away , [Dolt]196-dolt , when [we]5450-we stopped for the drag ? ”[193-monsieur the marquis] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , [he]5446-this stranger precipitated [himself]5446-this stranger over [the hill - side]5451-the hill - side , head first , as [a person]5176-a person plunges into [the river]1494-the river . ”[1947-some half - dozen other particular friends] “ See to it , [Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle . Go on ! ”[193-monsieur the marquis] [The half - dozen who were peering at the chain]1948-the half - dozen who were peering at the chain were still among the wheels , like sheep ; the wheels turned so suddenly that [they]1948-the half - dozen who were peering at the chain were lucky to save [their]1948-the half - dozen who were peering at the chain skins and bones ; [they]1948-the half - dozen who were peering at the chain had very little else to save , or [they]1948-the half - dozen who were peering at the chain might not have been so fortunate . The burst with which [the carriage]917-the carriage started out of [the village]1888-the village and up [the rise beyond]1951-the rise beyond , was soon checked by the steepness of [the hill]375-the hill . Gradually , it subsided to a foot pace , swinging and lumbering upward among the many sweet scents of a summer night . [The postilions]1953-the postilions , with a thousand gossamer gnats circling about [them]1953-the postilions in lieu of the Furies , quietly mended the points to the lashes of [their]1953-the postilions whips ; [the valet]1829-the valet walked by the horses ; [the courier]1928-the courier was audible , trotting on ahead into the dull distance . At the steepest point of [the hill]375-the hill there was [a little burial - ground]1957-a little burial - ground , with a Cross and a new large figure of [Our Saviour]197-our saviour on [it]1957-a little burial - ground ; it was a poor figure in wood , done by [some inexperienced rustic carver]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver , but [he]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver had studied the figure from the life -- [his]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver own life , maybe -- for it was dreadfully spare and thin . To this distressful emblem of a great distress that had long been growing worse , and was not at its worst , [a woman]1959-a woman was kneeling . [She]1959-a woman turned [her]1959-a woman head as [the carriage]917-the carriage came up to [her]1959-a woman , rose quickly , and presented [herself]1959-a woman at the carriage - door . “ It is [you]188-monseigneur , [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur ! [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , a petition . ”[1958-some inexperienced rustic carver] With an exclamation of impatience , but with [his]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver unchangeable face , [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur looked out . “ How , then ! What is it ? Always petitions ! ”[188-monseigneur] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur . For the love of [the great God]5454-the great god ! [[My]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver husband]5455-my husband , [the forester]5456-the forester . ”[1958-some inexperienced rustic carver] “ What of [[your]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver husband]5131-your husband , [the forester]5456-the forester ? Always the same with [[you]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver people]5411-you people . [He]5131-your husband can not pay something ? ”[188-monseigneur] “ [He]5131-your husband has paid all , [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur . [He]5131-your husband is dead . ”[188-monseigneur] “ Well ! [He]5131-your husband is quiet . Can [I]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver restore [him]5131-your husband to [you]1958-some inexperienced rustic carver ? ”[1958-some inexperienced rustic carver] “ Alas , no , [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur ! But [he]5131-your husband lies yonder , under a little heap of poor grass . ”[188-monseigneur] “ Well ? ”[188-monseigneur] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , there are so many little heaps of poor grass ? ”[1958-some inexperienced rustic carver] “ Again , well ? ”[1961-she] [She]1961-she looked [an old woman]1962-an old woman , but was young . [Her]1961-she manner was one of passionate grief ; by turns [she]1961-she clasped [her]1961-she veinous and knotted hands together with wild energy , and laid one of them on the carriage - door -- tenderly , caressingly , as if it had been a human breast , and could be expected to feel the appealing touch . “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , hear [me]1961-she ! [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , hear [my]1961-she petition ! [[My]1961-she husband]5455-my husband died of want ; [so many]5461-so many die of want ; [so many more]5462-so many more will die of want . ”[1961-she] “ Again , well ? Can [I]1961-she feed [them]5462-so many more ? ”[1961-she] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , [the good God]5463-the good god knows ; but [I]1829-the valet do n’t ask it . [My]1829-the valet petition is , that a morsel of stone or wood , with [[my]1829-the valet husband]5455-my husband ’s name , may be placed over [him]5455-my husband to show where [he]5455-my husband lies . Otherwise , [the place]791-the place will be quickly forgotten , it will never be found when [I]1829-the valet am dead of the same malady , [I]1829-the valet shall be laid under some other heap of poor grass . [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , [they]5462-so many more are so many , [they]5462-so many more increase so fast , there is so much want . [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur ! [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur ! ”[1829-the valet] [The valet]1829-the valet had put [her]1964-her away from the door , [the carriage]917-the carriage had broken into a brisk trot , [the postilions]1953-the postilions had quickened the pace , [she]1964-her was left far behind , and [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , again escorted by [the Furies]1967-the furies , was rapidly diminishing the league or two of distance that remained between [him]188-monseigneur and [[his]188-monseigneur chateau]1968-his chateau . The sweet scents of the summer night rose all around [him]188-monseigneur , and rose , as the rain falls , impartially , on the dusty , ragged , and toil - worn group at [the fountain not far away]1969-the fountain not far away ; to whom [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , with the aid of the blue cap without which [he]188-monseigneur was nothing , still enlarged upon [[his]188-monseigneur man]1797-his man like a spectre , as long as [they]1972-they could bear it . By degrees , as [they]1972-they could bear no more , [they]1972-they dropped off one by one , and lights twinkled in little casements ; which lights , as the casements darkened , and more stars came out , seemed to have shot up into the sky instead of having been extinguished . The shadow of [a large high - roofed house]1973-a large high - roofed house , and of many over - hanging trees , was upon [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis by that time ; and the shadow was exchanged for the light of a flambeau , as [[his]188-monseigneur carriage]1793-his carriage stopped , and the great door of [[his]188-monseigneur chateau]1968-his chateau was opened to [him]188-monseigneur . “ [Monsieur Charles]198-monsieur charles , whom [I]199-the gorgon expect ; is [he]198-monsieur charles arrived from [England]1-england ? ”[199-the gorgon] “ Monseigneur , not yet . ”[199-the gorgon] CHAPTER IX . [The Gorgon]199-the gorgon ’s Head It was [a heavy mass of building]1976-a heavy mass of building , [that chateau of [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis , with [a large stone courtyard]1978-a large stone courtyard before [it]1977-that chateau of monsieur the marquis , with a large stone courtyard before it]1977-that chateau of monsieur the marquis , with a large stone courtyard before it , and two stone sweeps of staircase meeting in [a stone terrace before the principal door]1979-a stone terrace before the principal door . [A stony business altogether]1980-a stony business altogether , with heavy stone balustrades , and stone urns , and stone flowers , and stone faces of [men]568-men , and stone heads of lions , in all directions . As if [the Gorgon]1982-the gorgon ’s head had surveyed [it]1977-that chateau of monsieur the marquis , with a large stone courtyard before it , when [it]1977-that chateau of monsieur the marquis , with a large stone courtyard before it was finished , two centuries ago . Up [the broad flight of shallow steps]1983-the broad flight of shallow steps , [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis , [flambeau]1984-flambeau preceded , went from [[his]193-monsieur the marquis carriage]1793-his carriage , sufficiently disturbing the darkness to elicit loud remonstrance from an owl in the roof of [the great pile of [stable building]1987-stable building]1986-the great pile of stable building away among the trees . All else was so quiet , that [the flambeau]1988-the flambeau carried up the steps , and [the other flambeau]1989-the other flambeau held at the great door , burnt as if [they]1990-their were in a close room of state , instead of being in the open night - air . Other sound than the owl ’s voice there was none , save the falling of a fountain into [its]1977-that chateau of monsieur the marquis , with a large stone courtyard before it stone basin ; for , it was one of those dark nights that hold [their]1990-their breath by the hour together , and then heave a long low sigh , and hold [their]1990-their breath again . The great door clanged behind [him]193-monsieur the marquis , and [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis crossed [a hall]1991-a hall grim with certain old boar - spears , swords , and knives of the chase ; grimmer with certain heavy riding - rods and riding - whips , of which many [a peasant]1992-a peasant , gone to [his]1992-a peasant benefactor Death , had felt the weight when [[his]1992-a peasant lord]1993-his lord was angry . Avoiding [the larger rooms]1994-the larger rooms , which were dark and made fast for the night , [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis , with [[his]193-monsieur the marquis flambeau - bearer]1995-his flambeau - bearer going on before , went up the staircase to a door in [a corridor]1996-a corridor . This thrown open , admitted [him]193-monsieur the marquis to [[his]193-monsieur the marquis own private apartment]1997-his own private apartment of [three rooms]1998-three rooms : [[his]193-monsieur the marquis bed - chamber]1999-his bed - chamber and [two others]2000-two others . [High vaulted rooms with cool uncarpeted floors]2001-high vaulted rooms with cool uncarpeted floors , great dogs upon the hearths for the burning of wood in winter time , and all luxuries befitting the state of [a marquis in a luxurious age and country]2002-a marquis in a luxurious age and country . The fashion of [the last Louis but one , of the line that was never to break]2003-the last louis but one , of the line that was never to break -- the fourteenth Louis -- was conspicuous in [their]2004-their rich furniture ; but , it was diversified by many objects that were illustrations of old pages in the history of [France]2-france . A supper - table was laid for two , in [the third of [the rooms]1572-the rooms]2005-the third of the rooms ; [a round room]2007-a round room , in [one of [the chateau ’s four extinguisher - topped towers]2009-the chateau ’s four extinguisher - topped towers]2008-one of the chateau ’s four extinguisher - topped towers . [A small lofty room]2010-a small lofty room , with [its]2010-a small lofty room window wide open , and the wooden jalousie - blinds closed , so that the dark night only showed in slight horizontal lines of black , alternating with their broad lines of stone colour . “ [[My]1836-the marquis nephew]5466-my nephew , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , glancing at the supper preparation ; “ [they]5467-they said [he]5466-my nephew was not arrived . ”[1836-the marquis] Nor was [he]1836-the marquis ; but , [he]1836-the marquis had been expected with [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur . “ Ah ! It is not probable [he]5466-my nephew will arrive to - night ; nevertheless , leave the table as it is . [I]188-monseigneur shall be ready in a quarter of an hour . ”[188-monseigneur] In a quarter of an hour [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur was ready , and sat down alone to [his]188-monseigneur sumptuous and choice supper . [His]188-monseigneur chair was opposite to the window , and [he]188-monseigneur had taken [his]188-monseigneur soup , and was raising [his]188-monseigneur glass of Bordeaux to [his]188-monseigneur lips , when [he]188-monseigneur put it down . “ What is that ? ”[188-monseigneur] [he]188-monseigneur calmly asked , looking with attention at the horizontal lines of black and stone colour . “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur ? That ? ”[188-monseigneur] “ Outside the blinds . Open the blinds . ”[2012-the servant who spoke] It was done . “ Well ? ”[2012-the servant who spoke] “ [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , it is nothing . The trees and the night are all that are here . ”[2012-the servant who spoke] [The servant who spoke]2012-the servant who spoke , had thrown the blinds wide , had looked out into the vacant darkness , and stood with that blank behind [him]2012-the servant who spoke , looking round for instructions . “ Good , ”[2013-the imperturbable master] said [the imperturbable master]2013-the imperturbable master . “ Close them again . ”[2013-the imperturbable master] That was done too , and [the Marquis]1836-the marquis went on with [his]1836-the marquis supper . [He]1836-the marquis was half way through it , when [he]1836-the marquis again stopped with [his]1836-the marquis glass in [his]1836-the marquis hand , hearing the sound of wheels . [It]2015-it came on briskly , and came up to the front of [the chateau]2016-the chateau . “ Ask who is arrived . ”[2015-it] It was [the nephew of [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur]2017-the nephew of monseigneur . [He]2017-the nephew of monseigneur had been some few leagues behind [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , early in the afternoon . [He]2017-the nephew of monseigneur had diminished the distance rapidly , but not so rapidly as to come up with [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur on [the road]377-the road . [He]2017-the nephew of monseigneur had heard of [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , at [the posting - houses]2019-the posting - houses , as being before [him]2017-the nephew of monseigneur . [He]2017-the nephew of monseigneur was to be told ( said [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur ) that supper awaited [him]2017-the nephew of monseigneur then and there , and that [he]2017-the nephew of monseigneur was prayed to come to it . In a little while [he]2017-the nephew of monseigneur came . [He]2017-the nephew of monseigneur had been known in [England]1-england as [Charles Darnay]162-darnay . [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur received [him]2017-the nephew of monseigneur in a courtly manner , but [they]2020-they did not shake hands . “ [You]188-monseigneur left [Paris]7-paris yesterday , [sir]4862-sir ? ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] [he]2017-the nephew of monseigneur said to [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , as [he]188-monseigneur took [his]188-monseigneur seat at table . “ Yesterday . And [you]188-monseigneur ? ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] “ [I]2017-the nephew of monseigneur come direct . ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] “ From [London]3-london ? ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] “ Yes . ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] “ [You]188-monseigneur have been a long time coming , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , with a smile . “ On the contrary ; [I]1836-the marquis come direct . ”[1836-the marquis] “ Pardon [me]2017-the nephew of monseigneur ! [I]2017-the nephew of monseigneur mean , not a long time on the journey ; a long time intending the journey . ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] “ [I]1836-the marquis have been detained [by”--the[1836-the marquis] nephew]5469-by”--the nephew stopped a moment in [his]2017-the nephew of monseigneur answer--“various business . ”[2017-the nephew of monseigneur] “ Without doubt , ”[2022-the polished uncle] said [the polished uncle]2022-the polished uncle . So long as [a servant]2023-a servant was present , no other words passed between [them]2024-them . When coffee had been served and [they]2024-them were alone together , [the nephew]2025-the nephew , looking at [the uncle]2026-the uncle and meeting the eyes of the face that was like a fine mask , opened a conversation . “ [I]2026-the uncle have come back , [sir]4862-sir , as [you]4862-sir anticipate , pursuing the object that took [me]2026-the uncle away . It carried [me]2026-the uncle into great and unexpected peril ; but it is a sacred object , and if it had carried [me]2026-the uncle to death [I]2026-the uncle hope it would have sustained [me]2026-the uncle . ”[2026-the uncle] “ Not to death , ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle ; “ it is not necessary to say , to death . ”[2026-the uncle] “ [I]2025-the nephew doubt , [sir]4862-sir , ”[2025-the nephew] returned [the nephew]2025-the nephew , “ whether , if it had carried [me]2025-the nephew to the utmost brink of death , [you]4862-sir would have cared to stop [me]2025-the nephew there . ”[2025-the nephew] The deepened marks in the nose , and the lengthening of the fine straight lines in the cruel face , looked ominous as to that ; [the uncle]2026-the uncle made a graceful gesture of protest , which was so clearly a slight form of good breeding that it was not reassuring . “ Indeed , [sir]4862-sir , ”[2025-the nephew] pursued [the nephew]2025-the nephew , “ for anything [I]2025-the nephew know , [you]4862-sir may have expressly worked to give a more suspicious appearance to the suspicious circumstances that surrounded [me]2025-the nephew . ”[2025-the nephew] “ No , no , no , ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle , pleasantly . “ But , however that may be , ”[2025-the nephew] resumed [the nephew]2025-the nephew , glancing at [him]2026-the uncle with deep distrust , “ [I]2025-the nephew know that [your]4862-sir diplomacy would stop [me]2025-the nephew by any means , and would know no scruple as to means . ”[2025-the nephew] “ [[My]2026-the uncle friend]492-my friend , [I]2026-the uncle told [you]492-my friend so , ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle , with a fine pulsation in the two marks . “ Do [me]2026-the uncle the favour to recall that [I]2026-the uncle told [you]492-my friend so , long ago . ”[2026-the uncle] “ [I]2025-the nephew recall it . ”[2025-the nephew] “ Thank [you]4862-sir , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis -- very sweetly indeed . [His]1836-the marquis tone lingered in the air , almost like the tone of a musical instrument . “ In effect , [sir]4862-sir , ”[2025-the nephew] pursued [the nephew]2025-the nephew , “ [I]2025-the nephew believe it to be at once [your]4862-sir bad fortune , and [my]2025-the nephew good fortune , that has kept [me]2025-the nephew out of [a prison in [France]2-france here]5475-a prison in france here . ”[2025-the nephew] “ [I]2026-the uncle do not quite understand , ”[2026-the uncle] returned [the uncle]2026-the uncle , sipping [his]2026-the uncle coffee . “ Dare [I]2026-the uncle ask [you]2026-the uncle to explain ? ”[2026-the uncle] “ [I]2025-the nephew believe that if [you]4862-sir were not in disgrace with [the Court]4990-the court , and had not been overshadowed by that cloud for years past , a letter de cachet would have sent [me]2025-the nephew to [some fortress]5477-some fortress indefinitely . ”[2025-the nephew] “ It is possible , ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle , with great calmness . “ For the honour of [the family]5478-the family , [I]2026-the uncle could even resolve to incommode [you]4862-sir to that extent . Pray excuse [me]2026-the uncle ! ”[2026-the uncle] “ [I]2025-the nephew perceive that , happily for [me]2025-the nephew , the Reception of the day before yesterday was , as usual , a cold one , ”[2025-the nephew] observed [the nephew]2025-the nephew . “ [I]2026-the uncle would not say happily , [[my]2026-the uncle friend]492-my friend , ”[2026-the uncle] returned [the uncle]2026-the uncle , with refined politeness ; “ [I]2026-the uncle would not be sure of that . A good opportunity for consideration , surrounded by the advantages of solitude , might influence [your]4862-sir destiny to far greater advantage than [you]4862-sir influence it for [yourself]4862-sir . But it is useless to discuss the question . [I]2026-the uncle am , as [you]4862-sir say , at a disadvantage . These little instruments of correction , these gentle aids to the power and honour of [families]333-families , these slight favours that might so incommode [you]4862-sir , are only to be obtained now by interest and importunity . [They]333-families are sought by [so many]5461-so many , and [they]333-families are granted ( comparatively ) to so few ! It used not to be so , but [France]2-france in all such things is changed for the worse . [[Our]5482-our not remote ancestors]5483-our not remote ancestors held the right of life and death over [the surrounding vulgar]5484-the surrounding vulgar . From [this room]5485-this room , many such dogs have been taken out to be hanged ; in [the next room]5486-the next room ( [[my]2026-the uncle bedroom]5487-my bedroom ) , [one fellow]5488-one fellow , to [our]5482-our knowledge , was poniarded on the spot for professing some insolent delicacy respecting [[his]5488-one fellow daughter--_his _ daughter]5489-his daughter--_his _ daughter ? [We]5482-our have lost many privileges ; a new philosophy has become the mode ; and the assertion of [our]5482-our station , in these days , might ( [I]2026-the uncle do not go so far as to say would , but might ) cause [us]5482-our real inconvenience . All very bad , very bad ! ”[2026-the uncle] [The Marquis]1836-the marquis took a gentle little pinch of snuff , and shook [his]1836-the marquis head ; as elegantly despondent as [he]1836-the marquis could becomingly be of [a country still containing [himself]1836-the marquis , that great means of regeneration]2041-a country still containing himself , that great means of regeneration . “ [We]5482-our have so asserted [our]5482-our station , both in the old time and in the modern time also , ”[2025-the nephew] said [the nephew]2025-the nephew , gloomily , “ that [I]2025-the nephew believe [our]5482-our name to be more detested than any name in [France]2-france . ”[2025-the nephew] “ Let [us]5482-our hope so , ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle . “ Detestation of [the high]5490-the high is the involuntary homage of [the low]5491-the low . ”[2026-the uncle] “ There is not , ”[2025-the nephew] pursued [the nephew]2025-the nephew , in [his]2025-the nephew former tone , “ a face [I]2025-the nephew can look at , in all [this country round about [us]5482-our , which looks at [me]2025-the nephew with any deference on it but the dark deference of fear and slavery]5492-this country round about us , which looks at me with any deference on it but the dark deference of fear and slavery . ”[2025-the nephew] “ A compliment , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , “ to the grandeur of [the family]5478-the family , merited by the manner in which [the family]5478-the family has sustained [its]5478-the family grandeur . Hah ! ”[1836-the marquis] And [he]1836-the marquis took another gentle little pinch of snuff , and lightly crossed [his]1836-the marquis legs . But , when [[his]1836-the marquis nephew]2046-his nephew , leaning an elbow on the table , covered [his]2046-his nephew eyes thoughtfully and dejectedly with [his]2046-his nephew hand , the fine mask looked at [him]1836-the marquis sideways with a stronger concentration of keenness , closeness , and dislike , than was comportable with [its wearer]2047-its wearer ’s assumption of indifference . “ [Repression]200-repression is the only lasting philosophy . The dark deference of fear and slavery , [[my]1836-the marquis friend]492-my friend , ”[1836-the marquis] observed [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , “ will keep the dogs obedient to the whip , as long as [this roof]5496-this roof , ”[1836-the marquis] looking up to it , “ shuts out the sky . ”[1836-the marquis] That might not be so long as [the Marquis]1836-the marquis supposed . If a picture of [the chateau]2016-the chateau as [it]2016-the chateau was to be a very few years hence , and of fifty like [it]2016-the chateau as they too were to be a very few years hence , could have been shown to [him]1836-the marquis that night , [he]1836-the marquis might have been at a loss to claim [his]1836-the marquis own from the ghastly , fire - charred , plunder - wrecked rains . As for the roof [he]1836-the marquis vaunted , [he]1836-the marquis might have found _ that _ shutting out the sky in a new way -- to wit , for ever , from the eyes of the bodies into which its lead was fired , out of the barrels of a hundred thousand muskets . “ Meanwhile , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , “ [I]1836-the marquis will preserve the honour and repose of [the family]5478-the family , if [you]2025-the nephew will not . But [you]2025-the nephew must be fatigued . Shall [we]5498-we terminate [our]5498-we conference for the night ? ”[1836-the marquis] “ A moment more . ”[1836-the marquis] “ An hour , if [you]2025-the nephew please . ”[1836-the marquis] “ [Sir]4862-sir , ”[2025-the nephew] said [the nephew]2025-the nephew , “ [we]5498-we have done wrong , and are reaping the fruits of wrong . ”[2025-the nephew] “ _ [We]5498-we _ have done wrong ? ”[1836-the marquis] repeated [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , with an inquiring smile , and delicately pointing , first to [[his]1836-the marquis nephew]2046-his nephew , then to [himself]1836-the marquis . “ [[Our]5498-we family]5500-our family ; [[our]5498-we honourable family]5501-our honourable family , whose honour is of so much account to both of [us]5498-we , in such different ways . Even in [[my]1836-the marquis father]4969-my father ’s time , [we]5498-we did a world of wrong , injuring [every human creature who came between [us]5498-we and [our]5498-we pleasure , whatever it was]5503-every human creature who came between us and our pleasure , whatever it was . Why need [I]1836-the marquis speak of [[my]1836-the marquis father]4969-my father ’s time , when it is equally [yours]5505-yours ? Can [I]1836-the marquis separate [[my]1836-the marquis father ’s twin - brother]5506-my father ’s twin - brother , [joint inheritor]5507-joint inheritor , and next successor , from [himself]4969-my father ? ”[1836-the marquis] “ [Death]128-death has done that ! ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis . “ And has left [me]2025-the nephew , ”[2025-the nephew] answered [the nephew]2025-the nephew , “ bound to a system that is frightful to [me]2025-the nephew , responsible for it , but powerless in it ; seeking to execute the last request of [[my]2025-the nephew dear mother]5508-my dear mother ’s lips , and obey the last look of [[my]2025-the nephew dear mother]5508-my dear mother ’s eyes , which implored [me]2025-the nephew to have mercy and to redress ; and tortured by seeking assistance and power in vain . ”[2025-the nephew] “ Seeking [them]2058-them from [me]1836-the marquis , [[my]1836-the marquis nephew]5466-my nephew , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , touching [him]2025-the nephew on the breast with [his]1836-the marquis forefinger -- [they]2058-them were now standing by the hearth--“you will for ever seek them in vain , be assured . ”[2025-the nephew] Every fine straight line in the clear whiteness of [his]1836-the marquis face , was cruelly , craftily , and closely compressed , while [he]1836-the marquis stood looking quietly at [[his]1836-the marquis nephew]2046-his nephew , with [his]1836-the marquis snuff - box in [his]1836-the marquis hand . Once again [he]1836-the marquis touched [him]2025-the nephew on the breast , as though [his]1836-the marquis finger were the fine point of a small sword , with which , in delicate finesse , [he]1836-the marquis ran [him]2025-the nephew through the body , and said , “ [[My]1836-the marquis friend]492-my friend , [I]1836-the marquis will die , perpetuating the system under which [I]1836-the marquis have lived . ”[1836-the marquis] When [he]1836-the marquis had said it , [he]1836-the marquis took a culminating pinch of snuff , and put [his]1836-the marquis box in [his]1836-the marquis pocket . “ Better to be [a rational creature]5512-a rational creature , ”[1836-the marquis] [he]1836-the marquis added then , after ringing a small bell on the table , “ and accept [your]2046-his nephew natural destiny . But [you]2046-his nephew are lost , [Monsieur Charles]198-monsieur charles , [I]1836-the marquis see . ”[1836-the marquis] “ [This property]5513-this property and [France]2-france are lost to [me]2025-the nephew , ”[2025-the nephew] said [the nephew]2025-the nephew , sadly ; “ [I]2025-the nephew renounce them . ”[2025-the nephew] “ Are [they]5514-they both [yours]2046-his nephew to renounce ? [France]2-france may be , but is the property ? It is scarcely worth mentioning ; but , is it yet ? ”[1836-the marquis] “ [I]1836-the marquis had no intention , in the words [I]1836-the marquis used , to claim it yet . If it passed to [me]1836-the marquis from [you]1836-the marquis , to - morrow-- ”[1836-the marquis] “ Which [I]2025-the nephew have the vanity to hope is not probable . ”[2025-the nephew] “ --or twenty years hence-- ”[1836-the marquis] “ [You]1836-the marquis do [me]1836-the marquis too much honour , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis ; “ still , [I]1836-the marquis prefer that supposition . ”[1836-the marquis] “ --I would abandon it , and live otherwise and elsewhere . It is little to relinquish . What is it but [a wilderness of misery and ruin]5515-a wilderness of misery and ruin ! ”[1836-the marquis] “ Hah ! ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , glancing round [the luxurious room]2063-the luxurious room . “ To the eye it is fair enough , here ; but seen in [its]5515-a wilderness of misery and ruin integrity , under the sky , and by the daylight , [it]5515-a wilderness of misery and ruin is a crumbling tower of waste , mismanagement , extortion , debt , mortgage , oppression , hunger , nakedness , and suffering . ”[1836-the marquis] “ Hah ! ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis again , in a well - satisfied manner . “ If it ever becomes [mine]1836-the marquis , it shall be put into some hands better qualified to free [it]5515-a wilderness of misery and ruin slowly ( if such a thing is possible ) from the weight that drags it down , so that [the miserable people who can not leave it and who have been long wrung to the last point of endurance]5516-the miserable people who can not leave it and who have been long wrung to the last point of endurance , may , in [another generation]5517-another generation , suffer less ; but it is not for [me]1836-the marquis . There is a curse on it , and on all [this land]5518-this land . ”[1836-the marquis] “ And [you]1836-the marquis ? ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle . “ Forgive [my]2026-the uncle curiosity ; do [you]1836-the marquis , under [your]1836-the marquis new philosophy , graciously intend to live ? ”[2026-the uncle] “ [I]1836-the marquis must do , to live , what [others of [[my]1836-the marquis countrymen]5520-my countrymen , even with [nobility]5521-nobility at [their]5519-others of my countrymen , even with nobility at their backs backs]5519-others of my countrymen , even with nobility at their backs , may have to do some day -- work . ”[1836-the marquis] “ In [England]1-england , for example ? ”[1836-the marquis] “ Yes . [The family honour]5522-the family honour , [sir]4862-sir , is safe from [me]1836-the marquis in [this country]1337-this country . The family name can suffer from [me]1836-the marquis in no other , for [I]1836-the marquis bear it in no other . ”[1836-the marquis] The ringing of the bell had caused [the adjoining bed - chamber]2066-the adjoining bed - chamber to be lighted . It now shone brightly , through the door of communication . [The Marquis]1836-the marquis looked that way , and listened for the retreating step of [[his]1836-the marquis valet]2068-his valet . “ [England]1-england is very attractive to [you]2046-his nephew , seeing how indifferently [you]2046-his nephew have prospered [there]4887-there , ”[1836-the marquis] [he]1836-the marquis observed then , turning [his]1836-the marquis calm face to [[his]1836-the marquis nephew]2046-his nephew with a smile . “ [I]1836-the marquis have already said , that for [my]1836-the marquis prospering there , [I]1836-the marquis am sensible [I]1836-the marquis may be indebted to [you]2046-his nephew , [sir]4862-sir . For the rest , it is [[my]1836-the marquis Refuge]5527-my refuge . ”[1836-the marquis] “ [They]5528-they say , [those boastful English]5529-those boastful english , that it is the Refuge of [many]1898-many . [You]2046-his nephew know [a compatriot who has found [a Refuge there]5532-a refuge there]5531-a compatriot who has found a refuge there ? [A Doctor]4946-a doctor ? ”[1836-the marquis] “ Yes . ”[1836-the marquis] “ With [a daughter]5001-a daughter ? ”[1836-the marquis] “ Yes . ”[1836-the marquis] “ Yes , ”[1836-the marquis] said [the Marquis]1836-the marquis . “ [You]2046-his nephew are fatigued . Good night ! ”[1836-the marquis] As [he]1836-the marquis bent [his]1836-the marquis head in [his]1836-the marquis most courtly manner , there was a secrecy in [his]1836-the marquis smiling face , and [he]1836-the marquis conveyed an air of mystery to those words , which struck the eyes and ears of [[his]1836-the marquis nephew]2046-his nephew forcibly . At the same time , the thin straight lines of the setting of the eyes , and the thin straight lips , and the markings in the nose , curved with a sarcasm that looked handsomely diabolic . “ Yes , ”[1836-the marquis] repeated [the Marquis]1836-the marquis . “ [A Doctor]4946-a doctor with [a daughter]5001-a daughter . Yes . So commences the new philosophy ! [You]2046-his nephew are fatigued . Good night ! ”[1836-the marquis] It would have been of as much avail to interrogate any stone face outside [the chateau]2016-the chateau as to interrogate that face of [his]1836-the marquis . [The nephew]2025-the nephew looked at [him]1836-the marquis , in vain , in passing on to the door . “ Good night ! ”[2026-the uncle] said [the uncle]2026-the uncle . “ [I]1836-the marquis look to the pleasure of seeing [you]2046-his nephew again in the morning . Good repose ! Light Monsieur [[my]1836-the marquis nephew]5466-my nephew to [[his]5466-my nephew chamber]5538-his chamber there!--And burn [Monsieur]5071-monsieur [[my]1836-the marquis nephew]5466-my nephew in [his]5466-my nephew bed , if [you]2046-his nephew will , ”[1836-the marquis] [he]1836-the marquis added to [himself]1836-the marquis , before [he]1836-the marquis rang [his]1836-the marquis little bell again , and summoned [[his]1836-the marquis valet]2068-his valet to [[his]1836-the marquis own bedroom]2077-his own bedroom . [The valet]1829-the valet come and gone , [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis walked to and fro in [his]193-monsieur the marquis loose chamber - robe , to prepare [himself]193-monsieur the marquis gently for sleep , that hot still night . Rustling about [the room]565-the room , [his]193-monsieur the marquis softly - slippered feet making no noise on the floor , [he]193-monsieur the marquis moved like a refined tiger:--looked like [some enchanted marquis of the impenitently wicked sort , in story , whose periodical change into tiger form]2080-some enchanted marquis of the impenitently wicked sort , in story , whose periodical change into tiger form was either just going off , or just coming on . [He]193-monsieur the marquis moved from end to end of [[his]193-monsieur the marquis voluptuous bedroom]2081-his voluptuous bedroom , looking again at the scraps of the day ’s journey that came unbidden into [his]193-monsieur the marquis mind ; the slow toil up [the hill]375-the hill at sunset , the setting sun , the descent , [the mill]1912-the mill , [the prison on the crag]2084-the prison on the crag , [the little village]1905-the little village in [the hollow]2086-the hollow , [the peasants at the fountain]2087-the peasants at the fountain , and [the mender of [roads]2089-roads]1970-the mender of roads with [his]193-monsieur the marquis blue cap pointing out the chain under [the carriage]917-the carriage . That fountain suggested [the Paris fountain]1932-the paris fountain , the little bundle lying on the step , [the women]2092-the women bending over it , and [the tall man]1822-the tall man with [his]1822-the tall man arms up , crying , “ Dead ! ”[1822-the tall man] “ [I]2094-monsieur am cool now , ”[2094-monsieur] said [Monsieur]2094-monsieur [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , “ and may go to bed . ”[2094-monsieur] So , leaving only one light burning on the large hearth , [he]193-monsieur the marquis let [his]193-monsieur the marquis thin gauze curtains fall around [him]193-monsieur the marquis , and heard the night break its silence with a long sigh as [he]193-monsieur the marquis composed [himself]193-monsieur the marquis to sleep . The stone faces on the outer walls stared blindly at the black night for three heavy hours ; for three heavy hours , the horses in [the stables]2096-the stables rattled at their racks , the dogs barked , and the owl made a noise with very little resemblance in it to the noise conventionally assigned to the owl by [men - poets]2097-men - poets . But it is the obstinate custom of such creatures hardly ever to say what is set down for [them]2098-them . For three heavy hours , the stone faces of [the chateau]2016-the chateau , lion and human , stared blindly at the night . Dead darkness lay on all the landscape , dead darkness added its own hush to the hushing dust on all [the roads]1925-the roads . [The burial - place]2101-the burial - place had got to the pass that [its]2101-the burial - place little heaps of poor grass were undistinguishable from one another ; the figure on the Cross might have come down , for anything that could be seen of it . In [the village]1888-the village , [taxers]2103-taxers and [taxed]2104-taxed were fast asleep . Dreaming , perhaps , of banquets , as [the starved]2105-the starved usually do , and of ease and rest , as [the driven slave]2106-the driven slave and the yoked ox may , [[its]2016-the chateau lean inhabitants]2107-its lean inhabitants slept soundly , and were fed and freed . The fountain in [the village]1888-the village flowed unseen and unheard , and the fountain at [the chateau]2016-the chateau dropped unseen and unheard -- both melting away , like the minutes that were falling from the spring of Time -- through three dark hours . Then , the grey water of both began to be ghostly in the light , and the eyes of the stone faces of [the chateau]2016-the chateau were opened . Lighter and lighter , until at last the sun touched the tops of the still trees , and poured its radiance over [the hill]375-the hill . In the glow , the water of [the chateau fountain]2112-the chateau fountain seemed to turn to blood , and the stone faces crimsoned . The carol of the birds was loud and high , and , on the weather - beaten sill of the great window of [the bed - chamber of [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis]2113-the bed - chamber of monsieur the marquis , one little bird sang its sweetest song with all its might . At this , [the nearest stone face]2114-the nearest stone face seemed to stare amazed , and , with open mouth and dropped under - jaw , looked awe - stricken . Now , the sun was full up , and movement began in [the village]1888-the village . Casement windows opened , crazy doors were unbarred , and [people]360-people came forth shivering -- chilled , as yet , by the new sweet air . Then began the rarely lightened toil of the day among [the village population]2117-the village population . Some , to [the fountain]1818-the fountain ; [some]2119-some , to [the fields]2120-the fields ; [men]568-men and [women]671-women [here]4902-here , to dig and delve ; [men]568-men and [women there]2125-women there , to see to the poor live stock , and lead the bony cows out , to such pasture as could be found by the roadside . In [the church]1900-the church and at the Cross , [a kneeling figure or two]2127-a kneeling figure or two ; attendant on the latter prayers , the led cow , trying for a breakfast among the weeds at its foot . [The chateau]2016-the chateau awoke later , as became its quality , but awoke gradually and surely . First , the lonely boar - spears and knives of the chase had been reddened as of old ; then , had gleamed trenchant in the morning sunshine ; now , doors and windows were thrown open , horses in [[their]2129-their stables]2130-their stables looked round over [their]2129-their shoulders at the light and freshness pouring in at doorways , leaves sparkled and rustled at iron - grated windows , dogs pulled hard at [their]2129-their chains , and reared impatient to be loosed . All these trivial incidents belonged to the routine of life , and the return of morning . Surely , not so the ringing of the great bell of [the chateau]2016-the chateau , nor the running up and down the stairs ; nor the hurried figures on [the terrace]2132-the terrace ; nor the booting and tramping here and there and everywhere , nor the quick saddling of horses and riding away ? What winds conveyed this hurry to [the grizzled mender of roads]2133-the grizzled mender of roads , already at work on [the hill - top]1873-the hill - top beyond [the village]1888-the village , with [his]2133-the grizzled mender of roads day ’s dinner ( not much to carry ) lying in a bundle that it was worth no crow ’s while to peck at , on a heap of stones ? Had the birds , carrying some grains of it to a distance , dropped one over [him]2133-the grizzled mender of roads as [they]2136-they sow chance seeds ? Whether or no , [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads ran , on the sultry morning , as if for [his]2133-the grizzled mender of roads life , down [the hill]375-the hill , knee - high in dust , and never stopped till [he]2133-the grizzled mender of roads got to [the fountain]1818-the fountain . [All the people of [the village]1888-the village]2140-all the people of the village were at [the fountain]1818-the fountain , standing about in [their]2140-all the people of the village depressed manner , and whispering low , but showing no other emotions than grim curiosity and surprise . The led cows , hastily brought in and tethered to anything that would hold [them]2143-their , were looking stupidly on , or lying down chewing the cud of nothing particularly repaying [their]2143-their trouble , which [they]2143-their had picked up in [their]2143-their interrupted saunter . [Some of [the people of [the chateau]2016-the chateau]2145-the people of the chateau , and some of [those of [the posting - house]1919-the posting - house]2147-those of the posting - house]2144-some of the people of the chateau , and some of those of the posting - house , and [all the taxing authorities]2149-all the taxing authorities , were armed more or less , and were crowded on the other side of [the little street]2150-the little street in a purposeless way , that was highly fraught with nothing . Already , [the mender of [roads]2089-roads]1970-the mender of roads had penetrated into the midst of [a group of fifty particular friends]2153-a group of fifty particular friends , and was smiting [himself]2133-the grizzled mender of roads in the breast with [his]2133-the grizzled mender of roads blue cap . What did all this portend , and what portended the swift hoisting - up of [Monsieur Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle behind [a servant on horseback]2154-a servant on horseback , and the conveying away of [the said Gabelle]195-monsieur gabelle ( double - laden though the horse was ) , at a gallop , like a new version of the German ballad of [Leonora]201-leonora ? It portended that there was one stone face too many , up at [the chateau]2016-the chateau . [The Gorgon]1982-the gorgon had surveyed [the building]2157-the building again in the night , and had added the one stone face wanting ; the stone face for which [it]1982-the gorgon had waited through about two hundred years . It lay back on the pillow of [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis . It was like a fine mask , suddenly startled , made angry , and petrified . Driven home into the heart of the stone figure attached to it , was a knife . Round its hilt was a frill of paper , on which was scrawled : “ Drive [him]193-monsieur the marquis fast to [[his]193-monsieur the marquis tomb]5541-his tomb . This , from [Jacques]148-jacques . ”[162-darnay] CHAPTER X. Two Promises More months , to the number of twelve , had come and gone , and [Mr. Charles Darnay]162-darnay was established in [England]1-england as [a higher teacher of the French language who was conversant with French literature]2158-a higher teacher of the french language who was conversant with french literature . In this age , [he]162-darnay would have been [a Professor]2159-a professor ; in that age , [he]162-darnay was [a Tutor]2160-a tutor . [He]162-darnay read with [young men who could find any leisure and interest for the study of a living tongue]2161-young men who could find any leisure and interest for the study of a living tongue spoken all over [the world]519-the world , and [he]162-darnay cultivated a taste for its stores of knowledge and fancy . [He]162-darnay could write of them , besides , in sound English , and render them into sound English . [Such masters]2163-such masters were not at that time easily found ; [Princes that had been]2164-princes that had been , and [Kings that were to be]2165-kings that were to be , were not yet of [the Teacher class]2166-the teacher class , and [no ruined nobility]2167-no ruined nobility had dropped out of [Tellson]134-tellson ’s ledgers , to turn [cooks]2168-cooks and [carpenters]2169-carpenters . As [a tutor]2160-a tutor , whose attainments made [the student]2171-the student ’s way unusually pleasant and profitable , and as [an elegant translator who brought something to [his]162-darnay work besides mere dictionary knowledge]2172-an elegant translator who brought something to his work besides mere dictionary knowledge , [young Mr. Darnay]162-darnay soon became known and encouraged . [He]162-darnay was well acquainted , more - over , with the circumstances of [[his]162-darnay country]1171-his country , and those were of ever - growing interest . So , with great perseverance and untiring industry , [he]162-darnay prospered . In [London]3-london , [he]162-darnay had expected neither to walk on pavements of gold , nor to lie on beds of roses ; if [he]162-darnay had had any such exalted expectation , [he]162-darnay would not have prospered . [He]162-darnay had expected labour , and [he]162-darnay found it , and did it and made the best of it . In this , [his]162-darnay prosperity consisted . A certain portion of [his]162-darnay time was passed at [Cambridge]65-cambridge , where [he]162-darnay read with [undergraduates]2174-undergraduates as [a sort of tolerated smuggler who drove a contraband trade in European languages , instead of conveying Greek and Latin through [the Custom - house]2176-the custom - house]2175-a sort of tolerated smuggler who drove a contraband trade in european languages , instead of conveying greek and latin through the custom - house . The rest of [his]162-darnay time [he]162-darnay passed in [London]3-london . Now , from the days when it was always summer in [Eden]66-eden , to these days when it is mostly winter in fallen latitudes , [the world of [a man]449-a man]2177-the world of a man has invariably gone one way -- [Charles Darnay]162-darnay ’s way -- the way of the love of [a woman]1959-a woman . [He]162-darnay had loved [Lucie Manette]174-lucie from the hour of [his]162-darnay danger . [He]162-darnay had never heard a sound so sweet and dear as the sound of [her]174-lucie compassionate voice ; [he]162-darnay had never seen a face so tenderly beautiful , as [hers]174-lucie when it was confronted with [his]162-darnay own on the edge of the grave that had been dug for [him]162-darnay . But , [he]162-darnay had not yet spoken to [her]174-lucie on the subject ; the assassination at [the deserted chateau far away beyond [the heaving water]2181-the heaving water and [the long , long , dusty roads]2182-the long , long , dusty roads]2180-the deserted chateau far away beyond the heaving water and the long , long , dusty roads -- [the solid stone chateau which had itself become the mere mist of a dream]2183-the solid stone chateau which had itself become the mere mist of a dream -- had been done a year , and [he]162-darnay had never yet , by so much as a single spoken word , disclosed to [her]174-lucie the state of [his]162-darnay heart . That [he]162-darnay had [his]162-darnay reasons for this , [he]162-darnay knew full well . It was again a summer day when , lately arrived in [London]3-london from [his]162-darnay college occupation , [he]162-darnay turned into [the quiet corner in [Soho]58-soho]2184-the quiet corner in soho , bent on seeking an opportunity of opening [his]162-darnay mind to [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . It was the close of the summer day , and [he]162-darnay knew [Lucie]174-lucie to be out with [Miss Pross]183-miss pross . [He]162-darnay found [the Doctor]1514-the doctor reading in [his]162-darnay arm - chair at a window . The energy which had at once supported [him]162-darnay under [his]162-darnay old sufferings and aggravated [their]2186-their sharpness , had been gradually restored to [him]162-darnay . [He]162-darnay was now [a very energetic man]2187-a very energetic man indeed , with great firmness of purpose , strength of resolution , and vigour of action . In [his]162-darnay recovered energy [he]162-darnay was sometimes a little fitful and sudden , as [he]162-darnay had at first been in the exercise of [his]162-darnay other recovered faculties ; but , this had never been frequently observable , and had grown more and more rare . [He]162-darnay studied much , slept little , sustained a great deal of fatigue with ease , and was equably cheerful . To [him]162-darnay , now entered [Charles Darnay]162-darnay , at sight of whom [he]162-darnay laid aside [his]162-darnay book and held out [his]162-darnay hand . “ [Charles Darnay]162-darnay ! [I]162-darnay rejoice to see [you]162-darnay . [We]5542-we have been counting on [your]162-darnay return these three or four days past . [Mr. Stryver]171-mr. stryver and [Sydney Carton]177-carton were both here yesterday , and both made [you]162-darnay out to be more than due . ”[162-darnay] “ [I]162-darnay am obliged to [them]2188-them for [their]2188-them interest in the matter , ”[162-darnay] [he]162-darnay answered , a little coldly as to [them]2188-them , though very warmly as to [the Doctor]1514-the doctor . “ [Miss Manette--]5543-miss manette-- ”[162-darnay] “ Is well , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , as [he]1514-the doctor stopped short , “ and [your]162-darnay return will delight [us]5542-we all . [She]5543-miss manette-- has gone out on some household matters , but will soon be [home]858-home . ”[1514-the doctor] “ [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , [I]162-darnay knew [she]5543-miss manette-- was from [home]858-home . [I]162-darnay took the opportunity of [her]5543-miss manette-- being from [home]858-home , to beg to speak to [you]162-darnay . ”[162-darnay] There was a blank silence . “ Yes ? ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , with evident constraint . “ Bring [your]162-darnay chair here , and speak on . ”[162-darnay] [He]162-darnay complied as to the chair , but appeared to find the speaking on less easy . “ [I]162-darnay have had the happiness , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , of being so intimate here , ”[162-darnay] so [he]162-darnay at length began , “ for some year and a half , that [I]162-darnay hope the topic on which [I]162-darnay am about to touch may not-- ”[162-darnay] [He]162-darnay was stayed by [the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s putting out [his]1514-the doctor hand to stop [him]162-darnay . When [he]162-darnay had kept it so a little while , [he]162-darnay said , drawing it back : “ Is Lucie the topic ? ”[162-darnay] “ [She]5543-miss manette-- is . ”[162-darnay] “ It is hard for [me]5008-her father to speak of [her]5543-miss manette-- at any time . It is very hard for [me]5008-her father to hear [her]5543-miss manette-- spoken of in that tone of [yours]170-doctor manette , [Charles Darnay]162-darnay . ”[5008-her father] “ It is a tone of fervent admiration , true homage , and deep love , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ! ”[162-darnay] [he]162-darnay said deferentially . There was another blank silence before [[her]2193-her father]5008-her father rejoined : “ [I]5008-her father believe it . [I]5008-her father do [you]162-darnay justice ; [I]5008-her father believe it . ”[5008-her father] [His]5008-her father constraint was so manifest , and it was so manifest , too , that it originated in an unwillingness to approach the subject , that [Charles Darnay]162-darnay hesitated . “ Shall [I]5008-her father go on , [sir]4862-sir ? ”[5008-her father] Another blank . “ Yes , go on . ”[5008-her father] “ [You]162-darnay anticipate what [I]1514-the doctor would say , though [you]162-darnay can not know how earnestly [I]1514-the doctor say it , how earnestly [I]1514-the doctor feel it , without knowing [my]1514-the doctor secret heart , and the hopes and fears and anxieties with which it has long been laden . [Dear Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , [I]1514-the doctor love [[your]170-doctor manette daughter]5247-your daughter fondly , dearly , disinterestedly , devotedly . If ever there were love in [the world]519-the world , [I]1514-the doctor love [her]5247-your daughter . [You]162-darnay have loved [yourself]162-darnay ; let [your]162-darnay old love speak for [me]1514-the doctor ! ”[1514-the doctor] [The Doctor]1514-the doctor sat with [his]1514-the doctor face turned away , and [his]1514-the doctor eyes bent on the ground . At the last words , [he]1514-the doctor stretched out [his]1514-the doctor hand again , hurriedly , and cried : “ Not that , [sir]4862-sir ! Let that be ! [I]1514-the doctor adjure [you]162-darnay , do not recall that ! ”[1514-the doctor] [His]1514-the doctor cry was so like a cry of actual pain , that it rang in [Charles Darnay]162-darnay ’s ears long after [he]1514-the doctor had ceased . [He]1514-the doctor motioned with the hand [he]1514-the doctor had extended , and it seemed to be an appeal to [Darnay]162-darnay to pause . [The latter]809-the latter so received it , and remained silent . “ [I]1514-the doctor ask [your]1514-the doctor pardon , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , in a subdued tone , after some moments . “ [I]1514-the doctor do not doubt [your]1514-the doctor loving [Lucie]174-lucie ; [you]1514-the doctor may be satisfied of it . ”[1514-the doctor] [He]1514-the doctor turned towards [him]1514-the doctor in [his]1514-the doctor chair , but did not look at [him]1514-the doctor , or raise [his]1514-the doctor eyes . [His]1514-the doctor chin dropped upon [his]1514-the doctor hand , and [his]1514-the doctor white hair overshadowed [his]1514-the doctor face : “ Have [you]1514-the doctor spoken to [Lucie]174-lucie ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ No . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Nor written ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ Never . ”[1514-the doctor] “ It would be ungenerous to affect not to know that [your]1514-the doctor self - denial is to be referred to [your]1514-the doctor consideration for [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father . [[Her]174-lucie father]5008-her father thanks [you]1514-the doctor . ”[1514-the doctor] [He]1514-the doctor offered [his]1514-the doctor hand ; but [his]1514-the doctor eyes did not go with it . “ [I]162-darnay know , ”[162-darnay] said [Darnay]162-darnay , respectfully , “ how can [I]162-darnay fail to know , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , [I]162-darnay who have seen [you]170-doctor manette together from day to day , that between [you]170-doctor manette and [Miss Manette]140-miss manette there is an affection so unusual , so touching , so belonging to the circumstances in which it has been nurtured , that it can have few parallels , even in the tenderness between [a father]5553-a father and [child]5132-child . [I]162-darnay know , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette -- how can [I]162-darnay fail to know -- that , mingled with the affection and duty of [a daughter who has become a woman]5555-a daughter who has become a woman , there is , in [her]174-lucie heart , towards [you]170-doctor manette , all the love and reliance of infancy itself . [I]162-darnay know that , as in [her]174-lucie childhood [she]174-lucie had [no parent]5556-no parent , so [she]174-lucie is now devoted to [you]170-doctor manette with all the constancy and fervour of [her]174-lucie present years and character , united to the trustfulness and attachment of the early days in which [you]170-doctor manette were lost to [her]174-lucie . [I]162-darnay know perfectly well that if [you]170-doctor manette had been restored to [her]174-lucie from [the world]519-the world beyond this life , [you]170-doctor manette could hardly be invested , in [her]174-lucie sight , with a more sacred character than that in which [you]170-doctor manette are always with [her]174-lucie . [I]162-darnay know that when [she]174-lucie is clinging to [you]170-doctor manette , the hands of [baby]5558-baby , [girl]5559-girl , and [woman]5560-woman , all in one , are round [your]170-doctor manette neck . [I]162-darnay know that in loving [you]170-doctor manette [she]174-lucie sees and loves [[her]174-lucie mother]5561-her mother at [her]174-lucie own age , sees and loves [you]170-doctor manette at [my]162-darnay age , loves [[her]174-lucie mother]5561-her mother broken - hearted , loves [you]170-doctor manette through [your]170-doctor manette dreadful trial and in [your]170-doctor manette blessed restoration . [I]162-darnay have known this , night and day , since [I]162-darnay have known [you]170-doctor manette in [[your]170-doctor manette home]5563-your home . ”[162-darnay] [[Her]2198-her father]5008-her father sat silent , with [his]5008-her father face bent down . [His]5008-her father breathing was a little quickened ; but [he]5008-her father repressed all other signs of agitation . “ Dear [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , always knowing this , always seeing [her]174-lucie and [you]170-doctor manette with this hallowed light about [you]170-doctor manette , [I]5008-her father have forborne , and forborne , as long as it was in the nature of [man]5564-man to do it . [I]5008-her father have felt , and do even now feel , that to bring [my]5008-her father love -- even [mine]5008-her father -- between [you]170-doctor manette , is to touch [your]170-doctor manette history with something not quite so good as itself . But [I]5008-her father love [her]174-lucie . Heaven is [my]5008-her father witness that [I]5008-her father love [her]174-lucie ! ”[5008-her father] “ [I]5008-her father believe it , ”[5008-her father] answered [[her]2200-her father]5008-her father , mournfully . “ [I]5008-her father have thought so before now . [I]5008-her father believe it . ”[5008-her father] “ But , do not believe , ”[162-darnay] said [Darnay]162-darnay , upon whose ear the mournful voice struck with a reproachful sound , “ that if [my]5008-her father fortune were so cast as that , being one day so happy as to make [her]174-lucie [[my]5008-her father wife]5044-my wife , [I]5008-her father must at any time put any separation between [her]174-lucie and [you]170-doctor manette , [I]5008-her father could or would breathe a word of what [I]5008-her father now say . Besides that [I]5008-her father should know it to be hopeless , [I]5008-her father should know it to be a baseness . If [I]5008-her father had any such possibility , even at a remote distance of years , harboured in [my]5008-her father thoughts , and hidden in [my]5008-her father heart -- if it ever had been there -- if it ever could be there -- [I]5008-her father could not now touch this honoured hand . ”[5008-her father] [He]5008-her father laid [his]5008-her father own upon it as [he]5008-her father spoke . “ No , dear [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . Like [you]170-doctor manette , a voluntary exile from [France]2-france ; like [you]170-doctor manette , driven from it by its distractions , oppressions , and miseries ; like [you]170-doctor manette , striving to live away from it by [my]5008-her father own exertions , and trusting in a happier future ; [I]5008-her father look only to sharing [your]170-doctor manette fortunes , sharing [your]170-doctor manette life and [home]858-home , and being faithful to [you]170-doctor manette to the death . Not to divide with [Lucie]174-lucie [her]174-lucie privilege as [[your]170-doctor manette child]5567-your child , [companion]5568-companion , and [friend]5569-friend ; but to come in aid of it , and bind [her]174-lucie closer to [you]170-doctor manette , if such a thing can be . ”[5008-her father] [His]5008-her father touch still lingered on [[her]2202-her father]5008-her father ’s hand . Answering the touch for a moment , but not coldly , [[her]2202-her father]5008-her father rested [his]5008-her father hands upon the arms of [his]5008-her father chair , and looked up for the first time since the beginning of the conference . A struggle was evidently in [his]5008-her father face ; a struggle with that occasional look which had a tendency in it to dark doubt and dread . “ [You]170-doctor manette speak so feelingly and so manfully , [Charles Darnay]162-darnay , that [I]2205-i thank [you]170-doctor manette with all [my]2205-i heart , and will open all [my]2205-i heart -- or nearly so . Have [you]170-doctor manette any reason to believe that [Lucie]174-lucie loves [you]170-doctor manette ? ”[2205-i] “ [None]5570-none . As yet , none . ”[2205-i] “ Is it the immediate object of this confidence , that [you]170-doctor manette may at once ascertain that , with [my]2205-i knowledge ? ”[2205-i] “ Not even so . [I]2205-i might not have the hopefulness to do it for weeks ; [I]2205-i might ( mistaken or not mistaken ) have that hopefulness to - morrow . ”[2205-i] “ Do [you]170-doctor manette seek any guidance from [me]2205-i ? ”[2205-i] “ [I]2205-i ask none , [sir]4862-sir . [I]2205-i well understand that , even if [Miss Manette]140-miss manette held [me]2205-i at this moment in [her]140-miss manette innocent heart -- do not think [I]2205-i have the presumption to assume so much -- [I]2205-i could retain no place in it against [her]140-miss manette love for [[her]140-miss manette father]5008-her father . ”[2205-i] “ If that be so , do [you]170-doctor manette see what , on the other hand , is involved in it ? ”[2205-i] “ [I]162-darnay understand equally well , that a word from [[her]140-miss manette father]5008-her father in [any suitor]5574-any suitor ’s favour , would outweigh [herself]140-miss manette and all [the world]519-the world . For which reason , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , ”[162-darnay] said [Darnay]162-darnay , modestly but firmly , “ [I]162-darnay would not ask that word , to save [my]162-darnay life . ”[162-darnay] “ [I]2205-i am sure of it . [[My]2205-i daughter]5576-my daughter [Lucie]174-lucie is , in this one respect , such a mystery to [me]2205-i ; [I]2205-i can make no guess at the state of [her]5576-my daughter heart . ”[2205-i] “ May [I]162-darnay ask , [sir]4862-sir , if [you]4862-sir think [she]5576-my daughter is-- ”[162-darnay] As [he]162-darnay hesitated , [[her]2205-i father]5008-her father supplied the rest . “ Is sought by [any other suitor]5578-any other suitor ? ”[5008-her father] “ It is what [I]5008-her father meant to say . ”[5008-her father] [[Her]2205-i father]5008-her father considered a little before [he]5008-her father answered : “ [You]2205-i have seen [Mr. Carton]172-carton [here]4902-here , [yourself]2205-i . This is idle talk . ”[1514-the doctor] So strange was the way in which [he]2209-the young man faded into silence , and so strange [his]2209-the young man fixed look when [he]2209-the young man had ceased to speak , that [Darnay]162-darnay felt [his]162-darnay own hand turn cold in the hand that slowly released and dropped it . “ [You]162-darnay said something to [me]170-doctor manette , ”[170-doctor manette] said [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , breaking into a smile . “ What was it [you]162-darnay said to [me]170-doctor manette ? ”[170-doctor manette] [He]162-darnay was at a loss how to answer , until [he]162-darnay remembered having spoken of a condition . [My]162-darnay present name , though but slightly changed from [[my]162-darnay mother]4973-my mother ’s , is not , as [you]162-darnay will remember , [my]162-darnay own . God bless [you]162-darnay ! ” It was dark when [Charles Darnay]162-darnay left [him]4969-my father , and it was an hour later and darker when [Lucie]174-lucie came [home]858-home ; [she]174-lucie hurried into [the room]565-the room alone -- for [Miss Pross]183-miss pross had gone straight up - [stairs]967-stairs -- and was surprised to find [his]4969-my father reading - chair empty . “[162-darnay] [[My]0-i father]4969-my father ! ” [she]174-lucie called to [him]4969-my father . “[202-father] [[Father]202-father dear]2218-father dear ! ” Nothing was said in answer , but [she]174-lucie heard a low hammering sound in [[his]4969-my father bedroom]5587-his bedroom . [A Companion Picture]5590-a companion picture “[0-i] [Sydney]177-carton , ” said [Mr. Stryver]171-mr. stryver , on that self - same night , or morning , to [[his]171-mr. stryver jackal]5591-his jackal ; “[0-i] mix another bowl of punch ; [I]0-i have something to say to [you]177-carton . ” [Sydney]177-carton had been working double tides that night , and the night before , and the night before that , and a good many nights in succession , making a grand clearance among [Mr. Stryver]171-mr. stryver ’s papers before the setting in of the long vacation . The clearance was effected at last ; [the Stryver arrears]5592-the stryver arrears were handsomely fetched up ; everything was got rid of until November should come with its fogs atmospheric , and fogs legal , and bring grist to [the mill]1912-the mill again . [Sydney]177-carton was [none the livelier]5594-none the livelier and [none the soberer]5595-none the soberer for so much application . It had taken a deal of extra wet - towelling to pull [him]177-carton through the night ; a correspondingly extra quantity of wine had preceded the towelling ; and [he]177-carton was in a very damaged condition , as [he]177-carton now pulled [his]177-carton turban off and threw it into the basin in which [he]177-carton had steeped it at intervals for the last six hours . “[0-i] Are [you]0-i mixing that other bowl of punch ? ” said [Stryver]171-mr. stryver the portly , with [his]171-mr. stryver hands in [his]171-mr. stryver waistband , glancing round from the sofa where [he]171-mr. stryver lay on [his]171-mr. stryver back . “[0-i] [I]0-i am . ” “[0-i] Now , look here ! [I]0-i am going to tell [you]0-i something that will rather surprise [you]0-i , and that perhaps will make [you]0-i think [me]0-i not quite as shrewd as [you]0-i usually do think [me]0-i . [I]0-i intend to marry . ” “[0-i] _ Do _ [you]0-i ? ” “[0-i] Yes . And not for money . What do [you]0-i say now ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i do n’t feel disposed to say much . Who is [she]2219-she ? ” “[2219-she] Guess . ” “[2219-she] Do [I]0-i know [her]2219-she ? ” “[0-i] Guess . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am not going to guess , at five o’clock in the morning , with [my]0-i brains frying and sputtering in [my]0-i head . If [you]0-i want [me]0-i to guess , [you]0-i must ask [me]0-i to dinner . ” “[0-i] Well then , [I]0-i ’ll tell [you]0-i , ” said [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , coming slowly into a sitting posture . “[177-carton] [Sydney]177-carton , [I]0-i rather despair of making [myself]0-i intelligible to [you]0-i , because [you]0-i are such an insensible dog . ” “[0-i] And [you]0-i , ” returned [Sydney]177-carton , busy concocting the punch , “[0-i] are such a sensitive and poetical spirit-- ” “[0-i] Come ! ” rejoined [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , laughing boastfully , “[0-i] though [I]0-i do n’t prefer any claim to being [the soul of Romance]2220-the soul of romance ( for [I]0-i hope [I]0-i know better ) , still [I]0-i am [a tenderer sort of fellow]2221-a tenderer sort of fellow than _ [you]0-i _ . ” “[2221-a tenderer sort of fellow] [You]0-i are [a luckier]2222-a luckier , if [you]0-i mean that . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i do n’t mean that . [I]0-i mean [I]0-i am [a man of more -- more--]2223-a man of more -- more-- ” “[0-i] Say gallantry , while [you]0-i are about it , ” suggested [Carton]177-carton . “[0-i] Well ! [I]0-i ’ll say gallantry . [My]0-i meaning is that [I]0-i am [a man]449-a man , ” said [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , inflating [himself]171-mr. stryver at [[his]171-mr. stryver friend]1325-his friend as [he]171-mr. stryver made the punch , “[449-a man] who cares more to be agreeable , who takes more pains to be agreeable , who knows better how to be agreeable , in [a woman ’s society]2225-a woman ’s society , than [you]0-i do . ” “[0-i] Go on , ” said [Sydney Carton]177-carton . “[0-i] No ; but before [I]0-i go on , ” said [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , shaking [his]171-mr. stryver head in [his]171-mr. stryver bullying way , “[0-i] [I]0-i ’ll have this out with [you]0-i . [Your]0-i manners have been of that silent and sullen and hangdog kind , that , upon [my]0-i life and soul , [I]0-i have been ashamed of [you]0-i , [Sydney]177-carton ! ” “[177-carton] It should be very beneficial to [a man in [your]0-i practice at [the bar]1031-the bar]2227-a man in your practice at the bar , to be ashamed of anything , ” returned [Sydney]177-carton ; “[0-i] [you]0-i ought to be much obliged to [me]0-i . ” “[0-i] [You]0-i shall not get off in that way , ” rejoined [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , shouldering the rejoinder at [him]0-i ; “[0-i] no , [Sydney]177-carton , it ’s [my]0-i duty to tell [you]177-carton -- and [I]0-i tell [you]177-carton to [your]177-carton face to do [you]177-carton good -- that [you]177-carton are [a devilish ill - conditioned fellow in that sort of society]2229-a devilish ill - conditioned fellow in that sort of society . If [you]0-i had been [a fellow of any sensitiveness or delicacy of feeling in that kind of way]2237-a fellow of any sensitiveness or delicacy of feeling in that kind of way , [Sydney]177-carton , [I]0-i might have been a little resentful of [your]0-i employing such a designation ; but [you]0-i are not . [She]2240-she will have in [me]0-i [a man already pretty well off]2242-a man already pretty well off , and [a rapidly rising man]2243-a rapidly rising man , and [a man of some distinction]2244-a man of some distinction : it is a piece of good fortune for [her]2240-she , but [she]2240-she is worthy of good fortune . Are [you]0-i astonished ? ” [Carton]177-carton , still drinking the punch , rejoined , “[0-i] Why should [I]0-i be astonished ? ” “[0-i] [You]0-i approve ? ” [Carton]177-carton , still drinking the punch , rejoined , “[0-i] Why should [I]0-i not approve ? ” “[0-i] Well ! ” said [[his]0-i friend]1325-his friend [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , “[0-i] [you]0-i take it more easily than [I]0-i fancied [you]0-i would , and are less mercenary on [my]0-i behalf than [I]0-i thought [you]0-i would be ; though , to be sure , [you]0-i know well enough by this time that [[your]0-i ancient chum]2245-your ancient chum is [a man of a pretty strong will]2246-a man of a pretty strong will . Yes , [Sydney]177-carton , [I]0-i have had enough of this style of life , with no other as a change from it ; [I]0-i feel that it is a pleasant thing for [a man]449-a man to have [a home]1615-a home when [he]449-a man feels inclined to go to it ( when [he]449-a man does n’t , [he]449-a man can stay away ) , and [I]0-i feel that [Miss Manette]140-miss manette will tell well in any station , and will always do [me]0-i credit . So [I]0-i have made up [my]0-i mind . And now , [Sydney]177-carton , [old boy]2249-old boy , [I]0-i want to say a word to _ [you]0-i _ about _ [your]0-i _ prospects . [You]0-i are in a bad way , [you]0-i know ; [you]0-i really are in a bad way . [You]0-i do n’t know the value of money , [you]0-i live hard , [you]0-i ’ll knock up one of these days , and be ill and poor ; [you]0-i really ought to think about [a nurse]2250-a nurse . ” The prosperous patronage with which [he]0-i said it , made [him]0-i look twice as big as [he]0-i was , and four times as offensive . “[2250-a nurse] Now , let [me]0-i recommend [you]0-i , ” pursued [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , “[0-i] to look it in the face .
