[A honouring and obeying wife]2369-a honouring and obeying wife would let [his]5147-a honest tradesman trade alone altogether . Call [yourself]159-young jerry [a religious woman]2370-a religious woman ? If [you]159-young jerry ’re [a religious woman]2370-a religious woman , give [me]0-i a irreligious one ! [You]159-young jerry have no more nat’ral sense of duty than the bed of this [here Thames river]2372-here thames river has of a pile , and similarly it must be knocked into [you]159-young jerry . ” The altercation was conducted in a low tone of voice , and terminated in [the honest tradesman]5662-the honest tradesman ’s kicking off [his]5662-the honest tradesman clay - soiled boots , and lying down at [his]5662-the honest tradesman length on the floor . After taking a timid peep at [him]5662-the honest tradesman lying on [his]5662-the honest tradesman back , with [his]5662-the honest tradesman rusty hands under [his]5662-the honest tradesman head for a pillow , [[his]5662-the honest tradesman son]955-his son lay down too , and fell asleep again . There was no fish for breakfast , and not much of anything else . [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher was out of spirits , and out of temper , and kept an iron pot - lid by [him]156-mr. cruncher as a projectile for the correction of [Mrs. Cruncher]155-mrs. cruncher , in case [he]156-mr. cruncher should observe any symptoms of [her]155-mrs. cruncher saying Grace . [He]156-mr. cruncher was brushed and washed at the usual hour , and set off with [[his]5662-the honest tradesman son]955-his son to pursue [his]156-mr. cruncher ostensible calling . [Young Jerry]159-young jerry , walking with the stool under [his]159-young jerry arm at [[his]159-young jerry father]1015-his father ’s side along sunny and crowded [Fleet - street]962-fleet - street , was [a very different Young Jerry from [him]156-mr. cruncher of the previous night , running [home]858-home through darkness and solitude from [[his]159-young jerry grim pursuer]5834-his grim pursuer]5832-a very different young jerry from him of the previous night , running home through darkness and solitude from his grim pursuer . [His]156-mr. cruncher cunning was fresh with the day , and [his]156-mr. cruncher qualms were gone with the night -- in which particulars it is not improbable that [he]156-mr. cruncher had compeers in [Fleet - street]38-fleet - street and [the City of [London]3-london]5835-the city of london , that fine morning . “[5144-father] [Father]5144-father , ” said [Young Jerry]159-young jerry , as [they]5836-they walked along : taking care to keep at arm ’s length and to have the stool well between [them]5836-they : “[5144-father] what ’s [a Resurrection - Man]2374-a resurrection - man ? ” [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher came to a stop on [the pavement]727-the pavement before [he]156-mr. cruncher answered , “[2374-a resurrection - man] How should [I]0-i know ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i thought [you]5144-father knowed everything , [father]5144-father , ” said [the artless boy]5838-the artless boy . “[209-hem] [Hem]209-hem ! Well , ” returned [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , going on again , and lifting off [his]156-mr. cruncher hat to give [his]156-mr. cruncher spikes free play , “[2374-a resurrection - man] [he]2374-a resurrection - man ’s [a tradesman]2376-a tradesman . ” “[2376-a tradesman] What ’s [his]2374-a resurrection - man goods , [father]5144-father ? ” asked [the brisk Young Jerry]159-young jerry . “[2374-a resurrection - man] [His]2374-a resurrection - man goods , ” said [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , after turning it over in [his]156-mr. cruncher mind , “[2374-a resurrection - man] is a branch of Scientific goods . ” “[2374-a resurrection - man] [Persons]2378-persons ’ bodies , ai n’t it , [father]5144-father ? ” asked [the lively boy]5839-the lively boy . “[5144-father] [I]0-i believe it is something of that sort , ” said [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher . “[0-i] Oh , [father]5144-father , [I]0-i should so like to be [a Resurrection - Man]2374-a resurrection - man when [I]0-i ’m quite growed up ! ” [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher was soothed , but shook [his]156-mr. cruncher head in a dubious and moral way . “[2374-a resurrection - man] It depends upon how [you]0-i dewelop [your]0-i talents . Be careful to dewelop [your]0-i talents , and never to say no more than [you]0-i can help to [nobody]356-nobody , and there ’s no telling at the present time what [you]0-i may not come to be fit for . ” As [Young Jerry]159-young jerry , thus encouraged , went on a few yards in advance , to plant the stool in the shadow of [the Bar]1031-the bar , [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher added to [himself]156-mr. cruncher : “[159-young jerry] [Jerry]159-young jerry , [[you]159-young jerry honest tradesman]4870-you honest tradesman , there ’s hopes wot [that boy]2384-that boy will yet be a blessing to [you]159-young jerry , and a recompense to [you]159-young jerry for [[his]2384-that boy mother]1010-his mother ! ” CHAPTER XV . Knitting There had been earlier drinking than usual in [the wine - shop of Monsieur Defarge]5841-the wine - shop of monsieur defarge . As early as six o’clock in the morning , sallow faces peeping through [its]5841-the wine - shop of monsieur defarge barred windows had descried other faces within , bending over measures of wine . [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge sold a very thin wine at the best of times , but it would seem to have been an unusually thin wine that [he]147-defarge sold at this time . A sour wine , moreover , or a souring , for its influence on the mood of [those who drank it]5842-those who drank it was to make [them]5842-those who drank it gloomy . No vivacious Bacchanalian flame leaped out of the pressed grape of [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge : but , a smouldering fire that burnt in the dark , lay hidden in the dregs of it . This had been the third morning in succession , on which there had been early drinking at [the wine - shop of [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge]5841-the wine - shop of monsieur defarge . It had begun on Monday , and here was Wednesday come . There had been more of early brooding than drinking ; for , [many men]5844-many men had listened and whispered and slunk about [there]4887-there from the time of the opening of the door , who could not have laid a piece of money on the counter to save [their]5844-many men souls . These were to the full as interested in [the place]791-the place , however , as if [they]5844-many men could have commanded whole barrels of wine ; and [they]5844-many men glided from seat to seat , and from corner to corner , swallowing talk in lieu of drink , with greedy looks . Notwithstanding an unusual flow of company , [the master of [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop]745-the master of the wine - shop was not visible . [He]745-the master of the wine - shop was not missed ; for , [nobody who crossed the threshold]5849-nobody who crossed the threshold looked for [him]745-the master of the wine - shop , [nobody]356-nobody asked for [him]745-the master of the wine - shop , [nobody]356-nobody wondered to see only [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge in [her]146-madame defarge seat , presiding over the distribution of wine , with a bowl of battered small coins before [her]146-madame defarge , as much defaced and beaten out of [their]5844-many men original impress as the small coinage of humanity from whose ragged pockets [they]5844-many men had come . A suspended interest and a prevalent absence of mind , were perhaps observed by [the spies who looked in at [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop]5852-the spies who looked in at the wine - shop , as [they]5852-the spies who looked in at the wine - shop looked in at every place , high and low , from [[the king]4850-the king ’s palace]5855-the king ’s palace to [[the criminal]5856-the criminal ’s gaol]5857-the criminal ’s gaol . Games at cards languished , [players]5858-players at dominoes musingly built towers with [them]5858-players , [drinkers]5859-drinkers drew figures on the tables with spilt drops of wine , [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge [herself]146-madame defarge picked out the pattern on [her]146-madame defarge sleeve with [her]146-madame defarge toothpick , and saw and heard something inaudible and invisible a long way off . Thus , [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine in [this vinous feature of [his]144-saint antoine]5860-this vinous feature of his , until midday . It was high noontide , when [two dusty men]5861-two dusty men passed through [[his]144-saint antoine streets]5862-his streets and under [his]144-saint antoine swinging lamps : of whom , one was [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge : [the other]756-the other [a mender of roads]5864-a mender of roads in a blue cap . All adust and athirst , [the two]883-the two entered [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop . [Their]883-the two arrival had lighted a kind of fire in the breast of [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine , fast spreading as [they]883-the two came along , which stirred and flickered in flames of faces at most doors and windows . Yet , [no one]330-no one had followed [them]883-the two , and [no man]1866-no man spoke when [they]883-the two entered [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop , though the eyes of [every man there]5870-every man there were turned upon [them]883-the two . “[4870-you honest tradesman] Good day , [gentlemen]4849-gentlemen ! ” said [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge . It may have been a signal for loosening the general tongue . It elicited an answering chorus of “[4870-you honest tradesman] Good day ! ” “[4870-you honest tradesman] It is bad weather , [gentlemen]4849-gentlemen , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge , shaking [his]147-defarge head . Upon which , [every man]5871-every man looked at [[his]5871-every man neighbour]5872-his neighbour , and then [all]5873-all cast down [their]5873-all eyes and sat silent . Except [one man]1440-one man , who got up and went out . “[4849-gentlemen] [[My]0-i wife]5044-my wife , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge aloud , addressing [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge : “[5044-my wife] [I]0-i have travelled certain leagues with [this good mender of roads]2389-this good mender of roads , called [Jacques]148-jacques . [I]0-i met [him]148-jacques -- by accident -- a day and half ’s journey out of [Paris]7-paris . [He]148-jacques is [a good child]2390-a good child , [this mender of roads]2391-this mender of roads , called [Jacques]148-jacques . Give [him]148-jacques to drink , [[my]0-i wife]5044-my wife ! ” [A second man]5875-a second man got up and went out . [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge set wine before [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads called [Jacques]148-jacques , who doffed [his]148-jacques blue cap to the company , and drank . In the breast of [his]148-jacques blouse [he]148-jacques carried some coarse dark bread ; [he]148-jacques ate of this between whiles , and sat munching and drinking near [[Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge ’s counter]5877-madame defarge ’s counter . [A third man]5878-a third man got up and went out . [Defarge]147-defarge refreshed [himself]147-defarge with a draught of wine -- but , [he]147-defarge took less than was given to [the stranger]5879-the stranger , as being [himself]147-defarge [a man to whom it was no rarity]5880-a man to whom it was no rarity -- and stood waiting until [the countryman]5881-the countryman had made [his]148-jacques breakfast . [He]147-defarge looked at [no one present]5882-no one present , and [no one]330-no one now looked at [him]147-defarge ; not even [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , who had taken up [her]146-madame defarge knitting , and was at work . “[5044-my wife] Have [you]2393-you finished [your]2393-you repast , [friend]5569-friend ? ” [he]147-defarge asked , in due season . “[2393-you] Yes , thank [you]2393-you . ” “[2393-you] Come , then ! [You]2393-you shall see [the apartment that [I]0-i told [you]2393-you [you]2393-you could occupy]2395-the apartment that i told you you could occupy . It will suit [you]2393-you to a marvel . ” Out of [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop into [the street]662-the street , out of [the street]662-the street into [a courtyard]1547-a courtyard , out of [the courtyard]915-the courtyard up [a steep staircase]5889-a steep staircase , out of the staircase into [a garret]5890-a garret -- formerly the garret where [a white - haired man]851-a white - haired man sat on a low bench , stooping forward and very busy , making shoes . [No white - haired man]5892-no white - haired man was there now ; but , [the three men]5893-the three men were there who had gone out of [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop singly . And between [them]5893-the three men and [the white - haired man]5895-the white - haired man afar off , was the one small link , that [they]5893-the three men had once looked in at [him]5895-the white - haired man through the chinks in the wall . [Defarge]147-defarge closed the door carefully , and spoke in a subdued voice : “[148-jacques] [Jacques One]148-jacques , [Jacques Two]210-jacques two , [Jacques Three]148-jacques ! This is [the witness]1272-the witness encountered by appointment , by [me]0-i , [Jacques Four]211-jacques four . [He]1272-the witness will tell [you]2397-you all . Speak , [Jacques Five]148-jacques ! ” [The mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , blue cap in hand , wiped [his]0-i swarthy forehead with it , and said , “[148-jacques] Where shall [I]0-i commence , [monsieur]5071-monsieur ? ” “[0-i] Commence , ” was [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge ’s not unreasonable reply , “[0-i] at the commencement . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i saw [him]1272-the witness then , [messieurs]2399-messieurs , ” began [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , “[0-i] a year ago this running summer , underneath the carriage of [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , hanging by the chain . Behold the manner of it . [I]0-i leaving [my]0-i work on [the road]377-the road , the sun going to bed , the carriage of [the Marquis]1836-the marquis slowly ascending [the hill]375-the hill , [he]1272-the witness hanging by the chain -- like this . ” Again [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads went through the whole performance ; in which [he]1970-the mender of roads ought to have been perfect by that time , seeing that it had been the infallible resource and indispensable entertainment of [[his]1970-the mender of roads village]5899-his village during a whole year . [Jacques One]212-jacques one struck in , and asked if [he]212-jacques one had ever seen [the man]472-the man before ? “[1272-the witness] Never , ” answered [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , recovering [his]1970-the mender of roads perpendicular . [Jacques Three]148-jacques demanded how [he]212-jacques one afterwards recognised [him]1272-the witness then ? “[1272-the witness] By [his]1272-the witness tall figure , ” said [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , softly , and with [his]1970-the mender of roads finger at [his]1970-the mender of roads nose . “[1272-the witness] When [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis demands that evening , ‘ Say , what is [he]1272-the witness like ? ’ [I]0-i make response , ‘ Tall as [a spectre]2404-a spectre . ’ ” “[0-i] [You]2405-you should have said , short as [a dwarf]2406-a dwarf , ” returned [Jacques Two]210-jacques two . “[2405-you] But what did [I]0-i know ? The deed was not then accomplished , neither did [he]193-monsieur the marquis confide in [me]0-i . Observe ! Under those circumstances even , [I]0-i do not offer [my]0-i testimony . [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis indicates [me]0-i with [his]193-monsieur the marquis finger , standing near [our]2407-our little fountain , and says , ‘ To [me]0-i ! Bring [that rascal]2408-that rascal ! ’ [My]0-i faith , [messieurs]2399-messieurs , [I]0-i offer nothing . ” “[0-i] [He]1272-the witness is right there , [Jacques]148-jacques , ” murmured [Defarge]147-defarge , to [him]148-jacques who had interrupted . “[148-jacques] Go on ! ” “[148-jacques] Good ! ” said [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , with an air of mystery . “[1822-the tall man] [The tall man]1822-the tall man is lost , and [he]1822-the tall man is sought -- how many months ? Nine , ten , eleven ? ” “[1822-the tall man] No matter , the number , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge . “[1822-the tall man] [He]1822-the tall man is well hidden , but at last [he]1822-the tall man is unluckily found . Go on ! ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am again at work upon [the hill - side]5451-the hill - side , and the sun is again about to go to bed . [I]0-i am collecting [my]0-i tools to descend to [[my]0-i cottage]2412-my cottage down in [the village]1888-the village below , where it is already dark , when [I]0-i raise [my]0-i eyes , and see coming over [the hill]375-the hill [six soldiers]2415-six soldiers . In the midst of [them]2415-six soldiers is [a tall man with [his]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides arms bound -- tied to [his]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides sides]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides -- like this ! ” With the aid of [his]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides indispensable cap , [he]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides represented [a man with [his]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides elbows bound fast at [his]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides hips , with cords that were knotted behind [him]2416-a tall man with his arms bound -- tied to his sides]5904-a man with his elbows bound fast at his hips , with cords that were knotted behind him . “[0-i] [I]0-i stand aside , [messieurs]2399-messieurs , by [my]0-i heap of stones , to see [the soldiers]2418-the soldiers and [[their]2418-the soldiers prisoner]2419-their prisoner pass ( for it is [a solitary road]2420-a solitary road , that , where any spectacle is well worth looking at ) , and at first , as [they]2415-six soldiers approach , [I]0-i see no more than that [they]2415-six soldiers are six soldiers with [a tall man]2421-a tall man bound , and that [they]2415-six soldiers are almost black to [my]0-i sight -- except on the side of the sun going to bed , where [they]2415-six soldiers have a red edge , [messieurs]2399-messieurs . Also , [I]0-i see that [their]2415-six soldiers long shadows are on the hollow ridge on [the opposite side of [the road]377-the road]2423-the opposite side of the road , and are on [the hill above]2425-the hill above [it]2425-the hill above , and are like the shadows of giants . Also , [I]0-i see that [they]2415-six soldiers are covered with dust , and that the dust moves with [them]2415-six soldiers as [they]2415-six soldiers come , tramp , tramp ! But when [they]2415-six soldiers advance quite near to [me]0-i , [I]0-i recognise [the tall man]1822-the tall man , and [he]1822-the tall man recognises [me]0-i . Ah , but [he]1822-the tall man would be well content to precipitate [himself]1822-the tall man over [the hill - side]5451-the hill - side once again , as on the evening when [he]1822-the tall man and [I]0-i first encountered , close to [the same spot]2428-the same spot ! ” [He]1822-the tall man described it as if [he]1822-the tall man were there , and it was evident that [he]1822-the tall man saw it vividly ; perhaps [he]1822-the tall man had not seen much in [his]1822-the tall man life . “[0-i] [I]0-i do not show [the soldiers]2418-the soldiers that [I]0-i recognise [the tall man]1822-the tall man ; [he]1822-the tall man does not show [the soldiers]2418-the soldiers that [he]1822-the tall man recognises [me]0-i ; [we]2432-we do it , and [we]2432-we know it , with [our]2432-we eyes . ‘ Come on ! ’ says [the chief of [that company]2434-that company]2433-the chief of that company , pointing to [the village]1888-the village , ‘ bring [him]1822-the tall man fast to [[his]1822-the tall man tomb]5541-his tomb ! ’ and [they]2418-the soldiers bring [him]1822-the tall man faster . [I]0-i follow . [His]1822-the tall man arms are swelled because of being bound so tight , [his]1822-the tall man wooden shoes are large and clumsy , and [he]1822-the tall man is lame . Because [he]1822-the tall man is lame , and consequently slow , [they]2418-the soldiers drive [him]1822-the tall man with [their]2418-the soldiers guns -- like this ! ” [He]1822-the tall man imitated the action of [a man]449-a man ’s being impelled forward by the butt - ends of muskets . “[2418-the soldiers] As [they]2418-the soldiers descend [the hill]375-the hill like [madmen running a race]2438-madmen running a race , [he]1822-the tall man falls . [They]2418-the soldiers laugh and pick [him]1822-the tall man up again . [His]1822-the tall man face is bleeding and covered with dust , but [he]1822-the tall man can not touch it ; thereupon [they]2418-the soldiers laugh again . [They]2418-the soldiers bring [him]1822-the tall man into [the village]1888-the village ; all [the village]1888-the village runs to look ; [they]2418-the soldiers take [him]1822-the tall man past [the mill]1912-the mill , and up to [the prison]2442-the prison ; all [the village]1888-the village sees the prison gate open in the darkness of the night , and swallow [him]1822-the tall man -- like this ! ” [He]1822-the tall man opened [his]1822-the tall man mouth as wide as [he]1822-the tall man could , and shut it with a sounding snap of [his]1822-the tall man teeth . Observant of [his]1822-the tall man unwillingness to mar the effect by opening it again , [Defarge]147-defarge said , “[148-jacques] Go on , [Jacques]148-jacques . ” “[148-jacques] All [the village]1888-the village , ” pursued [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , on tiptoe and in a low voice , “[148-jacques] withdraws ; all [the village]1888-the village whispers by [the fountain]1818-the fountain ; all [the village]1888-the village sleeps ; all [the village]1888-the village dreams of that unhappy one , within the locks and bars of [the prison on [the crag]1914-the crag]2084-the prison on the crag , and never to come out of it , except to perish . In the morning , with [my]0-i tools upon [my]0-i shoulder , eating [my]0-i morsel of black bread as [I]0-i go , [I]0-i make a circuit by [the prison]2442-the prison , on [my]0-i way to [my]0-i work . There [I]0-i see [him]148-jacques , high up , behind the bars of a lofty iron cage , bloody and dusty as last night , looking through . [He]148-jacques has no hand free , to wave to [me]0-i ; [I]0-i dare not call to [him]148-jacques ; [he]148-jacques regards [me]0-i like [a dead man]2452-a dead man . ” [Defarge]147-defarge and [the three]396-the three glanced darkly at [one another]411-one another . The looks of all of [them]396-the three were dark , repressed , and revengeful , as [they]396-the three listened to [the countryman]5881-the countryman ’s story ; the manner of all of [them]396-the three , while it was secret , was authoritative too . [They]396-the three had the air of [a rough tribunal]5910-a rough tribunal ; [Jacques]148-jacques One and Two sitting on the old pallet - bed , each with [his]148-jacques chin resting on [his]148-jacques hand , and [his]148-jacques eyes intent on [the road - mender]5911-the road - mender ; [Jacques Three]148-jacques , equally intent , on one knee behind [them]396-the three , with [his]148-jacques agitated hand always gliding over the network of fine nerves about [his]148-jacques mouth and nose ; [Defarge]147-defarge standing between [them]396-the three and [the narrator]5912-the narrator , whom [he]147-defarge had stationed in the light of the window , by turns looking from [him]147-defarge to [them]396-the three , and from [them]396-the three to [him]147-defarge . “[148-jacques] Go on , [Jacques]148-jacques , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge . “[148-jacques] [He]148-jacques remains up there in [his]148-jacques iron cage some days . [The village]1888-the village looks at [him]148-jacques by stealth , for it is afraid . But it always looks up , from a distance , at [the prison on [the crag]1914-the crag]2084-the prison on the crag ; and in the evening , when the work of the day is achieved and it assembles to gossip at [the fountain]1818-the fountain , all faces are turned towards [the prison]2442-the prison . Formerly , [they]2458-they were turned towards [the posting - house]1919-the posting - house ; now , [they]2458-they are turned towards [the prison]2442-the prison . [They]2458-they whisper at [the fountain]1818-the fountain , that although condemned to death [he]148-jacques will not be executed ; [they]2458-they say that petitions have been presented in [Paris]7-paris , showing that [he]148-jacques was enraged and made mad by the death of [[his]148-jacques child]5410-his child ; [they]2458-they say that a petition has been presented to [the King]4850-the king [himself]4850-the king . What do [I]0-i know ? It is possible . Perhaps yes , perhaps no . ” “[2458-they] Listen then , [Jacques]148-jacques , ” Number One of that name sternly interposed . “[148-jacques] Know that a petition was presented to [the King]4850-the king and [Queen]2465-queen . All here , [yourself]2466-yourself excepted , saw [the King]4850-the king take [it]2468-it , in [[his]4850-the king carriage]1793-his carriage in [the street]662-the street , sitting beside [the Queen]4989-the queen . It is [Defarge]147-defarge whom [you]2466-yourself see here , who , at the hazard of [his]147-defarge life , darted out before the horses , with the petition in [his]147-defarge hand . ” “[147-defarge] And once again listen , [Jacques]148-jacques ! ” said [the kneeling Number Three]5913-the kneeling number three : [his]147-defarge fingers ever wandering over and over those fine nerves , with a strikingly greedy air , as if [he]147-defarge hungered for something -- that was neither food nor drink ; “[340-the guard] [the guard]340-the guard , horse and foot , surrounded [the petitioner]2473-the petitioner , and struck [him]2473-the petitioner blows . [You]148-jacques hear ? ” “[148-jacques] [I]0-i hear , [messieurs]2399-messieurs . ” “[148-jacques] Go on then , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge . “[148-jacques] Again ; on the other hand , [they]2475-they whisper at [the fountain]1818-the fountain , ” resumed [the countryman]5881-the countryman , “[2475-they] that [he]2473-the petitioner is brought down into [[our]2477-our country]2478-our country to be executed on the spot , and that [he]2473-the petitioner will very certainly be executed . [They]2475-they even whisper that because [he]2473-the petitioner has slain [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur , and because [Monseigneur]188-monseigneur was [the father of [[his]188-monseigneur tenants]2480-his tenants]2479-the father of his tenants -- [serfs]2481-serfs -- what [you]2482-you will -- [he]2473-the petitioner will be executed as a parricide . [One old man]2483-one old man says at the fountain , that [his]2483-one old man right hand , armed with the knife , will be burnt off before [his]2483-one old man face ; that , into wounds which will be made in [his]2483-one old man arms , [his]2483-one old man breast , and [his]2483-one old man legs , there will be poured boiling oil , melted lead , hot resin , wax , and sulphur ; finally , that [he]2483-one old man will be torn limb from limb by four strong horses . [That old man]2484-that old man says , all this was actually done to [a prisoner who made an attempt on the life of [the late King]2486-the late king]2485-a prisoner who made an attempt on the life of the late king , [Louis Fifteen]213-louis fifteen . But how do [I]0-i know if [he]2485-a prisoner who made an attempt on the life of the late king lies ? [I]0-i am not [a scholar]2487-a scholar . ” “[0-i] Listen once again then , [Jacques]148-jacques ! ” said [the man with the restless hand and the craving air]5915-the man with the restless hand and the craving air . “[148-jacques] The name of [that prisoner]2488-that prisoner was [Damiens]214-damiens , and it was all done in open day , in [the open streets of [this city of [Paris]7-paris]2490-this city of paris]2489-the open streets of this city of paris ; and nothing was more noticed in the vast concourse that saw it done , than [the crowd of ladies of quality and fashion]2491-the crowd of ladies of quality and fashion , who were full of eager attention to the last -- to the last , [Jacques]148-jacques , prolonged until nightfall , when [he]2483-one old man had lost two legs and an arm , and still breathed ! And it was done -- why , how old are [you]148-jacques ? ” “[148-jacques] Thirty - five , ” said [the mender of [roads]2089-roads]1970-the mender of roads , who looked sixty . “[148-jacques] It was done when [you]148-jacques were more than ten years old ; [you]148-jacques might have seen it . ” “[148-jacques] Enough ! ” said [Defarge]147-defarge , with grim impatience . “[148-jacques] Long live [the Devil]5059-the devil ! Go on . ” “[5059-the devil] Well ! [Some]2119-some whisper this , some whisper that ; [they]2119-some speak of nothing else ; even the fountain appears to fall to that tune . At length , on Sunday night when all [the village]1888-the village is asleep , come [soldiers]1859-soldiers , winding down from [the prison]2442-the prison , and [their]1859-soldiers guns ring on the stones of [the little street]2150-the little street . [Workmen]2498-workmen dig , [workmen]2498-workmen hammer , [soldiers]1859-soldiers laugh and sing ; in the morning , by the fountain , there is raised a gallows forty feet high , poisoning the water . ” [The mender of [roads]2089-roads]1970-the mender of roads looked _ through _ rather than _ at _ the low ceiling , and pointed as if [he]1970-the mender of roads saw the gallows somewhere in the sky . “[2498-workmen] All work is stopped , [all assemble]2501-all assemble [there]4887-there , [nobody]356-nobody leads [the cows]2504-the cows out , the cows are there with [the rest]367-the rest . At midday , the roll of drums . [Soldiers]1859-soldiers have marched into [the prison]2442-the prison in the night , and [he]2508-he is in the midst of [many soldiers]2509-many soldiers . [He]2508-he is bound as before , and in [his]2508-he mouth there is a gag -- tied so , with a tight string , making [him]2508-he look almost as if [he]2508-he laughed . ” [He]2508-he suggested it , by creasing [his]2508-he face with [his]2508-he two thumbs , from the corners of [his]2508-he mouth to [his]2508-he ears . “[2399-messieurs] On the top of the gallows is fixed the knife , blade upwards , with its point in the air . [He]2508-he is hanged there forty feet high -- and is left hanging , poisoning the water . ” [They]5920-they looked at [one another]411-one another , as [he]2508-he used [his]2508-he blue cap to wipe [his]2508-he face , on which the perspiration had started afresh while [he]2508-he recalled the spectacle . “[2508-he] It is frightful , [messieurs]2399-messieurs . How can [the women]2092-the women and [the children]707-the children draw water ! Who can gossip of an evening , under that shadow ! Under it , have [I]0-i said ? When [I]0-i left [the village]1888-the village , Monday evening as the sun was going to bed , and looked back from [the hill]375-the hill , the shadow struck across [the church]1900-the church , across [the mill]1912-the mill , across [the prison]2442-the prison -- seemed to strike across the earth , [messieurs]2399-messieurs , to where the sky rests upon it ! ” [The hungry man]5922-the hungry man gnawed one of [his]5922-the hungry man fingers as [he]5922-the hungry man looked at [the other three]5923-the other three , and [his]5922-the hungry man finger quivered with the craving that was on [him]5922-the hungry man . “[2399-messieurs] That ’s all , [messieurs]2399-messieurs . [I]0-i left at sunset ( as [I]0-i had been warned to do ) , and [I]0-i walked on , that night and half next day , until [I]0-i met ( as [I]0-i was warned [I]0-i should ) [this comrade]2520-this comrade . With [him]2520-this comrade , [I]0-i came on , now riding and now walking , through the rest of yesterday and through last night . And here [you]2399-messieurs see [me]0-i ! ” After a gloomy silence , the first [Jacques]148-jacques said , “[2399-messieurs] Good ! [You]2399-messieurs have acted and recounted faithfully . Will [you]2399-messieurs wait for [us]2521-us a little , outside the door ? ” “[2399-messieurs] Very willingly , ” said [the mender of [roads]2089-roads]1970-the mender of roads . Whom [Defarge]147-defarge escorted to the top of the stairs , and , leaving seated there , returned . [The three]396-the three had risen , and [their]396-the three heads were together when [he]147-defarge came back to [the garret]844-the garret . “[2399-messieurs] How say [you]2399-messieurs , [Jacques]148-jacques ? ” demanded [Number One]215-number one . “[2399-messieurs] To be registered ? ” “[2399-messieurs] To be registered , as doomed to destruction , ” returned [Defarge]147-defarge . “[2399-messieurs] Magnificent ! ” croaked [the man with the craving]5928-the man with the craving . “[2399-messieurs] [The chateau]2016-the chateau , and all the race ? ” inquired [the first]1574-the first . “[2399-messieurs] [The chateau]2016-the chateau and all the race , ” returned [Defarge]147-defarge . “[2399-messieurs] Extermination . ” [The hungry man]5922-the hungry man repeated , in a rapturous croak , “[2399-messieurs] Magnificent ! ” and began gnawing another finger . “[2399-messieurs] Are [you]2399-messieurs sure , ” asked [Jacques Two]210-jacques two , of [Defarge]147-defarge , “[2399-messieurs] that no embarrassment can arise from [our]2524-our manner of keeping the register ? Without doubt it is safe , for [no one beyond [ourselves]2524-our]2525-no one beyond ourselves can decipher it ; but shall [we]2524-our always be able to decipher it -- or , [I]0-i ought to say , will [she]2526-she ? ” “[148-jacques] [Jacques]148-jacques , ” returned [Defarge]147-defarge , drawing [himself]147-defarge up , “[148-jacques] if [madame]146-madame defarge [[my]0-i wife]5044-my wife undertook to keep the register in [her]5044-my wife memory alone , [she]5044-my wife would not lose a word of it -- not a syllable of it . Knitted , in [her]5044-my wife own stitches and [her]5044-my wife own symbols , it will always be as plain to [her]5044-my wife as the sun . Confide in [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge . It would be easier for [the weakest poltroon that lives]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives , to erase [himself]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives from existence , than to erase one letter of [his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives name or crimes from the knitted register of [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge . ” There was a murmur of confidence and approval , and then [the man who hungered]5931-the man who hungered , asked : “[146-madame defarge] Is this rustic to be sent back soon ? [I]0-i hope so . [He]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives is very simple ; is [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives not a little dangerous ? ” “[2528-the weakest poltroon that lives] [He]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives knows nothing , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge ; “[2528-the weakest poltroon that lives] at least nothing more than would easily elevate [himself]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives to a gallows of the same height . [I]0-i charge [myself]0-i with [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives ; let [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives remain with [me]0-i ; [I]0-i will take care of [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives , and set [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives on [[his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives road]2529-his road . [He]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives wishes to see the fine world -- [the King]4850-the king , [the Queen]4989-the queen , and Court ; let [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives see them on Sunday . ” “[2528-the weakest poltroon that lives] What ? ” exclaimed [the hungry man]5922-the hungry man , staring . “[2528-the weakest poltroon that lives] Is it a good sign , that [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives wishes to see [Royalty]2532-royalty and [Nobility]5521-nobility ? ” “[148-jacques] [Jacques]148-jacques , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge ; “[148-jacques] judiciously show a cat milk , if [you]148-jacques wish [her]2534-her to thirst for it . Judiciously show a dog [his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives natural prey , if [you]148-jacques wish [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives to bring it down one day . ” Nothing more was said , and [the mender of roads , being found already dozing on the topmost stair]5933-the mender of roads , being found already dozing on the topmost stair , was advised to lay [himself]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives down on the pallet - bed and take some rest . [He]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives needed no persuasion , and was soon asleep . [Worse quarters than [Defarge]147-defarge ’s wine - shop]5934-worse quarters than defarge ’s wine - shop , could easily have been found in [Paris]7-paris for [a provincial slave of that degree]5935-a provincial slave of that degree . Saving for a mysterious dread of madame by which [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives was constantly haunted , [his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives life was very new and agreeable . But , [madame]5936-madame sat all day at [her]5936-madame counter , so expressly unconscious of [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives , and so particularly determined not to perceive that [his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives being there had any connection with anything below the surface , that [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives shook in [his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives wooden shoes whenever [his]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives eye lighted on [her]5936-madame . For , [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives contended with [himself]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives that it was impossible to foresee what [that lady]1588-that lady might pretend next ; and [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives felt assured that if [she]5936-madame should take it into [her]5936-madame brightly ornamented head to pretend that [she]5936-madame had seen [him]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives do a murder and afterwards flay [the victim]5938-the victim , [she]5936-madame would infallibly go through with it until the play was played out . Therefore , when Sunday came , [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads was not enchanted ( though [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives said [he]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives was ) to find that [madame]5936-madame was to accompany [monsieur]5071-monsieur and [himself]2528-the weakest poltroon that lives to [Versailles]75-versailles . It was additionally disconcerting to have [madame]5936-madame knitting all the way there , in a public conveyance ; it was additionally disconcerting yet , to have [madame]5936-madame in [the crowd]1386-the crowd in the afternoon , still with [her]5936-madame knitting in [her]5936-madame hands as [the crowd]1386-the crowd waited to see [the carriage]917-the carriage of [the King]4850-the king and [Queen]2465-queen . “[2535-you] [You]2535-you work hard , [madame]5936-madame , ” said [a man near [her]5936-madame]5948-a man near her . “[5936-madame] Yes , ” answered [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge ; “[0-i] [I]0-i have a good deal to do . ” “[0-i] What do [you]0-i make , [madame]5936-madame ? ” “[0-i] Many things . ” “[0-i] For instance-- ” “[0-i] For instance , ” returned [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , composedly , “[0-i] shrouds . ” [The man]472-the man moved a little further away , as soon as [he]472-the man could , and [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads fanned [himself]1970-the mender of roads with [his]1970-the mender of roads blue cap : feeling it mightily close and oppressive . If [he]1970-the mender of roads needed [a King]1454-a king and [Queen]2465-queen to restore [him]1970-the mender of roads , [he]1970-the mender of roads was fortunate in having [his]1970-the mender of roads remedy at hand ; for , soon [the large - faced King]5953-the large - faced king and [the fair - faced Queen]5954-the fair - faced queen came in [[their]5955-their golden coach]5956-their golden coach , attended by the shining Bull ’s Eye of [[their]5955-their Court]5957-their court , a glittering multitude of [laughing ladies]5958-laughing ladies and [fine lords]5959-fine lords ; and in jewels and silks and powder and splendour and elegantly spurning figures and handsomely disdainful faces of [both sexes]5960-both sexes , [the mender of [roads]2089-roads]1970-the mender of roads bathed [himself]1970-the mender of roads , so much to [his]1970-the mender of roads temporary intoxication , that [he]1970-the mender of roads cried Long live [the King]4850-the king , Long live [the Queen]4989-the queen , Long live [everybody]1759-everybody and everything ! as if [he]1970-the mender of roads had never heard of [ubiquitous Jacques]148-jacques in [his]1970-the mender of roads time . Then , there were [gardens]5966-gardens , [courtyards]5967-courtyards , [terraces]5968-terraces , fountains , green banks , [more King]5969-more king and [Queen]2465-queen , more Bull ’s Eye , more [lords]5971-lords and [ladies]5972-ladies , more Long live [they]5973-they all ! until [he]1970-the mender of roads absolutely wept with sentiment . During the whole of this scene , which lasted some three hours , [he]1970-the mender of roads had plenty of shouting and weeping and sentimental company , and throughout [Defarge]146-madame defarge held [him]1970-the mender of roads by the collar , as if to restrain [him]1970-the mender of roads from flying at the objects of [his]1970-the mender of roads brief devotion and tearing them to pieces . “[216-bravo] [Bravo]216-bravo ! ” said [Defarge]146-madame defarge , clapping [him]1970-the mender of roads on the back when it was over , like [a patron]5974-a patron ; “[216-bravo] [you]216-bravo are [a good boy]2538-a good boy ! ” [The mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads was now coming to [himself]1970-the mender of roads , and was mistrustful of having made a mistake in [his]1970-the mender of roads late demonstrations ; but no . “[2538-a good boy] [You]216-bravo are [the fellow [we]2540-we want]2539-the fellow we want , ” said [Defarge]146-madame defarge , in [his]1970-the mender of roads ear ; “[216-bravo] [you]216-bravo make [these fools]2541-these fools believe that it will last for ever . Then , [they]2541-these fools are the more insolent , and it is the nearer ended . ” “[2541-these fools] Hey ! ” cried [the mender of roads]1970-the mender of roads , reflectively ; “[2541-these fools] that ’s true . ” “[2541-these fools] [These fools]2541-these fools know nothing . While [they]2541-these fools despise [your]216-bravo breath , and would stop it for ever and ever , in [you]216-bravo or in a hundred like [you]216-bravo rather than in one of [their]2541-these fools own horses or dogs , [they]2541-these fools only know what [your]216-bravo breath tells [them]2541-these fools . Let it deceive [them]2541-these fools , then , a little longer ; it can not deceive [them]2541-these fools too much . ” [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge looked superciliously at [the client]5977-the client , and nodded in confirmation . “[216-bravo] As to [you]216-bravo , ” said [she]146-madame defarge , “[216-bravo] [you]216-bravo would shout and shed tears for anything , if it made a show and a noise . Say ! Would [you]216-bravo not ? ” “[216-bravo] Truly , [madame]5936-madame , [I]0-i think so . For the moment . ” “[0-i] If [you]216-bravo were shown a great heap of dolls , and were set upon [them]2544-them to pluck them to pieces and despoil them for [your]216-bravo own advantage , [you]216-bravo would pick out the richest and gayest . Say ! Would [you]216-bravo not ? ” “[5936-madame] Truly yes , [madame]5936-madame . ” “[5936-madame] Yes . And if [you]216-bravo were shown a flock of birds , unable to fly , and were set upon [them]2544-them to strip [them]2544-them of [their]2544-them feathers for [your]216-bravo own advantage , [you]216-bravo would set upon the birds of the finest feathers ; would [you]216-bravo not ? ” “[5936-madame] It is true , [madame]5936-madame . ” “[5936-madame] [You]216-bravo have seen both dolls and birds to - day , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , with a wave of [her]146-madame defarge hand towards the place where [they]5978-they had last been apparent ; “[5936-madame] now , go [home]858-home ! ” [CHAPTER XVI]217-chapter xvi . Still [Knitting Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge and monsieur [[her]146-madame defarge husband]770-her husband returned amicably to [the bosom of [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine]5980-the bosom of saint antoine , while a speck in a blue cap toiled through the darkness , and through the dust , and down [the weary miles of avenue]5981-the weary miles of avenue by the wayside , slowly tending towards that point of the compass where [the chateau of [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis , now in [his]193-monsieur the marquis grave]5982-the chateau of monsieur the marquis , now in his grave , listened to the whispering trees . Such ample leisure had the stone faces , now , for listening to the trees and to the fountain , that [the few village scarecrows who , in [their]5983-the few village scarecrows who , in their quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase [quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn]5984-quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of [the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase]5985-the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase]5983-the few village scarecrows who , in their quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase , had it borne in upon [their]5983-the few village scarecrows who , in their quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase starved fancy that the expression of the faces was altered . A rumour just lived in [the village]1888-the village -- had a faint and bare existence [there]4887-there , as [[its]1888-the village people]5988-its people had -- that when the knife struck [home]858-home , the faces changed , from faces of pride to faces of anger and pain ; also , that when [that dangling figure]5990-that dangling figure was hauled up forty feet above the fountain , [they]5983-the few village scarecrows who , in their quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase changed again , and bore a cruel look of being avenged , which [they]5983-the few village scarecrows who , in their quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase would henceforth bear for ever . In the stone face over the great window of the bed - chamber where the murder was done , two fine dints were pointed out in the sculptured nose , which [everybody]1759-everybody recognised , and which [nobody]356-nobody had seen of old ; and on the scarce occasions when [two or three ragged peasants]5993-two or three ragged peasants emerged from [the crowd]1386-the crowd to take a hurried peep at [Monsieur the Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis petrified , a skinny finger would not have pointed to it for a minute , before [they]5983-the few village scarecrows who , in their quest for herbs to eat and fragments of dead stick to burn , strayed within sight of the great stone courtyard and terrace staircase all started away among the moss and leaves , like [the more fortunate hares who could find a living there]5995-the more fortunate hares who could find a living there . [Chateau]76-chateau and [hut]5996-hut , stone face and dangling figure , the red stain on the stone floor , and the pure water in [the village]1888-the village well -- thousands of [acres of land]5998-acres of land -- [a whole province of France]5999-a whole province of france -- [all France]1682-all france itself -- lay under the night sky , concentrated into a faint hair - breadth line . So does a whole world , with all [its]5999-a whole province of france greatnesses and littlenesses , lie in a twinkling star . And as mere human knowledge can split a ray of light and analyse the manner of its composition , so , [sublimer intelligences]6001-sublimer intelligences may read in the feeble shining of [this earth of [ours]6003-ours]6002-this earth of ours , every thought and act , every vice and virtue , of [every responsible creature on it]6004-every responsible creature on it . [The Defarges]218-the defarges , [husband]6005-husband and [wife]6006-wife , came lumbering under the starlight , in [[their]218-the defarges public vehicle]6007-their public vehicle , to that gate of [Paris]7-paris whereunto [their]218-the defarges journey naturally tended . There was the usual stoppage at [the barrier guardhouse]6008-the barrier guardhouse , and the usual lanterns came glancing forth for the usual examination and inquiry . [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge alighted ; knowing [one or two of [the soldiery there]6010-the soldiery there]6009-one or two of the soldiery there , and [one of [the police]6012-the police]6011-one of the police . The latter [he]147-defarge was intimate with , and affectionately embraced . When [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine had again enfolded [the Defarges]218-the defarges in [his]144-saint antoine dusky wings , and [they]218-the defarges , having finally alighted near [the Saint ’s boundaries]6013-the saint ’s boundaries , were picking [their]218-the defarges way on foot through the black mud and offal of [[his]144-saint antoine streets]5862-his streets , [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge spoke to [[her]146-madame defarge husband]770-her husband : “[492-my friend] Say then , [[my]0-i friend]492-my friend ; what did [[Jacques]148-jacques of [the police]6012-the police]2549-jacques of the police tell [thee]492-my friend ? ” “[148-jacques] Very little to - night , but all [he]148-jacques knows . There is [another spy commissioned for [[our]2552-our quarter]2553-our quarter]2551-another spy commissioned for our quarter . There may be many more , for all that [he]148-jacques can say , but [he]148-jacques knows of one . ” “[148-jacques] Eh well ! ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , raising [her]146-madame defarge eyebrows with a cool business air . “[148-jacques] It is necessary to register [him]148-jacques . How do [they]2554-they call [that man]2555-that man ? ” “[148-jacques] [He]148-jacques is English . ” “[148-jacques] So much the better . [His]148-jacques name ? ” “[167-barsad] [Barsad]167-barsad , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge , making it French by pronunciation . But , [he]147-defarge had been so careful to get it accurately , that [he]147-defarge then spelt it with perfect correctness . “[167-barsad] Barsad , ” repeated [madame]5936-madame . “[167-barsad] Good . Christian name ? ” “[167-barsad] [John]167-barsad . ” “[167-barsad] [John Barsad]167-barsad , ” repeated [madame]5936-madame , after murmuring it once to [herself]5936-madame . “[167-barsad] Good . [His]148-jacques appearance ; is it known ? ” “[148-jacques] Age , about forty years ; height , about five feet nine ; black hair ; complexion dark ; generally , rather handsome visage ; eyes dark , face thin , long , and sallow ; nose aquiline , but not straight , having a peculiar inclination towards the left cheek ; expression , therefore , sinister . ” “[1834-the men] Eh [my]0-i faith . It is a portrait ! ” said [madame]5936-madame , laughing . “[148-jacques] [He]148-jacques shall be registered to - morrow . ” [They]6019-they turned into [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop , which was closed ( for it was midnight ) , and where [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge immediately took [her]146-madame defarge post at [her]146-madame defarge desk , counted the small moneys that had been taken during [her]146-madame defarge absence , examined the stock , went through the entries in the book , made other entries of [her]146-madame defarge own , checked [the serving man]6021-the serving man in every possible way , and finally dismissed [him]6021-the serving man to bed . Then [she]146-madame defarge turned out the contents of the bowl of money for the second time , and began knotting them up in [her]146-madame defarge handkerchief , in a chain of separate knots , for safe keeping through the night . All this while , [Defarge]147-defarge , with [his]147-defarge pipe in [his]147-defarge mouth , walked up and down , complacently admiring , but never interfering ; in which condition , indeed , as to the business and [his]147-defarge domestic affairs , [he]147-defarge walked up and down through life . The night was hot , and [the shop]771-the shop , close shut and surrounded by so foul a neighbourhood , was ill - smelling . [Monsieur Defarge]147-defarge ’s olfactory sense was by no means delicate , but the stock of wine smelt much stronger than it ever tasted , and so did the stock of rum and brandy and aniseed . [He]147-defarge whiffed the compound of scents away , as [he]147-defarge put down [his]147-defarge smoked - out pipe . “[148-jacques] [You]2556-you are fatigued , ” said [madame]5936-madame , raising [her]5936-madame glance as [she]5936-madame knotted the money . “[2556-you] There are only the usual odours . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am a little tired , ” [[her]5936-madame husband]770-her husband acknowledged . “[0-i] [You]2556-you are a little depressed , too , ” said [madame]5936-madame , whose quick eyes had never been so intent on the accounts , but [they]6026-they had had a ray or two for [him]147-defarge . “[2556-you] Oh , [the men]1834-the men , [the men]1834-the men ! ” “[1834-the men] But [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear ! ” began [Defarge]147-defarge . “[1834-the men] But [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear ! ” repeated [madame]5936-madame , nodding firmly ; “[1834-the men] but [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear ! [You]5097-my dear are faint of heart to - night , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear ! ” “[5097-my dear] Well , then , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge , as if a thought were wrung out of [his]147-defarge breast , “[5097-my dear] it _ is _ a long time . ” “[5097-my dear] It is a long time , ” repeated [[his]147-defarge wife]4987-his wife ; “[5097-my dear] and when is it not a long time ? Vengeance and retribution require a long time ; it is the rule . ” “[5097-my dear] It does not take a long time to strike [a man with Lightning]2563-a man with lightning , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge . “[5097-my dear] How long , ” demanded [madame]5936-madame , composedly , “[5097-my dear] does it take to make and store the lightning ? Tell [me]0-i . ” [Defarge]147-defarge raised [his]147-defarge head thoughtfully , as if there were something in that too . “[5097-my dear] It does not take a long time , ” said [madame]5936-madame , “[5097-my dear] for an earthquake to swallow [a town]2564-a town . Eh well ! Tell [me]0-i how long it takes to prepare the earthquake ? ” “[0-i] A long time , [I]0-i suppose , ” said [Defarge]147-defarge . “[0-i] But when it is ready , it takes place , and grinds to pieces everything before it . In the meantime , it is always preparing , though it is not seen or heard . That is [your]0-i consolation . Keep it . ” [She]5936-madame tied a knot with flashing eyes , as if it throttled [a foe]6031-a foe . “[0-i] [I]0-i tell [thee]0-i , ” said [madame]5936-madame , extending [her]5936-madame right hand , for emphasis , “[0-i] that although it is a long time on [the road]377-the road , it is on [the road]377-the road and coming . [I]0-i tell [thee]0-i it never retreats , and never stops . [I]0-i tell [thee]0-i it is always advancing . Look around and consider the lives of all [the world]519-the world that [we]2568-we know , consider the faces of all [the world]519-the world that [we]2568-we know , consider the rage and discontent to which [the Jacquerie]219-the jacquerie addresses itself with more and more of certainty every hour . Can such things last ? Bah ! [I]0-i mock [you]0-i . ” “[0-i] [[My]0-i brave wife]2570-my brave wife , ” returned [Defarge]147-defarge , standing before [her]2570-my brave wife with [his]0-i head a little bent , and [his]0-i hands clasped at [his]0-i back , like [a docile and attentive pupil before [his]0-i catechist]6033-a docile and attentive pupil before his catechist , “[0-i] [I]0-i do not question all this . But it has lasted a long time , and it is possible -- [you]2570-my brave wife know well , [[my]0-i wife]5044-my wife , it is possible -- that it may not come , during [our]2568-we lives . ” “[5044-my wife] Eh well ! How then ? ” demanded [madame]5936-madame , tying another knot , as if there were [another enemy strangled]6035-another enemy strangled . “[5044-my wife] Well ! ” said [Defarge]147-defarge , with a half complaining and half apologetic shrug . “[2568-we] [We]2568-we shall not see the triumph . ” “[2568-we] [We]2568-we shall have helped it , ” returned [madame]5936-madame , with [her]5936-madame extended hand in strong action . “[2568-we] Nothing that [we]2568-we do , is done in vain . [I]0-i believe , with all [my]0-i soul , that [we]2568-we shall see the triumph . But even if not , even if [I]0-i knew certainly not , show [me]0-i the neck of [an aristocrat]2572-an aristocrat and [tyrant]2573-tyrant , and still [I]0-i would-- ” Then madame , with [her]5936-madame teeth set , tied a very terrible knot indeed . “[0-i] Hold ! ” cried [Defarge]147-defarge , reddening a little as if [he]147-defarge felt charged with cowardice ; “[0-i] [I]0-i too , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear , will stop at nothing . ” “[0-i] Yes ! But it is [your]5097-my dear weakness that [you]5097-my dear sometimes need to see [[your]5097-my dear victim]2575-your victim and [your]5097-my dear opportunity , to sustain [you]5097-my dear . Sustain [yourself]5097-my dear without that . When the time comes , let loose a tiger and [a devil]2576-a devil ; but wait for the time with the tiger and [the devil]5059-the devil chained -- not shown -- yet always ready . ” [Madame]146-madame defarge enforced the conclusion of this piece of advice by striking [her]146-madame defarge little counter with [her]146-madame defarge chain of money as if [she]146-madame defarge knocked its brains out , and then gathering the heavy handkerchief under [her]146-madame defarge arm in a serene manner , and observing that it was time to go to bed . Next noontide saw [the admirable woman in [her]6037-the admirable woman in her usual place in the wine - shop usual place in [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop]6037-the admirable woman in her usual place in the wine - shop , knitting away assiduously . A rose lay beside [her]6037-the admirable woman in her usual place in the wine - shop , and if [she]6037-the admirable woman in her usual place in the wine - shop now and then glanced at the flower , it was with no infraction of [her]6037-the admirable woman in her usual place in the wine - shop usual preoccupied air . There were [a few customers]6039-a few customers , drinking or not drinking , standing or seated , sprinkled about . The day was very hot , and heaps of flies , who were extending [their]6039-a few customers inquisitive and adventurous perquisitions into all the glutinous little glasses near [madame]5936-madame , fell dead at the bottom . [Their]6039-a few customers decease made no impression on the other flies out promenading , who looked at [them]6039-a few customers in the coolest manner ( as if [they]6039-a few customers [themselves]6039-a few customers were elephants , or something as far removed ) , until [they]6039-a few customers met the same fate . Curious to consider how heedless flies are!--perhaps [they]6039-a few customers thought as much at [Court]77-court that sunny summer day . [A figure entering at the door]6041-a figure entering at the door threw a shadow on [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge which [she]6037-the admirable woman in her usual place in the wine - shop felt to be a new one . That is all [I]0-i know . ” “[224-destiny] But it is very strange -- now , at least , is it not very strange”--said [Defarge]146-madame defarge , rather pleading with [[his]770-her husband wife]4987-his wife to induce [her]4987-his wife to admit it , “[224-destiny] that , after all [our]2629-we sympathy for [Monsieur]2632-monsieur [[her]223-ma’amselle manette father]5008-her father , and [herself]223-ma’amselle manette , [[her]223-ma’amselle manette husband]770-her husband ’s name should be proscribed under [your]0-i hand at this moment , by the side of that infernal dog ’s who has just left [us]2629-we ? ” “[0-i] Stranger things than that will happen when it does come , ” answered [madame]5936-madame . “[0-i] [I]0-i have [them]2635-they both here , of a certainty ; and [they]2635-they are both here for [their]2635-they merits ; that is enough . ” [She]5936-madame rolled up [her]5936-madame knitting when [she]5936-madame had said those words , and presently took the rose out of the handkerchief that was wound about [her]5936-madame head . Either [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine had an instinctive sense that the objectionable decoration was gone , or [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine was on the watch for its disappearance ; howbeit , [the Saint]6097-the saint took courage to lounge in , very shortly afterwards , and [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop recovered its habitual aspect . In the evening , at which season of all others [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine turned [himself]144-saint antoine inside out , and sat on door - steps and window - ledges , and came to the corners of [vile streets]6099-vile streets and [courts]6100-courts , for a breath of air , [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge with [her]146-madame defarge work in [her]146-madame defarge hand was accustomed to pass from place to place and from group to group : a Missionary -- there were many like [her]146-madame defarge -- such as [the world]519-the world will do well never to breed again . [All the women]6102-all the women knitted . [They]2635-they knitted worthless things ; but , the mechanical work was a mechanical substitute for eating and drinking ; the hands moved for the jaws and the digestive apparatus : if the bony fingers had been still , the stomachs would have been more famine - pinched . But , as the fingers went , the eyes went , and the thoughts . And as [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge moved on from [group]6103-group to [group]6103-group , [all three]395-all three went quicker and fiercer among [every little knot of women that [she]146-madame defarge had spoken with]6106-every little knot of women that she had spoken with , and left behind . [[Her]146-madame defarge husband]770-her husband smoked at [his]770-her husband door , looking after [her]146-madame defarge with admiration . “[2636-a great woman] [A great woman]2636-a great woman , ” said [he]770-her husband , “[2637-a strong woman] [a strong woman]2637-a strong woman , [a grand woman]2638-a grand woman , [a frightfully grand woman]2639-a frightfully grand woman ! ” Darkness closed around , and then came the ringing of church bells and the distant beating of the military drums in [the Palace Courtyard]6108-the palace courtyard , as [the women]2092-the women sat knitting , knitting . Darkness encompassed [them]2092-the women . Another darkness was closing in as surely , when the church bells , then ringing pleasantly in [many an airy steeple over [France]2-france]6110-many an airy steeple over france , should be melted into thundering cannon ; when the military drums should be beating to drown a wretched voice , that night all potent as the voice of Power and Plenty , Freedom and Life . So much was closing in about [the women who sat knitting , knitting]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting , that [they]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting [[their]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting very selves]6112-their very selves were closing in around a structure yet unbuilt , where [they]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting were to sit knitting , knitting , counting dropping heads . CHAPTER XVII . One Night Never did the sun go down with a brighter glory on [the quiet corner in [Soho]58-soho]2184-the quiet corner in soho , than one memorable evening when [the Doctor]1514-the doctor and [[his]1514-the doctor daughter]889-his daughter sat under the plane - tree together . Never did the moon rise with a milder radiance over great [London]3-london , than on that night when it found [them]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting still seated under the tree , and shone upon [their]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting faces through its leaves . [Lucie]174-lucie was to be married to - morrow . [She]174-lucie had reserved this last evening for [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father , and [they]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting sat alone under the plane - tree . “[2639-a frightfully grand woman] [You]2640-you are happy , [[my]0-i dear father]2641-my dear father ? ” “[2640-you] Quite , [[my]0-i child]2642-my child . ” [They]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting had said little , though [they]6111-the women who sat knitting , knitting had been there a long time . When it was yet light enough to work and read , [she]174-lucie had neither engaged [herself]174-lucie in [her]174-lucie usual work , nor had [she]174-lucie read to [him]5008-her father . [She]174-lucie had employed [herself]174-lucie in both ways , at [his]5008-her father side under the tree , many and many a time ; but , this time was not quite like any other , and nothing could make it so . “[2640-you] And [I]0-i am very happy to - night , [dear father]2643-dear father . [I]0-i am deeply happy in the love that [Heaven]225-heaven has so blessed -- [my]0-i love for [Charles]162-darnay , and [Charles]162-darnay ’s love for [me]0-i . But , if [my]0-i life were not to be still consecrated to [you]2643-dear father , or if [my]0-i marriage were so arranged as that it would part [us]2644-us , even by the length of [a few of [these streets]2646-these streets]2645-a few of these streets , [I]0-i should be more unhappy and self - reproachful now than [I]0-i can tell [you]2643-dear father . Even as it is-- ” Even as it was , [she]2643-dear father could not command [her]2643-dear father voice . In the sad moonlight , [she]2643-dear father clasped [him]2643-dear father by the neck , and laid [her]2643-dear father face upon [his]2643-dear father breast . In the moonlight which is always sad , as the light of the sun itself is -- as the light called human life is -- at its coming and its going . “[5101-dearest dear] [Dearest dear]5101-dearest dear ! Can [you]2643-dear father tell [me]0-i , this last time , that [you]2643-dear father feel quite , quite sure , no new affections of [mine]0-i , and no new duties of [mine]0-i , will ever interpose between [us]2644-us ? _ [I]0-i _ know it well , but do [you]2643-dear father know it ? In [your]2643-dear father own heart , do [you]2643-dear father feel quite certain ? ” [[Her]174-lucie father]5008-her father answered , with a cheerful firmness of conviction [he]0-i could scarcely have assumed , “[2643-dear father] Quite sure , [[my]0-i darling]2648-my darling ! More than that , ” [he]0-i added , as [he]0-i tenderly kissed [her]174-lucie : “[174-lucie] [my]0-i future is far brighter , [Lucie]174-lucie , seen through [your]174-lucie marriage , than it could have been -- nay , than it ever was -- without it . ” “[2649-my father!--] If [I]0-i could hope _ that _ , [[my]0-i father!--]2649-my father!-- ” “[2649-my father!--] Believe it , love ! Indeed it is so . Consider how natural and how plain it is , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear , that it should be so . [You]2643-dear father , devoted and young , can not fully appreciate the anxiety [I]0-i have felt that [your]2643-dear father life should not be wasted-- ” [She]174-lucie moved [her]174-lucie hand towards [his]0-i lips , but [he]0-i took it in [his]0-i , and repeated the word . “[2642-my child] --wasted , [[my]0-i child]2642-my child -- should not be wasted , struck aside from the natural order of things -- for [my]0-i sake . [Your]2643-dear father unselfishness can not entirely comprehend how much [my]0-i mind has gone on this ; but , only ask [yourself]2643-dear father , how could [my]0-i happiness be perfect , while [yours]2643-dear father was incomplete ? ” “[2643-dear father] If [I]0-i had never seen [Charles]162-darnay , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , [I]0-i should have been quite happy with [you]2643-dear father . ” [He]0-i smiled at [her]2642-my child unconscious admission that [she]2642-my child would have been unhappy without [Charles]162-darnay , having seen [him]162-darnay ; and replied : “[0-i] [[My]0-i child]2642-my child , [you]2642-my child did see [him]162-darnay , and it is [Charles]162-darnay . If it had not been [Charles]162-darnay , it would have been another . Or , if it had been no other , [I]0-i should have been the cause , and then the dark part of [my]0-i life would have cast its shadow beyond [myself]0-i , and would have fallen on [you]2642-my child . ” It was the first time , except at the trial , of [her]2642-my child ever hearing [him]0-i refer to the period of [his]0-i suffering . It gave [her]2642-my child a strange and new sensation while [his]0-i words were in [her]2642-my child ears ; and [she]2642-my child remembered it long afterwards . “[2642-my child] See ! ” said [the Doctor of [Beauvais]25-beauvais]4994-the doctor of beauvais , raising [his]0-i hand towards the moon . “[2642-my child] [I]0-i have looked at [her]2642-my child from [[my]0-i prison]2654-my prison - window , when [I]0-i could not bear [her]2642-my child light . [I]0-i have looked at [her]2642-my child when it has been such torture to [me]0-i to think of [her]2642-my child shining upon what [I]0-i had lost , that [I]0-i have beaten [my]0-i head against [my]0-i prison - walls . [I]0-i have looked at [her]2642-my child , in a state so dull and lethargic , that [I]0-i have thought of nothing but the number of horizontal lines [I]0-i could draw across [her]2642-my child at the full , and the number of perpendicular lines with which [I]0-i could intersect them . ” [He]0-i added in [his]0-i inward and pondering manner , as [he]0-i looked at the moon , “[2642-my child] It was twenty either way , [I]0-i remember , and the twentieth was difficult to squeeze in . ” The strange thrill with which [she]2642-my child heard [him]0-i go back to that time , deepened as [he]0-i dwelt upon it ; but , there was nothing to shock [her]2642-my child in the manner of [his]0-i reference . [He]0-i only seemed to contrast [his]0-i present cheerfulness and felicity with the dire endurance that was over . “[0-i] [I]0-i have looked at [her]2642-my child , speculating thousands of times upon [the unborn child from whom [I]0-i had been rent]2655-the unborn child from whom i had been rent . Whether it was alive . Whether [it]2655-the unborn child from whom i had been rent had been born alive , or [the poor mother]2656-the poor mother ’s shock had killed [it]2655-the unborn child from whom i had been rent . Whether it was [a son who would some day avenge [[his]2657-a son who would some day avenge his father father]1015-his father]2657-a son who would some day avenge his father . ( There was a time in [my]0-i imprisonment , when [my]0-i desire for vengeance was unbearable . ) Whether it was [a son who would never know [[his]2657-a son who would some day avenge his father father]1015-his father ’s story ; who might even live to weigh the possibility of [[his]2657-a son who would some day avenge his father father]1015-his father ’s having disappeared of [his]2657-a son who would some day avenge his father own will and act]2659-a son who would never know his father ’s story ; who might even live to weigh the possibility of his father ’s having disappeared of his own will and act . Whether it was [a daughter who would grow to be]2662-a daughter who would grow to be [a woman]1959-a woman . ” [She]2662-a daughter who would grow to be drew closer to [him]0-i , and kissed [his]0-i cheek and [his]0-i hand . “[0-i] [I]0-i have pictured [[my]0-i daughter]5576-my daughter , to [myself]0-i , as perfectly forgetful of [me]0-i -- rather , altogether ignorant of [me]0-i , and unconscious of [me]0-i . [I]0-i have cast up the years of [her]5576-my daughter age , year after year . [I]0-i have seen [her]5576-my daughter married to [a man who knew nothing of [my]0-i fate]2665-a man who knew nothing of my fate . [I]0-i have altogether perished from the remembrance of the living , and in the next generation [my]0-i place was a blank . ” “[4969-my father] [[My]0-i father]4969-my father ! Even to hear that [you]4969-my father had such thoughts of [a daughter who never existed]2667-a daughter who never existed , strikes to [my]0-i heart as if [I]0-i had been [that child]2668-that child . ” “[4969-my father] [You]4969-my father , [Lucie]174-lucie ? It is out of the Consolation and restoration [you]4969-my father have brought to [me]0-i , that these remembrances arise , and pass between [us]2669-us and the moon on this last night.--What did [I]0-i say just now ? ” “[0-i] [She]5576-my daughter knew nothing of [you]4969-my father . [She]5576-my daughter cared nothing for [you]4969-my father . ” “[5576-my daughter] So ! But on other moonlight nights , when the sadness and the silence have touched [me]0-i in a different way -- have affected [me]0-i with something as like a sorrowful sense of peace , as any emotion that had pain for its foundations could -- [I]0-i have imagined [her]5576-my daughter as coming to [me]0-i in [[my]0-i cell]2670-my cell , and leading [me]0-i out into the freedom beyond [the fortress]2671-the fortress . [I]0-i have seen [her]5576-my daughter image in the moonlight often , as [I]0-i now see [you]4969-my father ; except that [I]0-i never held [her]5576-my daughter in [my]0-i arms ; it stood between the little grated window and the door . But , [you]4969-my father understand that that was not [the child [I]0-i am speaking of]2672-the child i am speaking of ? ” “[6042-the figure] [The figure]6042-the figure was not ; the -- the -- image ; the fancy ? ” “[6042-the figure] No . That was another thing . It stood before [my]0-i disturbed sense of sight , but it never moved . The phantom that [my]0-i mind pursued , was [another and more real child]2674-another and more real child . Of [her]5576-my daughter outward appearance [I]0-i know no more than that [she]5576-my daughter was like [[her]5576-my daughter mother]5561-her mother . [The other]756-the other had that likeness too -- as [you]4969-my father have -- but was not the same . Can [you]4969-my father follow [me]0-i , [Lucie]174-lucie ? Hardly , [I]0-i think ? [I]0-i doubt [you]4969-my father must have been [a solitary prisoner]2677-a solitary prisoner to understand these perplexed distinctions . ” [His]0-i collected and calm manner could not prevent [her]5576-my daughter blood from running cold , as [he]0-i thus tried to anatomise [his]0-i old condition . “[2677-a solitary prisoner] In that more peaceful state , [I]0-i have imagined [her]5576-my daughter , in the moonlight , coming to [me]0-i and taking [me]0-i out to show [me]0-i that [the home of [her]5576-my daughter married life]2678-the home of her married life was full of [her]5576-my daughter loving remembrance of [[her]5576-my daughter lost father]2679-her lost father . [My]0-i picture was in [[her]5576-my daughter room]2680-her room , and [I]0-i was in [her]5576-my daughter prayers . [Her]5576-my daughter life was active , cheerful , useful ; but [my]0-i poor history pervaded it all . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i was [that child]2668-that child , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , [I]0-i was not half so good , but in [my]0-i love that was [I.]0-i ” “[5576-my daughter] And [she]5576-my daughter showed [me]0-i [[her]5576-my daughter children]2683-her children , ” said [the Doctor of [Beauvais]25-beauvais]4994-the doctor of beauvais , “[5576-my daughter] and [they]2683-her children had heard of [me]0-i , and had been taught to pity [me]0-i . When [they]2683-her children passed [a prison of the State]2684-a prison of the state , [they]2683-her children kept far from [its]2684-a prison of the state frowning walls , and looked up at [its]2684-a prison of the state bars , and spoke in whispers . [She]5576-my daughter could never deliver [me]0-i ; [I]0-i imagined that [she]5576-my daughter always brought [me]0-i back after showing [me]0-i such things . But then , blessed with the relief of tears , [I]0-i fell upon [my]0-i knees , and blessed [her]5576-my daughter . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am [that child]2668-that child , [I]0-i hope , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father . O [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear , will [you]4969-my father bless [me]0-i as fervently to - morrow ? ” “[174-lucie] [Lucie]174-lucie , [I]0-i recall these old troubles in the reason that [I]0-i have to - night for loving [you]174-lucie better than words can tell , and thanking [God]149-god for [my]0-i great happiness . [My]0-i thoughts , when they were wildest , never rose near the happiness that [I]0-i have known with [you]174-lucie , and that [we]2689-they have before [us]2689-they . ” [He]0-i embraced [her]174-lucie , solemnly commended [her]174-lucie to [Heaven]225-heaven , and humbly thanked [Heaven]225-heaven for having bestowed [her]174-lucie on [him]0-i . By - and - bye , [they]2689-they went into [the house]951-the house . There was [no one bidden to the marriage]6121-no one bidden to the marriage but [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ; there was even to be [no bridesmaid]6122-no bridesmaid but [the gaunt Miss Pross]183-miss pross . The marriage was to make no change in [[their]2689-they place of residence]6123-their place of residence ; [they]2689-they had been able to extend it , by taking to [themselves]2689-they [the upper rooms formerly belonging to [the apocryphal invisible lodger]6125-the apocryphal invisible lodger]6124-the upper rooms formerly belonging to the apocryphal invisible lodger , and [they]2689-they desired nothing more . [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette was very cheerful at the little supper . [They]2689-they were only three at table , and [Miss Pross]183-miss pross made the third . [He]170-doctor manette regretted that [Charles]162-darnay was not [there]4887-there ; was more than half disposed to object to the loving little plot that kept [him]162-darnay away ; and drank to [him]162-darnay affectionately . So , the time came for [him]170-doctor manette to bid [Lucie]174-lucie good night , and [they]2689-they separated . But , in the stillness of the third hour of the morning , [Lucie]174-lucie came [downstairs]1229-downstairs again , and stole into [[his]170-doctor manette room]5378-his room ; not free from unshaped fears , beforehand . All things , however , were in [their]2689-they places ; all was quiet ; and [he]170-doctor manette lay asleep , [his]170-doctor manette white hair picturesque on the untroubled pillow , and [his]170-doctor manette hands lying quiet on the coverlet . [She]174-lucie put [her]174-lucie needless candle in the shadow at a distance , crept up to [his]170-doctor manette bed , and put [her]174-lucie lips to [his]170-doctor manette ; then , leaned over [him]170-doctor manette , and looked at [him]170-doctor manette .
