Into [his]170-doctor manette handsome face , the bitter waters of captivity had worn ; but , [he]170-doctor manette covered up [their]2689-they tracks with a determination so strong , that [he]170-doctor manette held the mastery of [them]2689-they even in [his]170-doctor manette sleep . A more remarkable face in its quiet , resolute , and guarded struggle with [an unseen assailant]6129-an unseen assailant , was not to be beheld in all the wide dominions of sleep , that night . [She]174-lucie timidly laid [her]174-lucie hand on [his]170-doctor manette dear breast , and put up a prayer that [she]174-lucie might ever be as true to [him]170-doctor manette as [her]174-lucie love aspired to be , and as [his]170-doctor manette sorrows deserved . Then , [she]174-lucie withdrew [her]174-lucie hand , and kissed [his]170-doctor manette lips once more , and went away . So , the sunrise came , and the shadows of the leaves of the plane - tree moved upon [his]170-doctor manette face , as softly as [her]174-lucie lips had moved in praying for [him]170-doctor manette . CHAPTER XVIII . Nine Days The marriage - day was shining brightly , and [they]2689-they were ready outside the closed door of [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s room]6131-the doctor ’s room , where [he]170-doctor manette was speaking with [Charles Darnay]162-darnay . [They]2689-they were ready to go to [church]6132-church ; [the beautiful bride]6133-the beautiful bride , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , and [Miss Pross]183-miss pross -- to whom the event , through a gradual process of reconcilement to the inevitable , would have been one of absolute bliss , but for the yet lingering consideration that [[her]174-lucie brother]1596-her brother [Solomon]186-solomon should have been [the bridegroom]6135-the bridegroom . “[0-i] And so , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , who could not sufficiently admire [the bride]6136-the bride , and who had been moving round [her]6136-the bride to take in every point of [her]6136-the bride quiet , pretty dress ; “[0-i] and so it was for this , [[my]0-i sweet [Lucie]174-lucie]2690-my sweet lucie , that [I]0-i brought [you]174-lucie across [the Channel]79-the channel , such [a baby]2691-a baby ! [Lord]2692-lord bless [me]0-i ! How little [I]0-i thought what [I]0-i was doing ! How lightly [I]0-i valued the obligation [I]0-i was conferring on [[my]0-i friend]492-my friend [Mr. Charles]162-darnay ! ” “[162-darnay] [You]0-i did n’t mean it , ” remarked [the matter - of - fact]6137-the matter - of - fact [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , “[0-i] and therefore how could [you]0-i know it ? Nonsense ! ” “[0-i] Really ? Well ; but do n’t cry , ” said [the gentle Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “[0-i] [I]0-i am not crying , ” said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross ; “[0-i] _ [you]0-i _ are . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i , [[my]0-i Pross]2694-my pross ? ” ( By this time , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry dared to be pleasant with [her]183-miss pross , on occasion . ) “[0-i] [You]0-i were , just now ; [I]0-i saw [you]0-i do it , and [I]0-i do n’t wonder at it . Such a present of plate as [you]0-i have made [’em]2695-’em , is enough to bring tears into [anybody]636-anybody ’s eyes . There ’s not a fork or a spoon in the collection , ” said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , “[0-i] that [I]0-i did n’t cry over , last night after the box came , till [I]0-i could n’t see it . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am highly gratified , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , “[0-i] though , upon [my]0-i honour , [I]0-i had no intention of rendering those trifling articles of remembrance invisible to [any one]2697-any one . Dear [me]0-i ! This is an occasion that makes [a man]449-a man speculate on all [he]449-a man has lost . [Dear]2699-dear , [dear]2699-dear , [dear]2699-dear ! To think that there might have been a [Mrs. Lorry]226-mrs. lorry , any time these fifty years almost ! ” “[226-mrs. lorry] Not at all ! ” From [Miss Pross]183-miss pross . “[0-i] [You]0-i think there never might have been [a Mrs. Lorry]226-mrs. lorry ? ” asked [the gentleman of that name]6138-the gentleman of that name . “[226-mrs. lorry] Pooh ! ” rejoined [Miss Pross]183-miss pross ; “[226-mrs. lorry] [you]0-i were [a bachelor]2702-a bachelor in [[your]0-i cradle]2703-your cradle . ” “[0-i] Well ! ” observed [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , beamingly adjusting [his]0-i little wig , “[0-i] that seems probable , too . ” “[0-i] And [you]0-i were cut out for [a bachelor]2702-a bachelor , ” pursued [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , “[0-i] before [you]0-i were put in [[your]0-i cradle]2703-your cradle . ” “[0-i] Then , [I]0-i think , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , “[0-i] that [I]0-i was very unhandsomely dealt with , and that [I]0-i ought to have had a voice in the selection of [my]0-i pattern . Enough ! Now , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear [Lucie]174-lucie , ” drawing [his]0-i arm soothingly round [her]174-lucie waist , “[174-lucie] [I]0-i hear [them]2707-them moving in [the next room]5486-the next room , and [Miss Pross]183-miss pross and [I]0-i , as [two formal folks of business]2709-two formal folks of business , are anxious not to lose the final opportunity of saying something to [you]174-lucie that [you]174-lucie wish to hear . [You]174-lucie leave [[your]174-lucie good father]2710-your good father , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear , in hands as earnest and as loving as [your]174-lucie own ; [he]2710-your good father shall be taken every conceivable care of ; during the next fortnight , while [you]174-lucie are in [Warwickshire]80-warwickshire and thereabouts , even [Tellson]134-tellson ’s shall go to the wall ( comparatively speaking ) before [him]2710-your good father . And when , at the fortnight ’s end , [he]134-tellson comes to join [you]174-lucie and [[your]174-lucie beloved husband]2712-your beloved husband , on [your]174-lucie other fortnight ’s trip in [Wales]81-wales , [you]174-lucie shall say that [we]2713-we have sent [him]134-tellson to [you]174-lucie in the best health and in the happiest frame . Now , [I]0-i hear [Somebody]405-somebody ’s step coming to the door . Let [me]0-i kiss [[my]0-i dear girl]2715-my dear girl with an old - fashioned bachelor blessing , before [Somebody]405-somebody comes to claim [his]405-somebody own . ” For a moment , [he]0-i held the fair face from [him]0-i to look at the well - remembered expression on the forehead , and then laid the bright golden hair against [his]0-i little brown wig , with a genuine tenderness and delicacy which , if such things be old - fashioned , were as old as [Adam]227-adam . The door of [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s room]6131-the doctor ’s room opened , and [he]0-i came out with [Charles Darnay]162-darnay . [He]0-i was so deadly pale -- which had not been the case when [they]2713-we went in together -- that no vestige of colour was to be seen in [his]0-i face . But , in the composure of [his]0-i manner [he]0-i was unaltered , except that to the shrewd glance of [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry it disclosed some shadowy indication that the old air of avoidance and dread had lately passed over [him]0-i , like a cold wind . [He]0-i gave [his]0-i arm to [[his]0-i daughter]889-his daughter , and took [her]889-his daughter down - stairs to [the chariot which [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry had hired in honour of the day]6142-the chariot which mr. lorry had hired in honour of the day . [The rest]367-the rest followed in [another carriage]6144-another carriage , and soon , in [a neighbouring church]6145-a neighbouring church , where no strange eyes looked on , [Charles Darnay]162-darnay and [Lucie Manette]174-lucie were happily married . Besides the glancing tears that shone among the smiles of [the little group]6146-the little group when it was done , some diamonds , very bright and sparkling , glanced on [the bride]6136-the bride ’s hand , which were newly released from the dark obscurity of one of [[Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s pockets]6148-mr. lorry ’s pockets . [They]6146-the little group returned [home]858-home to breakfast , and all went well , and in due course the golden hair that had mingled with [the poor shoemaker]6150-the poor shoemaker ’s white locks in [the Paris garret]6151-the paris garret , were mingled with [them]6146-the little group again in the morning sunlight , on the threshold of the door at parting . It was a hard parting , though it was not for long . But [[her]2717-her father]5008-her father cheered [her]2717-her , and said at last , gently disengaging [himself]5008-her father from [her]2717-her enfolding arms , “[405-somebody] Take [her]2717-her , [Charles]162-darnay ! [She]2717-her is [yours]162-darnay ! ” And [her]2717-her agitated hand waved to [them]6146-the little group from a chaise window , and [she]2717-her was gone . The corner being out of the way of [the idle and curious]6153-the idle and curious , and the preparations having been very simple and few , [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , and [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , were left quite alone . It was when [they]6146-the little group turned into the welcome shade of [the cool old hall]6155-the cool old hall , that [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry observed a great change to have come over [the Doctor]1514-the doctor ; as if the golden arm uplifted there , had struck [him]1514-the doctor a poisoned blow . [He]1514-the doctor had naturally repressed much , and some revulsion might have been expected in [him]1514-the doctor when the occasion for repression was gone . But , it was the old scared lost look that troubled [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ; and through [his]133-mr. lorry absent manner of clasping [his]133-mr. lorry head and drearily wandering away into [[his]133-mr. lorry own room]6157-his own room when [they]6146-the little group got up - [stairs]967-stairs , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry was reminded of [Defarge]146-madame defarge [the wine - shop keeper]751-the wine - shop keeper , and the starlight ride . “[0-i] [I]0-i think , ” [he]133-mr. lorry whispered to [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , after anxious consideration , “[0-i] [I]0-i think [we]2718-we had best not speak to [him]2719-him just now , or at all disturb [him]2719-him . [I]0-i must look in at [[Tellson]134-tellson ’s]959-tellson ’s ; so [I]0-i will go [there]4887-there at once and come back presently . Then , [we]2718-we will take [him]2719-him a ride into [the country]956-the country , and dine [there]4887-there , and all will be well . ” It was easier for [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry to look in at [Tellson]134-tellson ’s , than to look out of [[Tellson]134-tellson ’s]959-tellson ’s . [He]133-mr. lorry was detained two hours . When [he]133-mr. lorry came back , [he]133-mr. lorry ascended [the old staircase]6161-the old staircase alone , having asked no question of [the servant]6162-the servant ; going thus into [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s rooms]6164-the doctor ’s rooms , [he]133-mr. lorry was stopped by a low sound of knocking . “[149-god] [Good God]149-god ! ” [he]133-mr. lorry said , with a start . “[149-god] What ’s that ? ” [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , with a terrified face , was at [his]133-mr. lorry ear . “[149-god] O [me]0-i , O [me]0-i ! All is lost ! ” cried [she]183-miss pross , wringing [her]183-miss pross hands . “[149-god] What is to be told to [Ladybird]184-ladybird ? [He]2724-he does n’t know [me]0-i , and is making shoes ! ” [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry said what [he]133-mr. lorry could to calm [her]183-miss pross , and went [himself]133-mr. lorry into [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s room]6131-the doctor ’s room . The bench was turned towards the light , as it had been when [he]133-mr. lorry had seen [the shoemaker]852-the shoemaker at [his]852-the shoemaker work before , and [his]852-the shoemaker head was bent down , and [he]852-the shoemaker was very busy . “[170-doctor manette] [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . [[My]0-i dear friend]2725-my dear friend , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ! ” [The Doctor]1514-the doctor looked at [him]133-mr. lorry for a moment -- half inquiringly , half as if [he]852-the shoemaker were angry at being spoken to -- and bent over [his]852-the shoemaker work again . [He]852-the shoemaker had laid aside [his]852-the shoemaker coat and waistcoat ; [his]852-the shoemaker shirt was open at the throat , as it used to be when [he]852-the shoemaker did that work ; and even the old haggard , faded surface of face had come back to [him]852-the shoemaker . [He]852-the shoemaker worked hard -- impatiently -- as if in some sense of having been interrupted . [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry glanced at the work in [his]133-mr. lorry hand , and observed that it was a shoe of the old size and shape . [He]133-mr. lorry took up another that was lying by [him]133-mr. lorry , and asked what it was . “[170-doctor manette] [A young lady]777-a young lady ’s walking shoe , ” [he]133-mr. lorry muttered , without looking up . “[170-doctor manette] It ought to have been finished long ago . Let it be . ” “[170-doctor manette] But , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . Look at [me]0-i ! ” [He]852-the shoemaker obeyed , in the old mechanically submissive manner , without pausing in [his]852-the shoemaker work . “[170-doctor manette] [You]170-doctor manette know [me]0-i , [[my]0-i dear friend]2725-my dear friend ? Think again . This is not [your]170-doctor manette proper occupation . Think , [dear friend]2728-dear friend ! ” Nothing would induce [him]852-the shoemaker to speak more . [He]852-the shoemaker looked up , for an instant at a time , when [he]852-the shoemaker was requested to do so ; but , no persuasion would extract a word from [him]852-the shoemaker . [He]852-the shoemaker worked , and worked , and worked , in silence , and words fell on [him]852-the shoemaker as they would have fallen on an echoless wall , or on the air . The only ray of hope that [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry could discover , was , that [he]852-the shoemaker sometimes furtively looked up without being asked . In that , there seemed a faint expression of curiosity or perplexity -- as though [he]852-the shoemaker were trying to reconcile some doubts in [his]852-the shoemaker mind . Two things at once impressed [themselves]6169-themselves on [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , as important above all others ; the first , that this must be kept secret from [Lucie]174-lucie ; the second , that it must be kept secret from [all who knew [him]133-mr. lorry]6170-all who knew him . In conjunction with [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , [he]133-mr. lorry took immediate steps towards the latter precaution , by giving out that [the Doctor]1514-the doctor was not well , and required a few days of complete rest . In aid of the kind deception to be practised on [[his]133-mr. lorry daughter]889-his daughter , [Miss Pross]183-miss pross was to write , describing [his]133-mr. lorry having been called away professionally , and referring to an imaginary letter of two or three hurried lines in [his]133-mr. lorry own hand , represented to have been addressed to [her]889-his daughter by the same post . These measures , advisable to be taken in any case , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry took in the hope of [his]133-mr. lorry coming to [himself]133-mr. lorry . If that should happen soon , [he]133-mr. lorry kept another course in reserve ; which was , to have a certain opinion that [he]133-mr. lorry thought the best , on [the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s case . In the hope of [his]133-mr. lorry recovery , and of resort to this third course being thereby rendered practicable , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry resolved to watch [him]133-mr. lorry attentively , with as little appearance as possible of doing so . [He]133-mr. lorry therefore made arrangements to absent [himself]133-mr. lorry from [Tellson]134-tellson ’s for the first time in [his]133-mr. lorry life , and took [his]133-mr. lorry post by the window in [the same room]6174-the same room . [He]133-mr. lorry was not long in discovering that it was worse than useless to speak to [him]133-mr. lorry , since , on being pressed , [he]133-mr. lorry became worried . [He]133-mr. lorry abandoned that attempt on the first day , and resolved merely to keep [himself]133-mr. lorry always before [him]133-mr. lorry , as a silent protest against the delusion into which [he]133-mr. lorry had fallen , or was falling . [He]133-mr. lorry remained , therefore , in [his]133-mr. lorry seat near the window , reading and writing , and expressing in as many pleasant and natural ways as [he]133-mr. lorry could think of , that it was [a free place]6175-a free place . [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette took what was given [him]133-mr. lorry to eat and drink , and worked on , that first day , until it was too dark to see -- worked on , half an hour after [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry could not have seen , for [his]133-mr. lorry life , to read or write . When [he]133-mr. lorry put [his]133-mr. lorry tools aside as useless , until morning , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry rose and said to [him]2729-him : “[2728-dear friend] Will [you]2729-him go out ? ” [He]133-mr. lorry looked down at the floor on either side of [him]133-mr. lorry in the old manner , looked up in the old manner , and repeated in the old low voice : “[2729-him] Out ? ” “[2729-him] Yes ; for a walk with [me]0-i . Why not ? ” [He]133-mr. lorry made no effort to say why not , and said not a word more . But , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry thought [he]133-mr. lorry saw , as [he]133-mr. lorry leaned forward on [his]133-mr. lorry bench in the dusk , with [his]133-mr. lorry elbows on [his]133-mr. lorry knees and [his]133-mr. lorry head in [his]133-mr. lorry hands , that [he]133-mr. lorry was in some misty way asking [himself]133-mr. lorry , “[2729-him] Why not ? ” The sagacity of [the man of business]1660-the man of business perceived an advantage here , and determined to hold it . [Miss Pross]183-miss pross and [he]133-mr. lorry divided the night into two watches , and observed [him]133-mr. lorry at intervals from [the adjoining room]6177-the adjoining room . [He]133-mr. lorry paced up and down for a long time before [he]133-mr. lorry lay down ; but , when [he]133-mr. lorry did finally lay [himself]133-mr. lorry down , [he]133-mr. lorry fell asleep . In the morning , [he]133-mr. lorry was up betimes , and went straight to [his]133-mr. lorry bench and to work . On this second day , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry saluted [him]133-mr. lorry cheerfully by [his]133-mr. lorry name , and spoke to [him]133-mr. lorry on topics that had been of late familiar to [them]6178-them . [He]133-mr. lorry returned no reply , but it was evident that [he]133-mr. lorry heard what was said , and that [he]133-mr. lorry thought about it , however confusedly . This encouraged [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry to have [Miss Pross]183-miss pross in with [her]183-miss pross work , several times during the day ; at those times , [they]6178-them quietly spoke of [Lucie]174-lucie , and of [[her]183-miss pross father]5008-her father then present , precisely in the usual manner , and as if there were nothing amiss . This was done without any demonstrative accompaniment , not long enough , or often enough to harass [him]133-mr. lorry ; and it lightened [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s friendly heart to believe that [he]133-mr. lorry looked up oftener , and that [he]133-mr. lorry appeared to be stirred by some perception of inconsistencies surrounding [him]133-mr. lorry . When it fell dark again , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry asked [him]2730-dear doctor as before : “[2730-dear doctor] [Dear Doctor]2730-dear doctor , will [you]2730-dear doctor go out ? ” As before , [he]2730-dear doctor repeated , “[2730-dear doctor] Out ? ” “[2730-dear doctor] Yes ; for a walk with [me]0-i . Why not ? ” This time , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry feigned to go out when [he]133-mr. lorry could extract no answer from [him]2730-dear doctor , and , after remaining absent for an hour , returned . In the meanwhile , [the Doctor]1514-the doctor had removed to the seat in the window , and had sat there looking down at the plane - tree ; but , on [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s return , [he]1514-the doctor slipped away to [his]133-mr. lorry bench . The time went very slowly on , and [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s hope darkened , and [his]133-mr. lorry heart grew heavier again , and grew yet heavier and heavier every day . The third day came and went , the fourth , the fifth . Five days , six days , seven days , eight days , nine days . With a hope ever darkening , and with a heart always growing heavier and heavier , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry passed through this anxious time . The secret was well kept , and [Lucie]174-lucie was unconscious and happy ; but [he]133-mr. lorry could not fail to observe that [the shoemaker , whose hand had been a little out at first]6181-the shoemaker , whose hand had been a little out at first , was growing dreadfully skilful , and that [he]6181-the shoemaker , whose hand had been a little out at first had never been so intent on [his]6181-the shoemaker , whose hand had been a little out at first work , and that [his]6181-the shoemaker , whose hand had been a little out at first hands had never been so nimble and expert , as in the dusk of the ninth evening . CHAPTER XIX . An Opinion Worn out by anxious watching , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry fell asleep at [his]133-mr. lorry post . On the tenth morning of [his]133-mr. lorry suspense , [he]133-mr. lorry was startled by the shining of the sun into [the room]565-the room where a heavy slumber had overtaken [him]133-mr. lorry when it was dark night . [He]133-mr. lorry rubbed [his]133-mr. lorry eyes and roused [himself]133-mr. lorry ; but [he]133-mr. lorry doubted , when [he]133-mr. lorry had done so , whether [he]133-mr. lorry was not still asleep . For , going to the door of [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s room]6131-the doctor ’s room and looking in , [he]133-mr. lorry perceived that [the shoemaker]852-the shoemaker ’s bench and tools were put aside again , and that [the Doctor]1514-the doctor [himself]1514-the doctor sat reading at the window . [He]1514-the doctor was in [his]1514-the doctor usual morning dress , and [his]1514-the doctor face ( which [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry could distinctly see ) , though still very pale , was calmly studious and attentive . Even when [he]133-mr. lorry had satisfied [himself]133-mr. lorry that [he]133-mr. lorry was awake , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry felt giddily uncertain for some few moments whether the late shoemaking might not be a disturbed dream of [his]133-mr. lorry own ; for , did not [his]133-mr. lorry eyes show [him]133-mr. lorry [[his]133-mr. lorry friend]1325-his friend before [him]133-mr. lorry in [his]133-mr. lorry accustomed clothing and aspect , and employed as usual ; and was there any sign within [their]6188-their range , that the change of which [he]133-mr. lorry had so strong an impression had actually happened ? It was but the inquiry of [his]133-mr. lorry first confusion and astonishment , the answer being obvious . If the impression were not produced by a real corresponding and sufficient cause , how came [he]133-mr. lorry , [Jarvis Lorry]133-mr. lorry , there ? How came [he]133-mr. lorry to have fallen asleep , in [his]133-mr. lorry clothes , on the sofa in [[Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ’s consulting - room]6189-doctor manette ’s consulting - room , and to be debating these points outside [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s bedroom]1581-the doctor ’s bedroom door in the early morning ? Within a few minutes , [Miss Pross]183-miss pross stood whispering at [his]133-mr. lorry side . If [he]133-mr. lorry had had any particle of doubt left , [her]183-miss pross talk would of necessity have resolved it ; but [he]133-mr. lorry was by that time clear - headed , and had none . [He]133-mr. lorry advised that [they]6188-their should let the time go by until the regular breakfast - hour , and should then meet [the Doctor]1514-the doctor as if nothing unusual had occurred . If [he]133-mr. lorry appeared to be in [his]133-mr. lorry customary state of mind , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry would then cautiously proceed to seek direction and guidance from the opinion [he]133-mr. lorry had been , in [his]133-mr. lorry anxiety , so anxious to obtain . [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , submitting [herself]183-miss pross to [his]133-mr. lorry judgment , the scheme was worked out with care . Having abundance of time for [his]133-mr. lorry usual methodical toilette , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry presented [himself]133-mr. lorry at the breakfast - hour in [his]133-mr. lorry usual white linen , and with [his]133-mr. lorry usual neat leg . [The Doctor]1514-the doctor was summoned in the usual way , and came to breakfast . So far as it was possible to comprehend [him]133-mr. lorry without overstepping those delicate and gradual approaches which [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry felt to be the only safe advance , [he]133-mr. lorry at first supposed that [[his]133-mr. lorry daughter]889-his daughter ’s marriage had taken place yesterday . An incidental allusion , purposely thrown out , to the day of the week , and the day of the month , set [him]133-mr. lorry thinking and counting , and evidently made [him]133-mr. lorry uneasy . In all other respects , however , [he]133-mr. lorry was so composedly [himself]133-mr. lorry , that [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry determined to have the aid [he]133-mr. lorry sought . And that aid was [his]133-mr. lorry own . Therefore , when the breakfast was done and cleared away , and [he]133-mr. lorry and [the Doctor]1514-the doctor were left together , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry said , feelingly : “[0-i] [[My]0-i dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette , [I]0-i am anxious to have [your]170-doctor manette opinion , in confidence , on a very curious case in which [I]0-i am deeply interested ; that is to say , it is very curious to [me]0-i ; perhaps , to [your]170-doctor manette better information it may be less so . ” Glancing at [his]133-mr. lorry hands , which were discoloured by [his]133-mr. lorry late work , [the Doctor]1514-the doctor looked troubled , and listened attentively . [He]1514-the doctor had already glanced at [his]133-mr. lorry hands more than once . “[170-doctor manette] [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , touching [him]1514-the doctor affectionately on the arm , “[170-doctor manette] the case is the case of [a particularly dear friend of [mine]0-i]2732-a particularly dear friend of mine . Pray give [your]170-doctor manette mind to it , and advise [me]0-i well for [his]2732-a particularly dear friend of mine sake -- and above all , for [[his]2732-a particularly dear friend of mine daughter’s]2733-his daughter’s -- [[his]2732-a particularly dear friend of mine daughter]889-his daughter ’s , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette . ” “[170-doctor manette] If [I]0-i understand , ” said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , in a subdued tone , “[170-doctor manette] some mental shock-- ? ” “[170-doctor manette] Yes ! ” “[170-doctor manette] Be explicit , ” said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor . “[170-doctor manette] Spare no detail . ” [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry saw that [they]6199-they understood [one another]411-one another , and proceeded . “[170-doctor manette] [[My]0-i dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette , it is the case of an old and a prolonged shock , of great acuteness and severity to the affections , the feelings , the -- the -- as [you]170-doctor manette express it -- the mind . The mind . It is the case of a shock under which [the sufferer]2737-the sufferer was borne down , [one]4965-one can not say for how long , because [I]0-i believe [he]2737-the sufferer can not calculate the time [himself]2737-the sufferer , and there are no other means of getting at it . It is the case of a shock from which [the sufferer]2737-the sufferer recovered , by a process that [he]2737-the sufferer can not trace [himself]2737-the sufferer -- as [I]0-i once heard [him]2737-the sufferer publicly relate in a striking manner . It is the case of a shock from which [he]2737-the sufferer has recovered , so completely , as to be [a highly intelligent man , capable of close application of mind , and great exertion of body]2740-a highly intelligent man , capable of close application of mind , and great exertion of body , and of constantly making fresh additions to [his]2737-the sufferer stock of knowledge , which was already very large . But , unfortunately , there has been , ” [he]0-i paused and took a deep breath--“a[0-i] slight relapse . ” [The Doctor]1514-the doctor , in a low voice , asked , “[0-i] Of how long duration ? ” “[0-i] Nine days and nights . ” “[0-i] How did it show itself ? [I]0-i infer , ” glancing at [his]0-i hands again , “[0-i] in the resumption of some old pursuit connected with the shock ? ” “[0-i] That is the fact . ” “[0-i] Now , did [you]0-i ever see [him]2737-the sufferer , ” asked [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , distinctly and collectedly , though in the same low voice , “[2737-the sufferer] engaged in that pursuit originally ? ” “[0-i] Once . ” “[0-i] And when the relapse fell on [him]2737-the sufferer , was [he]2737-the sufferer in most respects -- or in all respects -- as [he]2737-the sufferer was then ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i think in all respects . ” “[0-i] [You]0-i spoke of [[his]2737-the sufferer daughter]889-his daughter . Does [[his]2737-the sufferer daughter]889-his daughter know of the relapse ? ” “[889-his daughter] No . It has been kept from [her]889-his daughter , and [I]0-i hope will always be kept from [her]889-his daughter . It is known only to [myself]0-i , and to one other who may be trusted . ” [The Doctor]1514-the doctor grasped [his]0-i hand , and murmured , “[170-doctor manette] That was very kind . That was very thoughtful ! ” [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry grasped [his]133-mr. lorry hand in return , and [neither of the two]6204-neither of the two spoke for a little while . “[170-doctor manette] Now , [[my]0-i dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , at length , in [his]133-mr. lorry most considerate and most affectionate way , “[170-doctor manette] [I]0-i am [a mere man of business]2744-a mere man of business , and unfit to cope with such intricate and difficult matters . [I]0-i do not possess the kind of information necessary ; [I]0-i do not possess the kind of intelligence ; [I]0-i want guiding . There is [no man in [this world]976-this world on whom [I]0-i could so rely for right guidance , as on [you]170-doctor manette]2745-no man in this world on whom i could so rely for right guidance , as on you . Tell [me]0-i , how does this relapse come about ? Is there danger of another ? Could a repetition of it be prevented ? How should a repetition of it be treated ? How does it come about at all ? What can [I]0-i do for [[my]0-i friend]492-my friend ? [No man]1866-no man ever can have been more desirous in [his]1866-no man heart to serve [a friend]2749-a friend , than [I]0-i am to serve [mine]0-i , if [I]0-i knew how . “ But [I]170-doctor manette do n’t know how to originate , in such a case . If [your]170-doctor manette sagacity , knowledge , and experience , could put [me]170-doctor manette on the right track , [I]170-doctor manette might be able to do so much ; unenlightened and undirected , [I]170-doctor manette can do so little . Pray discuss it with [me]170-doctor manette ; pray enable [me]170-doctor manette to see it a little more clearly , and teach [me]170-doctor manette how to be a little more useful . ”[170-doctor manette] [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette sat meditating after these earnest words were spoken , and [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry did not press [him]170-doctor manette . “ [I]1514-the doctor think it probable , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , breaking silence with an effort , “ that the relapse [you]133-mr. lorry have described , [[my]1514-the doctor dear friend]2725-my dear friend , was not quite unforeseen by its subject . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Was it dreaded by [him]170-doctor manette ? ”[133-mr. lorry] [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ventured to ask . “ Very much . ”[133-mr. lorry] [He]133-mr. lorry said it with an involuntary shudder . “ [You]170-doctor manette have no idea how such an apprehension weighs on [the sufferer]2737-the sufferer ’s mind , and how difficult -- how almost impossible -- it is , for [him]170-doctor manette to force [himself]170-doctor manette to utter a word upon the topic that oppresses [him]170-doctor manette . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ Would [he]170-doctor manette , ”[133-mr. lorry] asked [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , “ be sensibly relieved if [he]170-doctor manette could prevail upon [himself]170-doctor manette to impart that secret brooding to [any one]2697-any one , when it is on [him]170-doctor manette ? ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [I]133-mr. lorry think so . But it is , as [I]133-mr. lorry have told [you]170-doctor manette , next to impossible . [I]133-mr. lorry even believe it -- in some cases -- to be quite impossible . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ Now , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , gently laying [his]133-mr. lorry hand on [the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s arm again , after a short silence on both sides , “ to what would [you]1514-the doctor refer this attack ? ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [I]170-doctor manette believe , ”[170-doctor manette] returned [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , “ that there had been a strong and extraordinary revival of the train of thought and remembrance that was the first cause of the malady . Some intense associations of a most distressing nature were vividly recalled , [I]170-doctor manette think . It is probable that there had long been a dread lurking in [his]170-doctor manette mind , that those associations would be recalled -- say , under certain circumstances -- say , on a particular occasion . [He]170-doctor manette tried to prepare [himself]170-doctor manette in vain ; perhaps the effort to prepare [himself]170-doctor manette made [him]170-doctor manette less able to bear it . ”[170-doctor manette] “ Would [he]170-doctor manette remember what took place in the relapse ? ”[133-mr. lorry] asked [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , with natural hesitation . [The Doctor]1514-the doctor looked desolately round [the room]565-the room , shook [his]1514-the doctor head , and answered , in a low voice , “ Not at all . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Now , as to the future , ”[133-mr. lorry] hinted [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “ As to the future , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , recovering firmness , “ [I]1514-the doctor should have great hope . As it pleased [Heaven]225-heaven in its mercy to restore [him]170-doctor manette so soon , [I]1514-the doctor should have great hope . [He]170-doctor manette , yielding under the pressure of a complicated something , long dreaded and long vaguely foreseen and contended against , and recovering after the cloud had burst and passed , [I]1514-the doctor should hope that the worst was over . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Well , well ! That ’s good comfort . [I]133-mr. lorry am thankful ! ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “ [I]1514-the doctor am thankful ! ”[1514-the doctor] repeated [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , bending [his]1514-the doctor head with reverence . “ There are two other points , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , “ on which [I]133-mr. lorry am anxious to be instructed . [I]133-mr. lorry may go on ? ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [You]133-mr. lorry can not do [[your]133-mr. lorry friend]6208-your friend a better service . ”[1514-the doctor] [The Doctor]1514-the doctor gave [him]133-mr. lorry [his]133-mr. lorry hand . “ To the first , then . [He]170-doctor manette is of a studious habit , and unusually energetic ; [he]170-doctor manette applies [himself]170-doctor manette with great ardour to the acquisition of professional knowledge , to the conducting of experiments , to many things . Now , does [he]170-doctor manette do too much ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ [I]133-mr. lorry think not . It may be the character of [his]170-doctor manette mind , to be always in singular need of occupation . That may be , in part , natural to it ; in part , the result of affliction . The less it was occupied with healthy things , the more it would be in danger of turning in the unhealthy direction . [He]170-doctor manette may have observed [himself]170-doctor manette , and made the discovery . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [You]133-mr. lorry are sure that [he]170-doctor manette is not under too great a strain ? ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [I]1514-the doctor think [I]1514-the doctor am quite sure of it . ”[1514-the doctor] “ [[My]133-mr. lorry dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette , if [he]170-doctor manette were overworked now-- ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [[My]133-mr. lorry dear]5097-my dear [Lorry]133-mr. lorry , [I]133-mr. lorry doubt if that could easily be . There has been a violent stress in one direction , and it needs a counterweight . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ Excuse [me]1514-the doctor , as [a persistent man of business]6211-a persistent man of business . Assuming for a moment , that [he]170-doctor manette _ was _ overworked ; it would show itself in some renewal of this disorder ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ [I]170-doctor manette do not think so . [I]170-doctor manette do not think , ”[170-doctor manette] said [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette with the firmness of self - conviction , “ that anything but the one train of association would renew it . [I]170-doctor manette think that , henceforth , nothing but some extraordinary jarring of that chord could renew it . After what has happened , and after [his]170-doctor manette recovery , [I]170-doctor manette find it difficult to imagine any such violent sounding of that string again . [I]170-doctor manette trust , and [I]170-doctor manette almost believe , that the circumstances likely to renew it are exhausted . ”[170-doctor manette] [He]170-doctor manette spoke with the diffidence of [a man who knew how slight a thing would overset the delicate organisation of the mind]2757-a man who knew how slight a thing would overset the delicate organisation of the mind , and yet with the confidence of [a man who had slowly won [his]170-doctor manette assurance out of personal endurance and distress]2758-a man who had slowly won his assurance out of personal endurance and distress . It was not for [[his]170-doctor manette friend]1325-his friend to abate that confidence . [He]170-doctor manette professed [himself]170-doctor manette more relieved and encouraged than [he]170-doctor manette really was , and approached [his]170-doctor manette second and last point . [He]170-doctor manette felt it to be the most difficult of all ; but , remembering [his]170-doctor manette old Sunday morning conversation with [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , and remembering what [he]170-doctor manette had seen in the last nine days , [he]170-doctor manette knew that [he]170-doctor manette must face it . “ The occupation resumed under the influence of this passing affliction so happily recovered from , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , clearing [his]133-mr. lorry throat , “ [we]6212-we will call -- [Blacksmith]6213-blacksmith ’s work , [Blacksmith]6213-blacksmith ’s work . [We]6212-we will say , to put a case and for the sake of illustration , that [he]170-doctor manette had been used , in [his]170-doctor manette bad time , to work at [a little forge]6215-a little forge . [We]6212-we will say that [he]170-doctor manette was unexpectedly found at [[his]170-doctor manette forge]6216-his forge again . Is it not a pity that [he]170-doctor manette should keep it by [him]170-doctor manette ? ”[133-mr. lorry] [The Doctor]1514-the doctor shaded [his]1514-the doctor forehead with [his]1514-the doctor hand , and beat [his]1514-the doctor foot nervously on the ground . “ [He]170-doctor manette has always kept it by [him]170-doctor manette , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , with an anxious look at [[his]133-mr. lorry friend]1325-his friend . “ Now , would it not be better that [he]170-doctor manette should let it go ? ”[133-mr. lorry] Still , [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , with shaded forehead , beat [his]1514-the doctor foot nervously on the ground . “ [You]1514-the doctor do not find it easy to advise [me]133-mr. lorry ? ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “ [I]133-mr. lorry quite understand it to be a nice question . And yet [I]133-mr. lorry think-- ”[133-mr. lorry] And there [he]133-mr. lorry shook [his]133-mr. lorry head , and stopped . “ [You]133-mr. lorry see , ”[170-doctor manette] said [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , turning to [him]133-mr. lorry after an uneasy pause , “ it is very hard to explain , consistently , the innermost workings of [this poor man]6217-this poor man ’s mind . [He]170-doctor manette once yearned so frightfully for that occupation , and it was so welcome when it came ; no doubt it relieved [his]170-doctor manette pain so much , by substituting the perplexity of the fingers for the perplexity of the brain , and by substituting , as [he]170-doctor manette became more practised , the ingenuity of the hands , for the ingenuity of the mental torture ; that [he]170-doctor manette has never been able to bear the thought of putting it quite out of [his]170-doctor manette reach . Even now , when [I]133-mr. lorry believe [he]170-doctor manette is more hopeful of [himself]170-doctor manette than [he]170-doctor manette has ever been , and even speaks of [himself]170-doctor manette with a kind of confidence , the idea that [he]170-doctor manette might need that old employment , and not find it , gives [him]170-doctor manette a sudden sense of terror , like that which [one]4965-one may fancy strikes to the heart of [a lost child]6219-a lost child . ”[133-mr. lorry] [He]133-mr. lorry looked like [his]133-mr. lorry illustration , as [he]133-mr. lorry raised [his]133-mr. lorry eyes to [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s face . “ But may not -- mind ! [I]133-mr. lorry ask for information , as [a plodding man of business who only deals with such material objects as guineas , shillings , and bank - notes]6220-a plodding man of business who only deals with such material objects as guineas , shillings , and bank - notes -- may not the retention of the thing involve the retention of the idea ? If the thing were gone , [[my]133-mr. lorry dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette , might not the fear go with it ? In short , is it not a concession to the misgiving , to keep the forge ? ”[133-mr. lorry] There was another silence . “ [You]133-mr. lorry see , too , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , tremulously , “ it is such [an old companion]6222-an old companion . ”[1514-the doctor] “ [I]133-mr. lorry would not keep it , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , shaking [his]133-mr. lorry head ; for [he]133-mr. lorry gained in firmness as [he]133-mr. lorry saw [the Doctor]1514-the doctor disquieted . “ [I]133-mr. lorry would recommend [him]133-mr. lorry to sacrifice it . [I]133-mr. lorry only want [your]170-doctor manette authority . [I]133-mr. lorry am sure it does no good . Come ! Give [me]133-mr. lorry [your]170-doctor manette authority , like [a dear good man]6223-a dear good man . For [[his]133-mr. lorry daughter]889-his daughter ’s sake , [[my]133-mr. lorry dear]5097-my dear [Manette]170-doctor manette ! ”[133-mr. lorry] Very strange to see what a struggle there was within [him]133-mr. lorry ! “ In [her]889-his daughter name , then , let it be done ; [I]133-mr. lorry sanction it . But , [I]133-mr. lorry would not take it away while [he]133-mr. lorry was present . Let it be removed when [he]133-mr. lorry is not [there]4887-there ; let [him]133-mr. lorry miss [[his]133-mr. lorry old companion]6227-his old companion after an absence . ”[133-mr. lorry] [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry readily engaged for that , and the conference was ended . [They]2765-they passed the day in [the country]956-the country , and [the Doctor]1514-the doctor was quite restored . On the three following days [he]133-mr. lorry remained perfectly well , and on the fourteenth day [he]133-mr. lorry went away to join [Lucie]174-lucie and [[her]174-lucie husband]770-her husband . The precaution that had been taken to account for [his]133-mr. lorry silence , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry had previously explained to [him]133-mr. lorry , and [he]133-mr. lorry had written to [Lucie]174-lucie in accordance with it , and [she]174-lucie had no suspicions . On the night of the day on which [he]133-mr. lorry left [the house]951-the house , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry went into [[his]133-mr. lorry room]5378-his room with a chopper , saw , chisel , and hammer , attended by [Miss Pross]183-miss pross carrying a light . There , with closed doors , and in a mysterious and guilty manner , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry hacked [the shoemaker]852-the shoemaker ’s bench to pieces , while [Miss Pross]183-miss pross held the candle as if [she]183-miss pross were assisting at a murder -- for which , indeed , in [her]183-miss pross grimness , [she]183-miss pross was no unsuitable figure . The burning of the body ( previously reduced to pieces convenient for the purpose ) was commenced without delay in the kitchen fire ; and the tools , shoes , and leather , were buried in [the garden]1626-the garden . So wicked do destruction and secrecy appear to [honest minds]2773-honest minds , that [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry and [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , while engaged in the commission of [their]2774-their deed and in the removal of its traces , almost felt , and almost looked , like [accomplices]2775-accomplices in a horrible crime . CHAPTER XX . A Plea When [the newly - married pair]2776-the newly - married pair came [home]858-home , [the first person who appeared , to offer [his]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations congratulations]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations , was [Sydney Carton]177-carton . [They]2776-the newly - married pair had not been at [home]858-home many hours , when [he]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations presented [himself]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations . [He]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations was not improved in habits , or in looks , or in manner ; but there was a certain rugged air of fidelity about [him]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations , which was new to the observation of [Charles Darnay]162-darnay . [He]177-carton watched [his]177-carton opportunity of taking [Darnay]162-darnay aside into a window , and of speaking to [him]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations when [no one]330-no one overheard . “ [Mr. Darnay]162-darnay , ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , “ [I]177-carton wish [we]2776-the newly - married pair might be [friends]859-friends . ”[177-carton] “ [We]2776-the newly - married pair are already [friends]859-friends , [I]162-darnay hope . ”[162-darnay] “ [You]162-darnay are good enough to say so , as a fashion of speech ; but , [I]177-carton do n’t mean any fashion of speech . Indeed , when [I]177-carton say [I]177-carton wish [we]2776-the newly - married pair might be [friends]859-friends , [I]177-carton scarcely mean quite that , either . ”[177-carton] [Charles Darnay]162-darnay -- as was natural -- asked [him]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations , in all good - humour and good - fellowship , what [he]2778-the first person who appeared , to offer his congratulations did mean ? “ Upon [my]177-carton life , ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , smiling , “ [I]177-carton find that easier to comprehend in [my]177-carton own mind , than to convey to [yours]162-darnay . However , let [me]177-carton try . [You]162-darnay remember a certain famous occasion when [I]177-carton was more drunk than -- than usual ? ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton remember a certain famous occasion when [you]162-darnay forced [me]177-carton to confess that [you]162-darnay had been drinking . ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton remember it too . The curse of those occasions is heavy upon [me]177-carton , for [I]177-carton always remember them . [I]177-carton hope it may be taken into account one day , when all days are at an end for [me]177-carton ! Do n’t be alarmed ; [I]177-carton am not going to preach . ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton am not at all alarmed . Earnestness in [you]162-darnay , is anything but alarming to [me]177-carton . ”[177-carton] “ Ah ! ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , with a careless wave of [his]177-carton hand , as if [he]177-carton waved that away . “ On the drunken occasion in question ( one of a large number , as [you]162-darnay know ) , [I]177-carton was insufferable about liking [you]162-darnay , and not liking [you]162-darnay . [I]177-carton wish [you]162-darnay would forget it . ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton forgot it long ago . ”[177-carton] “ Fashion of speech again ! But , [Mr. Darnay]162-darnay , oblivion is not so easy to [me]177-carton , as [you]162-darnay represent it to be to [you]162-darnay . [I]177-carton have by no means forgotten it , and a light answer does not help [me]177-carton to forget it . ”[177-carton] “ If it was a light answer , ”[177-carton] returned [Darnay]162-darnay , “ [I]177-carton beg [your]162-darnay forgiveness for it . [I]177-carton had no other object than to turn a slight thing , which , to [my]177-carton surprise , seems to trouble [you]162-darnay too much , aside . [I]177-carton declare to [you]162-darnay , on the faith of [a gentleman]5203-a gentleman , that [I]177-carton have long dismissed it from [my]177-carton mind . Good Heaven , what was there to dismiss ! Have [I]177-carton had nothing more important to remember , in the great service [you]162-darnay rendered [me]177-carton that day ? ”[177-carton] “ As to the great service , ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , “ [I]177-carton am bound to avow to [you]162-darnay , when [you]162-darnay speak of it in that way , that it was [mere professional claptrap]6232-mere professional claptrap , [I]177-carton do n’t know that [I]177-carton cared what became of [you]162-darnay , when [I]177-carton rendered it.--Mind ! [I]177-carton say when [I]177-carton rendered it ; [I]177-carton am speaking of the past . ”[177-carton] “ [You]162-darnay make light of the obligation , ”[177-carton] returned [Darnay]162-darnay , “ but [I]177-carton will not quarrel with _ [your]162-darnay _ light answer . ”[177-carton] “ Genuine truth , [Mr. Darnay]162-darnay , trust [me]177-carton ! [I]177-carton have gone aside from [my]177-carton purpose ; [I]177-carton was speaking about [[our]6233-our being [friends]859-friends]6234-our being friends . Now , [you]162-darnay know [me]177-carton ; [you]162-darnay know [I]177-carton am incapable of all the higher and better flights of [men]568-men . If [you]162-darnay doubt it , ask [Stryver]171-mr. stryver , and [he]171-mr. stryver ’ll tell [you]162-darnay so . ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton prefer to form [my]177-carton own opinion , without the aid of [his]171-mr. stryver . ”[177-carton] “ Well ! At any rate [you]162-darnay know [me]177-carton as a dissolute dog , who has never done any good , and never will . ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton do n’t know that [you]162-darnay ‘ never will . ’ ”[177-carton] “ But [I]177-carton do , and [you]162-darnay must take [my]177-carton word for it . Well ! If [you]162-darnay could endure to have such [a worthless fellow]6237-a worthless fellow , and [a fellow of such indifferent reputation , coming and going at odd times]6238-a fellow of such indifferent reputation , coming and going at odd times , [I]177-carton should ask that [I]177-carton might be permitted to come and go as [a privileged person here]6239-a privileged person here ; that [I]177-carton might be regarded as an useless ( and [I]177-carton would add , if it were not for the resemblance [I]177-carton detected between [you]162-darnay and [me]177-carton , [an unornamental ) piece of furniture]6240-an unornamental ) piece of furniture , tolerated for its old service , and taken no notice of . [I]177-carton doubt if [I]177-carton should abuse the permission . It is a hundred to one if [I]177-carton should avail [myself]177-carton of it four times in a year . It would satisfy [me]177-carton , [I]177-carton dare say , to know that [I]177-carton had it . ”[177-carton] “ Will [you]177-carton try ? ”[177-carton] “ That is another way of saying that [I]177-carton am placed on the footing [I]177-carton have indicated . [I]177-carton thank [you]177-carton , [Darnay]162-darnay . [I]177-carton may use that freedom with [your]177-carton name ? ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton think so , [Carton]177-carton , by this time . ”[177-carton] [They]2781-they shook hands upon it , and [Sydney]177-carton turned away . Within a minute afterwards , [he]177-carton was , to all outward appearance , as unsubstantial as ever . When [he]177-carton was gone , and in the course of an evening passed with [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , and [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , [Charles Darnay]162-darnay made some mention of this conversation in general terms , and spoke of [Sydney Carton]177-carton as a problem of carelessness and recklessness . [He]162-darnay spoke of [him]177-carton , in short , not bitterly or meaning to bear hard upon [him]177-carton , but as [anybody]636-anybody might who saw [him]177-carton as [he]177-carton showed [himself]177-carton . [He]162-darnay had no idea that this could dwell in the thoughts of [[his]162-darnay fair young wife]2784-his fair young wife ; but , when [he]162-darnay afterwards joined [her]2784-his fair young wife in [[their]2785-we own rooms]2786-their own rooms , [he]162-darnay found [her]2784-his fair young wife waiting for [him]162-darnay with the old pretty lifting of the forehead strongly marked . “ [We]2785-we are thoughtful to - night ! ”[162-darnay] said [Darnay]162-darnay , drawing [his]162-darnay arm about [her]2784-his fair young wife . “ Yes , dearest [Charles]162-darnay , ”[2784-his fair young wife] with [her]2784-his fair young wife hands on [his]162-darnay breast , and the inquiring and attentive expression fixed upon [him]162-darnay ; “ [we]2785-we are rather thoughtful to - night , for [we]2785-we have something on [our]2785-we mind to - night . ”[2784-his fair young wife] “ What is it , [[my]162-darnay [Lucie]174-lucie]6241-my lucie ? ”[162-darnay] “ Will [you]162-darnay promise not to press one question on [me]162-darnay , if [I]162-darnay beg [you]162-darnay not to ask it ? ”[162-darnay] “ Will [I]162-darnay promise ? What will [I]162-darnay not promise to [my]162-darnay Love ? ”[162-darnay] What , indeed , with [his]162-darnay hand putting aside the golden hair from the cheek , and [his]162-darnay other hand against the heart that beat for [him]162-darnay ! “ [I]162-darnay think , [Charles]162-darnay , [poor Mr. Carton]172-carton deserves more consideration and respect than [you]162-darnay expressed for [him]172-carton to - night . ”[162-darnay] “ Indeed , [my]162-darnay own ? Why so ? ”[162-darnay] “ That is what [you]162-darnay are not to ask [me]162-darnay . But [I]162-darnay think -- [I]162-darnay know -- [he]172-carton does . ”[162-darnay] “ If [you]162-darnay know it , it is enough . What would [you]162-darnay have [me]162-darnay do , [my]162-darnay Life ? ”[162-darnay] “ [I]162-darnay would ask [you]162-darnay , dearest , to be very generous with [him]172-carton always , and very lenient on [his]172-carton faults when [he]172-carton is not by . [I]162-darnay would ask [you]162-darnay to believe that [he]172-carton has a heart [he]172-carton very , very seldom reveals , and that there are deep wounds in it . [[My]162-darnay dear]5097-my dear , [I]162-darnay have seen it bleeding . ”[162-darnay] “ It is a painful reflection to [me]162-darnay , ”[162-darnay] said [Charles Darnay]162-darnay , quite astounded , “ that [I]162-darnay should have done [him]172-carton any wrong . [I]162-darnay never thought this of [him]172-carton . ”[162-darnay] “ [[My]2787-her husband]5455-my husband , it is so . [I]2787-her fear [he]172-carton is not to be reclaimed ; there is scarcely a hope that anything in [his]172-carton character or fortunes is reparable now . But , [I]2787-her am sure that [he]172-carton is capable of good things , gentle things , even magnanimous things . ”[2787-her] [She]2787-her looked so beautiful in the purity of [her]2787-her faith in [this lost man]2788-this lost man , that [[her]2787-her husband]770-her husband could have looked at [her]2787-her as [she]2787-her was for hours . “ And , O [[my]2787-her dearest]6244-my dearest Love ! ”[2787-her] [she]2787-her urged , clinging nearer to [him]770-her husband , laying [her]2787-her head upon [his]770-her husband breast , and raising [her]2787-her eyes to [his]770-her husband , “ remember how strong [we]6245-we are in [our]6245-we happiness , and how weak [he]770-her husband is in [his]770-her husband misery ! ”[2787-her] The supplication touched [him]770-her husband [home]858-home . “ [I]770-her husband will always remember it , [dear Heart]6246-dear heart ! [I]770-her husband will remember it as long as [I]770-her husband live . ”[770-her husband] [He]770-her husband bent over the golden head , and put the rosy lips to [his]770-her husband , and folded [her]2787-her in [his]770-her husband arms . If [one forlorn wanderer]2791-one forlorn wanderer then pacing [the dark streets]2792-the dark streets , could have heard [her]2787-her innocent disclosure , and could have seen the drops of pity kissed away by [[her]2787-her husband]770-her husband from the soft blue eyes so loving of [that husband]2794-that husband , [he]770-her husband might have cried to the night -- and the words would not have parted from [his]770-her husband lips for the first time-- “ God bless [her]2787-her for [her]2787-her sweet compassion ! ”[770-her husband] CHAPTER XXI . Echoing Footsteps A wonderful corner for echoes , it has been remarked , [that corner where [the Doctor]1514-the doctor lived . Ever busily winding the golden thread which bound [[her]2787-her husband]770-her husband]2795-that corner where the doctor lived . ever busily winding the golden thread which bound her husband , and [[her]2787-her father]5008-her father , and [herself]2787-her , and [[her]2787-her old directress]2799-her old directress and companion , in a life of quiet bliss , [Lucie]174-lucie sat in [the still house]2800-the still house in [the tranquilly resounding corner]2801-the tranquilly resounding corner , listening to the echoing footsteps of years . At first , there were times , though [she]174-lucie was [a perfectly happy young wife]2802-a perfectly happy young wife , when [her]174-lucie work would slowly fall from [her]174-lucie hands , and [her]174-lucie eyes would be dimmed . For , there was something coming in the echoes , something light , afar off , and scarcely audible yet , that stirred [her]2787-her heart too much . Fluttering hopes and doubts -- hopes , of a love as yet unknown to [her]2787-her : doubts , of [her]2787-her remaining upon [earth]1323-earth , to enjoy that new delight -- divided [her]2787-her breast . Among the echoes then , there would arise the sound of footsteps at [her]2787-her own early grave ; and thoughts of [the husband who would be left so desolate , and who would mourn for [her]2787-her so much]2804-the husband who would be left so desolate , and who would mourn for her so much , swelled to [her]2787-her eyes , and broke like waves . That time passed , and [her]2787-her little [Lucie]174-lucie lay on [her]2787-her bosom . Then , among the advancing echoes , there was the tread of [her]174-lucie tiny feet and the sound of [her]174-lucie prattling words . Let greater echoes resound as [they]2805-they would , [the young mother at the cradle side]2806-the young mother at the cradle side could always hear those coming . [They]2805-they came , and [the shady house]2807-the shady house was sunny with [a child]894-a child ’s laugh , and [the Divine friend of [children]683-children , to whom in [her]174-lucie trouble [she]174-lucie had confided [hers]174-lucie]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers , seemed to take [[her]174-lucie child]689-her child in [his]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers arms , as [He]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers took [the child of old]2812-the child of old , and made it a sacred joy to [her]174-lucie . Ever busily winding the golden thread that bound [them]2813-them all together , weaving the service of [her]174-lucie happy influence through the tissue of all [their]2813-them lives , and making it predominate nowhere , [Lucie]174-lucie heard in the echoes of years none but friendly and soothing sounds . [[Her]174-lucie husband]770-her husband ’s step was strong and prosperous among [them]2813-them ; [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father ’s firm and equal . [Lo]228-lo , [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , in harness of string , awakening the echoes , as [an unruly charger , whip - corrected]2816-an unruly charger , whip - corrected , snorting and pawing the earth under the plane - tree in [the garden]1626-the garden ! Even when there were sounds of sorrow among the rest , they were not harsh nor cruel . Even when golden hair , like [her]174-lucie own , lay in a halo on a pillow round the worn face of [a little boy]2818-a little boy , and [he]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers said , with a radiant smile , “ [Dear papa]6247-dear papa and [mamma]6248-mamma , [I]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers am very sorry to leave [you]2819-his young mother both , and to leave [[my]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers pretty sister]6249-my pretty sister ; but [I]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers am called , and [I]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers must go ! ”[2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers] those were not tears all of agony that wetted [[his]2809-the divine friend of children , to whom in her trouble she had confided hers young mother]2819-his young mother ’s cheek , as the spirit departed from [her]2819-his young mother embrace that had been entrusted to it . Suffer [them]2820-them and forbid [them]2820-them not . [They]2820-them see [[my]0-i Father]4969-my father ’s face . [O Father]202-father , blessed words ! Thus , the rustling of [an Angel]2822-an angel ’s wings got blended with the other echoes , and they were not wholly of [earth]1323-earth , but had in [them]2820-them that breath of Heaven . Sighs of the winds that blew over [a little garden - tomb]2824-a little garden - tomb were mingled with [them]2820-them also , and both were audible to [Lucie]174-lucie , in a hushed murmur -- like the breathing of a summer sea asleep upon [a sandy shore]2825-a sandy shore -- as [the little Lucie]2826-the little lucie , comically studious at the task of the morning , or dressing a doll at [[her]174-lucie mother]5561-her mother ’s footstool , chattered in the tongues of [the Two Cities]2828-the two cities that were blended in [her]174-lucie life . [The Echoes]229-the echoes rarely answered to the actual tread of [Sydney Carton]177-carton . Some half - dozen times a year , at most , [he]177-carton claimed [his]177-carton privilege of coming in uninvited , and would sit among [them]2820-them through the evening , as [he]177-carton had once done often . [He]177-carton never came [there]4887-there heated with wine . And one other thing regarding [him]177-carton was whispered in the echoes , which has been whispered by [all true echoes]2830-all true echoes for ages and ages . [No man]1866-no man ever really loved [a woman]1959-a woman , lost [her]1959-a woman , and knew [her]1959-a woman with a blameless though an unchanged mind , when [she]1959-a woman was [a wife]2833-a wife and [a mother]1738-a mother , but [[her]1959-a woman children]2683-her children had a strange sympathy with [him]177-carton -- an instinctive delicacy of pity for [him]177-carton . What fine hidden sensibilities are touched in such a case , no echoes tell ; but it is so , and it was so here . [Carton]177-carton was [the first stranger to whom [little Lucie]174-lucie]2836-the first stranger to whom little lucie held out [her]174-lucie chubby arms , and [he]177-carton kept [his]177-carton place with [her]174-lucie as [she]174-lucie grew . [The little boy]2837-the little boy had spoken of [him]177-carton , almost at the last . “ [Poor Carton]230-poor carton ! Kiss [him]177-carton for [me]2837-the little boy ! ”[2837-the little boy] [Mr. Stryver]171-mr. stryver shouldered [his]171-mr. stryver way through the law , like some great engine forcing itself through turbid water , and dragged [[his]171-mr. stryver useful friend]2838-his useful friend in [his]171-mr. stryver wake , like [a boat towed astern]2839-a boat towed astern . As [the boat]2840-the boat so favoured is usually in a rough plight , and mostly under water , so , [Sydney]177-carton had a swamped life of it . But , easy and strong custom , unhappily so much easier and stronger in [him]171-mr. stryver than any stimulating sense of desert or disgrace , made it the life [he]171-mr. stryver was to lead ; and [he]171-mr. stryver no more thought of emerging from [his]171-mr. stryver state of lion ’s jackal , than [any real jackal]2841-any real jackal may be supposed to think of rising to be a lion . [Stryver]171-mr. stryver was rich ; had married [a florid widow]2842-a florid widow with property and [three boys]2843-three boys , who had nothing particularly shining about [them]2843-three boys but the straight hair of [their]2843-three boys dumpling heads . [These three young gentlemen]2844-these three young gentlemen , [Mr. Stryver]171-mr. stryver , exuding patronage of the most offensive quality from every pore , had walked before [him]171-mr. stryver like three sheep to the quiet corner in [Soho]58-soho , and had offered as [pupils]2845-pupils to [[Lucie]174-lucie ’s husband]2846-lucie ’s husband : delicately saying “ [Halloa]129-halloa ! here are three lumps of bread - and - cheese towards [your]171-mr. stryver matrimonial picnic , [Darnay]162-darnay ! ”[2845-pupils] The polite rejection of the three lumps of bread - and - cheese had quite bloated [Mr. Stryver]171-mr. stryver with indignation , which [he]171-mr. stryver afterwards turned to account in the training of [the young gentlemen]2847-the young gentlemen , by directing [them]2847-the young gentlemen to beware of the pride of [Beggars]2848-beggars , like [that tutor - fellow]2849-that tutor - fellow . [He]171-mr. stryver was also in the habit of declaiming to [Mrs. Stryver]231-mrs. stryver , over [his]171-mr. stryver full - bodied wine , on the arts [Mrs. Darnay]232-darnay had once put in practice to “ catch ”[232-darnay] [him]171-mr. stryver , and on the diamond - cut - diamond arts in [himself]171-mr. stryver , [madam]2850-madam , which had rendered [him]171-mr. stryver “ not to be caught . ”[2850-madam] Some of [[his]171-mr. stryver King]2851-his king ’s [Bench familiars , who were occasionally parties to the full - bodied wine and the lie]2852-bench familiars , who were occasionally parties to the full - bodied wine and the lie , excused [him]171-mr. stryver for the latter by saying that [he]171-mr. stryver had told it so often , that [he]171-mr. stryver believed it [himself]171-mr. stryver -- which is surely such an incorrigible aggravation of an originally bad offence , as to justify [any such offender]2853-any such offender ’s being carried off to [some suitably retired spot]2854-some suitably retired spot , and there hanged out of the way . These were among the echoes to which [Lucie]174-lucie , sometimes pensive , sometimes amused and laughing , listened in the echoing corner , until [[her]174-lucie little daughter]2855-her little daughter was six years old . How near to [her]174-lucie heart the echoes of [[her]174-lucie child]689-her child ’s tread came , and those of [her]174-lucie own dear father ’s , always active and self - possessed , and those of [[her]174-lucie dear husband]2857-her dear husband ’s , need not be told . Nor , how the lightest echo of [[their]2858-their united home]2859-their united home , directed by [herself]174-lucie with such a wise and elegant thrift that it was more abundant than any waste , was music to [her]174-lucie . Nor , how there were echoes all about [her]174-lucie , sweet in [her]174-lucie ears , of the many times [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father had told [her]174-lucie that [he]5008-her father found [her]174-lucie more devoted to [him]5008-her father married ( if that could be ) than single , and of the many times [[her]174-lucie husband]770-her husband had said to [her]174-lucie that no cares and duties seemed to divide [her]174-lucie love for [him]5008-her father or [her]174-lucie help to [him]5008-her father , and asked [her]174-lucie “ What is the magic secret , [[my]174-lucie darling]2648-my darling , of [your]2648-my darling being everything to all of [us]6251-us , as if there were only one of [us]6251-us , yet never seeming to be hurried , or to have too much to do ? ”[174-lucie] But , there were other echoes , from a distance , that rumbled menacingly in the corner all through this space of time . And it was now , about [little Lucie]174-lucie ’s sixth birthday , that they began to have an awful sound , as of a great storm in [France]2-france with a dreadful sea rising . On a night in mid - July , [one thousand seven hundred and eighty - nine]2862-one thousand seven hundred and eighty - nine , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry came in late , from [Tellson]134-tellson ’s , and sat [himself]133-mr. lorry down by [Lucie]174-lucie and [[her]174-lucie husband]770-her husband in the dark window . It was a hot , wild night , and [they]2864-they were all three reminded of the old Sunday night when [they]2864-they had looked at the lightning from [the same place]2865-the same place . “ [I]133-mr. lorry began to think , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , pushing [his]133-mr. lorry brown wig back , “ that [I]133-mr. lorry should have to pass the night at [Tellson ’s]134-tellson . [We]6251-us have been so full of business all day , that [we]6251-us have not known what to do first , or which way to turn . There is such an uneasiness in [Paris]7-paris , that [we]6251-us have actually a run of confidence upon [us]6251-us ! [[Our]6251-us customers]4940-our customers over there , seem not to be able to confide [[their]4940-our customers property]6253-their property to [us]6251-us fast enough . There is positively a mania among [some of [them]4940-our customers]6254-some of them for sending it to [England]1-england . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ That has a bad look , ”[233-darnay--] said [Darnay--]233-darnay-- “ A bad look , [you]232-darnay say , [[my]233-darnay-- dear]5097-my dear [Darnay]232-darnay ? Yes , but [we]6251-us do n’t know what reason there is in it . [People]360-people are so unreasonable ! Some of [us]6251-us at [Tellson]134-tellson ’s are getting old , and [we]6251-us really ca n’t be troubled out of the ordinary course without due occasion . ”[233-darnay--] “ Still , ”[232-darnay] said [Darnay]232-darnay , “ [you]232-darnay know how gloomy and threatening the sky is . ”[232-darnay] “ [I]133-mr. lorry know that , to be sure , ”[133-mr. lorry] assented [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , trying to persuade [himself]133-mr. lorry that [his]133-mr. lorry sweet temper was soured , and that [he]133-mr. lorry grumbled , “ but [I]133-mr. lorry am determined to be peevish after [my]133-mr. lorry long day ’s botheration . Where is [Manette]174-lucie ? ”[133-mr. lorry] “ Here [he]6257-he is , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , entering [the dark room]2867-the dark room at the moment . “ [I]1514-the doctor am quite glad [you]232-darnay are at [home]858-home ; for these hurries and forebodings by which [I]1514-the doctor have been surrounded all day long , have made [me]1514-the doctor nervous without reason . [You]232-darnay are not going out , [I]1514-the doctor hope ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ No ; [I]1514-the doctor am going to play backgammon with [you]232-darnay , if [you]232-darnay like , ”[1514-the doctor] said [the Doctor]1514-the doctor . “ [I]1514-the doctor do n’t think [I]1514-the doctor do like , if [I]1514-the doctor may speak [my]1514-the doctor mind . [I]1514-the doctor am not fit to be pitted against [you]232-darnay to - night . Is the teaboard still there , [Lucie]174-lucie ? [I]1514-the doctor ca n’t see . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Of course , it has been kept for [you]232-darnay . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Thank [ye]232-darnay , [[my]1514-the doctor dear]5097-my dear . [The precious child]6260-the precious child is safe in bed ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ And sleeping soundly . ”[1514-the doctor] “ That ’s right ; all safe and well ! [I]1514-the doctor do n’t know why anything should be otherwise than safe and well [here]4902-here , thank [God]149-god ; but [I]1514-the doctor have been so put out all day , and [I]1514-the doctor am not as young as [I]1514-the doctor was ! [My]1514-the doctor tea , [[my]1514-the doctor dear]5097-my dear ! Thank [ye]232-darnay . Now , come and take [your]232-darnay place in the circle , and let [us]6263-us sit quiet , and hear the echoes about which [you]232-darnay have [your]232-darnay theory . ”[1514-the doctor] “ Not a theory ; it was a fancy . ”[1514-the doctor] “ A fancy , then , [[my]133-mr. lorry wise pet]6264-my wise pet , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , patting [her]2869-her hand . “ [They]2871-they are very numerous and very loud , though , are [they]2871-they not ? Only hear them ! ”[133-mr. lorry] Headlong , mad , and dangerous footsteps to force their way into [anybody]636-anybody ’s life , footsteps not easily made clean again if once stained red , the footsteps raging in [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine afar off , as the little circle sat in the dark [London]3-london window . [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine had been , that morning , a vast dusky mass of scarecrows heaving to and fro , with frequent gleams of light above the billowy heads , where steel blades and bayonets shone in the sun . A tremendous roar arose from the throat of [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine , and a forest of naked arms struggled in the air like shrivelled branches of trees in a winter wind : all the fingers convulsively clutching at every weapon or semblance of a weapon that was thrown up from the depths below , no matter how far off . Who gave [them]2871-they out , whence [they]2871-they last came , where [they]2871-they began , through what agency [they]2871-they crookedly quivered and jerked , scores at a time , over the heads of [the crowd]1386-the crowd , like a kind of lightning , [no eye in the throng]2873-no eye in the throng could have told ; but , muskets were being distributed -- so were cartridges , powder , and ball , bars of iron and wood , knives , axes , pikes , every weapon that distracted ingenuity could discover or devise . [People who could lay hold of nothing else]2874-people who could lay hold of nothing else , set [themselves]2874-people who could lay hold of nothing else with bleeding hands to force stones and bricks out of [their]2874-people who could lay hold of nothing else places in walls . Every pulse and heart in [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine was on high - fever strain and at high - fever heat . [Every living creature there held life as of no account]2875-every living creature there held life as of no account , and was demented with a passionate readiness to sacrifice it . As [a whirlpool of boiling waters]2876-a whirlpool of boiling waters has a centre point , so , all this raging circled round [[Defarge]146-madame defarge ’s wine - shop]2877-defarge ’s wine - shop , and every human drop in the caldron had a tendency to be sucked towards [the vortex where [Defarge]146-madame defarge [himself]146-madame defarge , already begrimed with gunpowder and sweat]2878-the vortex where defarge himself , already begrimed with gunpowder and sweat , issued orders , issued arms , thrust [this man]5081-this man back , dragged [this man]5081-this man forward , disarmed [one to arm another]2881-one to arm another , laboured and strove in the thickest of the uproar . “ Keep near to [me]146-madame defarge , [Jacques Three]148-jacques , ”[146-madame defarge] cried [Defarge]146-madame defarge ; “ and do [you]148-jacques , [Jacques One]148-jacques and Two , separate and put [yourselves]148-jacques at the head of as many of [these patriots]6265-these patriots as [you]148-jacques can . Where is [[my]146-madame defarge wife]5044-my wife ? ”[146-madame defarge] “ Eh , well ! Here [you]148-jacques see [me]5936-madame ! ”[5936-madame] said [madame]5936-madame , composed as ever , but not knitting to - day . [Madame]146-madame defarge ’s resolute right hand was occupied with an axe , in place of the usual softer implements , and in [her]146-madame defarge girdle were a pistol and a cruel knife . “ Where do [you]146-madame defarge go , [[my]5936-madame wife]5044-my wife ? ”[5936-madame] “ [I]5936-madame go , ”[5936-madame] said [madame]5936-madame , “ with [you]148-jacques at present . [You]148-jacques shall see [me]5936-madame at the head of [women]671-women , by - and - bye . ”[5936-madame] “ Come , then ! ”[146-madame defarge] cried [Defarge]146-madame defarge , in a resounding voice . “ [Patriots]6269-patriots and [friends]859-friends , [we]6271-we are ready ! [The Bastille]86-the bastille ! ”[146-madame defarge] With a roar that sounded as if all the breath in [France]2-france had been shaped into the detested word , [the living sea]2884-the living sea rose , [wave on wave , depth on depth]2885-wave on wave , depth on depth , and overflowed [the city]1496-the city to that point . Alarm - bells ringing , drums beating , [the sea]599-the sea raging and thundering on [its]599-the sea new beach , the attack began . Deep ditches , [double drawbridge]2888-double drawbridge , massive stone walls , [eight great towers]2889-eight great towers , cannon , muskets , fire and smoke . Through the fire and through the smoke -- in the fire and in the smoke , for [the sea]599-the sea cast [him]2891-his up against a cannon , and on the instant [he]2891-his became [a cannonier -- Defarge of the wine - shop]2892-a cannonier -- defarge of the wine - shop worked like [a manful soldier]2893-a manful soldier , Two fierce hours . [Deep ditch]2894-deep ditch , single drawbridge , massive stone walls , [eight great towers]2889-eight great towers , cannon , muskets , fire and smoke . [One drawbridge]2896-one drawbridge down ! “ Work , [comrades all]6272-comrades all , work ! Work , [Jacques One]212-jacques one , [Jacques Two]210-jacques two , [Jacques One Thousand]212-jacques one , [Jacques Two Thousand]210-jacques two , [Jacques]210-jacques two Five - and - Twenty Thousand ; in the name of all [the Angels]6273-the angels or [the Devils]6274-the devils -- which [you]6275-you prefer -- work ! ”[2892-a cannonier -- defarge of the wine - shop] Thus Defarge of [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop , still at [his]2891-his gun , which had long grown hot . “ To [me]146-madame defarge , [women]671-women ! ”[146-madame defarge] cried [madame]146-madame defarge [[his]2891-his wife]4987-his wife . “ What !
