[He]133-mr. lorry was happy in the return [he]133-mr. lorry had made [her]4987-his wife , [he]133-mr. lorry was recompensed for [his]133-mr. lorry suffering , [he]133-mr. lorry was proud of [his]133-mr. lorry strength . “ [You]4987-his wife must not be weak , [[my]133-mr. lorry darling]2648-my darling , ”[133-mr. lorry] [he]133-mr. lorry remonstrated ; “ do n’t tremble so . [I]133-mr. lorry have saved [him]133-mr. lorry . ”[133-mr. lorry] CHAPTER VII . [A Knock at the Door]3962-a knock at the door “ [I]3962-a knock at the door have saved [him]133-mr. lorry . ”[3962-a knock at the door] It was not another of the dreams in which [he]133-mr. lorry had often come back ; [he]133-mr. lorry was really [here]4902-here . And yet [[his]133-mr. lorry wife]4987-his wife trembled , and a vague but heavy fear was upon [her]4987-his wife . All the air round was so thick and dark , [the people]717-the people were so passionately revengeful and fitful , [the innocent]3966-the innocent were so constantly put to death on vague suspicion and black malice , it was so impossible to forget that many as blameless as [[her]4987-his wife husband]770-her husband and as dear to [others]672-others as [he]133-mr. lorry was to [her]4987-his wife , every day shared the fate from which [he]133-mr. lorry had been clutched , that [her]4987-his wife heart could not be as lightened of its load as [she]4987-his wife felt it ought to be . The shadows of the wintry afternoon were beginning to fall , and even now [the dreadful carts]3969-the dreadful carts were rolling through [the streets]732-the streets . [Her]4987-his wife mind pursued [them]3969-the dreadful carts , looking for [him]133-mr. lorry among [the Condemned]3971-the condemned ; and then [she]4987-his wife clung closer to [his]133-mr. lorry real presence and trembled more . [[Her]4987-his wife father]5008-her father , cheering [her]4987-his wife , showed a compassionate superiority to [this woman]3973-this woman ’s weakness , which was wonderful to see . [No garret]3974-no garret , no shoemaking , [no One Hundred and Five]3975-no one hundred and five , [North Tower]29-north tower , now ! [He]133-mr. lorry had accomplished the task [he]133-mr. lorry had set [himself]133-mr. lorry , [his]133-mr. lorry promise was redeemed , [he]133-mr. lorry had saved [Charles]162-darnay . Let [them]3976-them all lean upon [him]133-mr. lorry . [[Their]3976-them housekeeping]3977-their housekeeping was of a very frugal kind : not only because that was the safest way of life , involving the least offence to [the people]717-the people , but because [they]3976-them were not rich , and [Charles]162-darnay , throughout [his]162-darnay imprisonment , had had to pay heavily for [his]162-darnay bad food , and for [his]162-darnay guard , and towards the living of [the poorer prisoners]3979-the poorer prisoners . Partly on this account , and partly to avoid [a domestic spy]3980-a domestic spy , [they]3976-them kept [no servant]3981-no servant ; [the citizen]3879-the citizen and citizeness who acted as [porters at the courtyard gate]3983-porters at the courtyard gate , rendered [them]3976-them occasional service ; and [Jerry]133-mr. lorry ( almost wholly transferred to [them]3976-them by [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ) had become [[their]3976-them daily retainer]3984-their daily retainer , and had [his]133-mr. lorry bed [there]4887-there every night . It was an ordinance of the Republic One and Indivisible of Liberty , Equality , Fraternity , or Death , that on the door or doorpost of [every house]3986-every house , the name of [every inmate]3987-every inmate must be legibly inscribed in letters of a certain size , at a certain convenient height from the ground . [Mr. Jerry Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher ’s name , therefore , duly embellished the doorpost down below ; and , as the afternoon shadows deepened , [the owner of that name]3988-the owner of that name [himself]3988-the owner of that name appeared , from overlooking [a painter whom [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette had employed to add to the list the name of [Charles Evrémonde]248-charles evrémonde , called [Darnay]162-darnay]3989-a painter whom doctor manette had employed to add to the list the name of charles evrémonde , called darnay . In the universal fear and distrust that darkened the time , all the usual harmless ways of life were changed . In [[the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s little household]3991-the doctor ’s little household , as in very many others , the articles of daily consumption that were wanted were purchased every evening , in small quantities and at [various small shops]3992-various small shops . To avoid attracting notice , and to give as little occasion as possible for talk and envy , was the general desire . For some months past , [Miss Pross]183-miss pross and [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher had discharged [the office of [purveyors]3994-purveyors]3993-the office of purveyors ; [the former]6554-the former carrying the money ; the latter , the basket . Every afternoon at about the time when the public lamps were lighted , [they]3996-they fared forth on this duty , and made and brought [home]858-home such purchases as were needful . Although [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , through [her]183-miss pross long association with [a French family]3998-a french family , might have known as much of [their]3998-a french family language as of [her]183-miss pross own , if [she]183-miss pross had had a mind , [she]183-miss pross had no mind in that direction ; consequently [she]183-miss pross knew no more of that “ nonsense ”[183-miss pross] ( as [she]183-miss pross was pleased to call it ) than [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher did . So [her]183-miss pross manner of marketing was to plump a noun - substantive at the head of [a shopkeeper]3999-a shopkeeper without any introduction in the nature of an article , and , if it happened not to be the name of the thing [she]183-miss pross wanted , to look round for that thing , lay hold of it , and hold on by it until the bargain was concluded . [She]183-miss pross always made a bargain for it , by holding up , as a statement of its just price , one finger less than [the merchant]4000-the merchant held up , whatever [his]4000-the merchant number might be . “ Now , [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , whose eyes were red with felicity ; “ if [you]156-mr. cruncher are ready , [I]156-mr. cruncher am . ”[156-mr. cruncher] [Jerry]156-mr. cruncher hoarsely professed [himself]156-mr. cruncher at [Miss Pross]183-miss pross ’s service . [He]156-mr. cruncher had worn all [his]156-mr. cruncher rust off long ago , but nothing would file [his]156-mr. cruncher spiky head down . “ There ’s all manner of things wanted , ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , “ and [we]6881-we shall have a precious time of it . [We]6881-we want wine , among the rest . Nice toasts [these Redheads]6882-these redheads will be drinking , wherever [we]6881-we buy it . ”[183-miss pross] “ It will be much the same to [your]183-miss pross knowledge , [miss]4912-miss , [I]156-mr. cruncher should think , ”[156-mr. cruncher] retorted [Jerry]156-mr. cruncher , “ whether [they]6882-these redheads drink [your]183-miss pross health or [the Old Un]265-the old un ’s . ”[156-mr. cruncher] “ Who ’s [he]265-the old un ? ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross . [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , with some diffidence , explained [himself]156-mr. cruncher as meaning “ [Old Nick]266-old nick ’s . ”[156-mr. cruncher] “ Ha ! ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , “ it does n’t need [an interpreter]6884-an interpreter to explain the meaning of these creatures . [They]6882-these redheads have but one , and it ’s [Midnight Murder]267-midnight murder , and [Mischief]268-mischief . ”[183-miss pross] “ Hush , [dear]2699-dear ! Pray , pray , be cautious ! ”[174-lucie] cried [Lucie]174-lucie . “ Yes , yes , yes , [I]174-lucie ’ll be cautious , ”[174-lucie] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross ; “ but [I]183-miss pross may say among [ourselves]6886-ourselves , that [I]183-miss pross do hope there will be no oniony and tobaccoey smotherings in the form of embracings all round , going on in [the streets]732-the streets . Now , [Ladybird]184-ladybird , never [you]184-ladybird stir from that fire till [I]183-miss pross come back ! Take care of [the dear husband [you]184-ladybird have recovered]6888-the dear husband you have recovered , and do n’t move [your]184-ladybird pretty head from [his]6888-the dear husband you have recovered shoulder as [you]184-ladybird have it now , till [you]184-ladybird see [me]183-miss pross again ! May [I]183-miss pross ask a question , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , before [I]183-miss pross go ? ”[183-miss pross] “ [I]1514-the doctor think [you]184-ladybird may take that liberty , ”[1514-the doctor] [the Doctor]1514-the doctor answered , smiling . “ For gracious sake , do n’t talk about Liberty ; [we]6889-we have quite enough of that , ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross . “ Hush , [dear]2699-dear ! Again ? ”[174-lucie] [Lucie]174-lucie remonstrated . “ Well , [[my]183-miss pross sweet]6891-my sweet , ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , nodding [her]183-miss pross head emphatically , “ the short and the long of it is , that [I]183-miss pross am a subject of [His]6888-the dear husband you have recovered Most Gracious Majesty [King George the Third]169-george the third ; ”[183-miss pross] [Miss Pross]183-miss pross curtseyed at the name ; “ and as such , [my]183-miss pross maxim is , Confound [their]6892-their politics , Frustrate [their]6892-their knavish tricks , On [him]6888-the dear husband you have recovered [our]6889-we hopes [we]6889-we fix , [God]149-god save [the King]4850-the king ! ”[183-miss pross] [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , in an access of loyalty , growlingly repeated the words after [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , like somebody at [church]6132-church . “ [I]183-miss pross am glad [you]183-miss pross have so much of [the Englishman]6894-the englishman in [you]183-miss pross , though [I]183-miss pross wish [you]183-miss pross had never taken that cold in [your]183-miss pross voice , ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , approvingly . “ But the question , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . Is there”--it[183-miss pross] was [the good creature]4003-the good creature ’s way to affect to make light of anything that was a great anxiety with [them]4004-our all , and to come at it in this chance manner--“is there any prospect yet , of [our]4004-our getting out of [this place]6772-this place ? ”[183-miss pross] “ [I]183-miss pross fear not yet . It would be dangerous for [Charles]248-charles evrémonde yet . ”[183-miss pross] “ Heigh - ho - hum ! ”[183-miss pross] said [Miss Pross]183-miss pross , cheerfully repressing a sigh as [she]183-miss pross glanced at [[her]183-miss pross darling]1608-her darling ’s golden hair in the light of the fire , “ then [we]4004-our must have patience and wait : that ’s all . [We]4004-our must hold up [our]4004-our heads and fight low , as [[my]183-miss pross brother]5369-my brother [Solomon]186-solomon used to say . Now , [Mr. Cruncher!--Don’t]269-mr. cruncher!--don’t [you]1608-her darling move , [Ladybird]184-ladybird ! ”[183-miss pross] [They]4004-our went out , leaving [Lucie]174-lucie , and [[her]174-lucie husband]770-her husband , [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father , and [the child]3495-the child , by a bright fire . [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry was expected back presently from [the Banking House]117-the banking house . [Miss Pross]183-miss pross had lighted the lamp , but had put it aside in a corner , that [they]4004-our might enjoy the fire - light undisturbed . [Little Lucie]174-lucie sat by [[her]174-lucie grandfather]4009-her grandfather with [her]174-lucie hands clasped through [his]4009-her grandfather arm : and [he]4009-her grandfather , in a tone not rising much above a whisper , began to tell [her]174-lucie a story of [a great and powerful Fairy who had opened a prison - wall and let out [a captive who had once done [the Fairy]271-the fairy]4011-a captive who had once done the fairy a service]4010-a great and powerful fairy who had opened a prison - wall and let out a captive who had once done the fairy a service . All was subdued and quiet , and [Lucie]174-lucie was more at ease than [she]174-lucie had been . “ What is that ? ”[174-lucie] [she]174-lucie cried , all at once . “ [[My]5008-her father dear]5097-my dear ! ”[5008-her father] said [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father , stopping in [his]5008-her father story , and laying [his]5008-her father hand on [hers]174-lucie , “ command [yourself]174-lucie . What a disordered state [you]174-lucie are in ! The least thing -- nothing -- startles [you]174-lucie ! _ [You]174-lucie _ , [[[your]174-lucie father]4947-your father ’s daughter]6899-your father ’s daughter ! ”[5008-her father] “ [I]174-lucie thought , [[my]174-lucie father]4969-my father , ”[174-lucie] said [Lucie]174-lucie , excusing [herself]174-lucie , with a pale face and in a faltering voice , “ that [I]174-lucie heard strange feet upon the stairs . ”[174-lucie] “ [[My]5008-her father love]494-my love , the staircase is as still as [Death]128-death . ”[5008-her father] As [he]5008-her father said the word , a blow was struck upon the door . “ Oh [father]5144-father , [father]5144-father . What can this be ! Hide [Charles]248-charles evrémonde . Let [me]1514-the doctor go to the door . ”[1514-the doctor] [He]5008-her father took the lamp in [his]5008-her father hand , crossed [the two intervening outer rooms]4014-the two intervening outer rooms , and opened it . A rude clattering of feet over the floor , and [four rough men in red caps , armed with sabres and pistols]4015-four rough men in red caps , armed with sabres and pistols , entered [the room]565-the room . “ [The Citizen Evrémonde]272-evrémonde , called [Darnay]162-darnay , ”[1574-the first] said [the first]1574-the first . “ Who seeks [him]248-charles evrémonde ? ”[1574-the first] answered [Darnay]162-darnay . “ [I]4018-the four seek [him]248-charles evrémonde . [You]272-evrémonde are again [the prisoner of [the Republic]3844-the republic]6907-the prisoner of the republic . ”[4018-the four] [The four]4018-the four surrounded [him]162-darnay , where [he]162-darnay stood with [[his]162-darnay wife]4987-his wife and [child]5132-child clinging to [him]162-darnay . “ Tell [me]4018-the four how and why am [I]4018-the four again [a prisoner]6306-a prisoner ? ”[4018-the four] “ It is enough that [you]170-doctor manette return straight to [the Conciergerie]6868-the conciergerie , and will know to - morrow . [You]170-doctor manette are summoned for to - morrow . ”[170-doctor manette] [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , whom [this visitation had so turned into stone]4021-this visitation had so turned into stone , that [he]170-doctor manette stood with the lamp in [his]170-doctor manette hand , as if [he]170-doctor manette were a statue made to hold it , moved after these words were spoken , put the lamp down , and confronting [the speaker]865-the speaker , and taking [him]170-doctor manette , not ungently , by the loose front of [his]170-doctor manette red woollen shirt , said : “ [You]170-doctor manette know [him]170-doctor manette , [you]170-doctor manette have said . Do [you]170-doctor manette know [me]170-doctor manette ? ”[170-doctor manette] “ Yes , [I]170-doctor manette know [you]170-doctor manette , [Citizen Doctor]6911-citizen doctor . ”[170-doctor manette] “ [We]5923-the other three all know [you]170-doctor manette , [Citizen Doctor]6911-citizen doctor , ”[5923-the other three] said [the other three]5923-the other three . [He]170-doctor manette looked abstractedly from one to another , and said , in a lower voice , after a pause : “ Will [you]170-doctor manette answer [his]170-doctor manette question to [me]170-doctor manette then ? How does this happen ? ”[170-doctor manette] “ [Citizen Doctor]273-citizen doctor , ”[1574-the first] said [the first]1574-the first , reluctantly , “ [he]170-doctor manette has been denounced to [the Section of [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine]6913-the section of saint antoine . [This citizen]6914-this citizen , ”[1574-the first] pointing out [the second who had entered]4025-the second who had entered , “ is from [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine . ”[1574-the first] [The citizen here]4026-the citizen here indicated nodded [his]4026-the citizen here head , and added : “ [He]170-doctor manette is accused by [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine . ”[4026-the citizen here] “ Of what ? ”[1514-the doctor] asked [the Doctor]1514-the doctor . “ [Citizen Doctor]6911-citizen doctor , ”[1574-the first] said [the first]1574-the first , with [his]1574-the first former reluctance , “ ask no more . If [the Republic]3844-the republic demands sacrifices from [you]1514-the doctor , without doubt [you]1514-the doctor as [a good patriot]6917-a good patriot will be happy to make [them]6918-them . [The Republic]274-the republic goes before all . [The People]275-the people is supreme . Evrémonde , [we]6919-we are pressed . ”[1574-the first] “ One word , ”[1514-the doctor] [the Doctor]1514-the doctor entreated . “ Will [you]1574-the first tell [me]1514-the doctor who denounced [him]2555-that man ? ”[1514-the doctor] “ It is against rule , ”[1574-the first] answered [the first]1574-the first ; “ but [you]1514-the doctor can ask [Him]2555-that man of [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine here . ”[1574-the first] [The Doctor]1514-the doctor turned [his]1514-the doctor eyes upon [that man]2555-that man . Who moved uneasily on [his]2555-that man feet , rubbed [his]2555-that man beard a little , and at length said : “ Well ! Truly it is against rule . Now , [I]2555-that man am dumb ! ”[2555-that man] CHAPTER VIII . A Hand at Cards Happily unconscious of the new calamity at [home]858-home , [Miss Pross]183-miss pross threaded [her]183-miss pross way along [the narrow streets]4034-the narrow streets and crossed [the river]1494-the river by [the bridge of [the Pont - Neuf]4037-the pont - neuf]4036-the bridge of the pont - neuf , reckoning in [her]183-miss pross mind the number of indispensable purchases [she]183-miss pross had to make . [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , with the basket , walked at [her]183-miss pross side . [They]4038-they both looked to the right and to the left into [most of [the shops]718-the shops [they]4038-they passed]4039-most of the shops they passed , had a wary eye for [all gregarious assemblages of [people]360-people]4041-all gregarious assemblages of people , and turned out of [[their]4038-they road]4043-their road to avoid any very excited group of [talkers]3324-talkers . That [somebody]405-somebody was assassinated by [somebody vindicating a difference of opinion]4067-somebody vindicating a difference of opinion was the likeliest occurrence . [I]177-carton own to [you]133-mr. lorry , [I]177-carton am shaken , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , by [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ’s not having had the power to prevent this arrest . ”[177-carton] “ [He]170-doctor manette may not have known of it beforehand , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “ But that very circumstance would be alarming , when [we]6990-we remember how identified [he]170-doctor manette is with [[his]170-doctor manette son - in - law]3581-his son - in - law . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ That ’s true , ”[133-mr. lorry] [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry acknowledged , with [his]133-mr. lorry troubled hand at [his]133-mr. lorry chin , and [his]133-mr. lorry troubled eyes on [Carton]177-carton . “ In short , ”[177-carton] said [Sydney]177-carton , “ this is a desperate time , when desperate games are played for desperate stakes . Let [the Doctor]1514-the doctor play the winning game ; [I]177-carton will play the losing one . [No man]1866-no man ’s life here is worth purchase . [Any one carried]6994-any one carried [home]858-home by [the people]717-the people to - day , may be condemned tomorrow . Now , the stake [I]177-carton have resolved to play for , in case of the worst , is [a friend in the Conciergerie]6997-a friend in the conciergerie . And the friend [I]177-carton purpose to [myself]177-carton to win , is [Mr. Barsad]222-mr. barsad . ”[177-carton] “ [You]133-mr. lorry need have good cards , [sir]4862-sir , ”[6057-the spy] said [the spy]6057-the spy . “ [I]6057-the spy ’ll run them over . [I]6057-the spy ’ll see what [I]6057-the spy hold,--Mr . [Lorry]133-mr. lorry , [you]133-mr. lorry know what a brute [I]6057-the spy am ; [I]6057-the spy wish [you]133-mr. lorry ’d give [me]6057-the spy a little brandy . ”[6057-the spy] It was put before [him]6057-the spy , and [he]6057-the spy drank off a glassful -- drank off another glassful -- pushed the bottle thoughtfully away . “ [Mr. Barsad]222-mr. barsad , ”[6057-the spy] [he]6057-the spy went on , in the tone of one who really was looking over a hand at cards : “ [Sheep of [the prisons]3566-the prisons]6999-sheep of the prisons , [emissary of [Republican committees]7002-republican committees]7001-emissary of republican committees , now turnkey , now [prisoner]7003-prisoner , always [spy]7004-spy and [secret informer]7005-secret informer , so much the more valuable here for being English that [an Englishman]5026-an englishman is less open to suspicion of subornation in those characters than [a Frenchman]6336-a frenchman , represents [himself]6336-a frenchman to [[his]6336-a frenchman employers]7008-his employers under a false name . That ’s a very good card . Look over [your]222-mr. barsad hand , [Mr. Barsad]222-mr. barsad , and see what [you]222-mr. barsad have . Do n’t hurry . ”[6057-the spy] [He]6057-the spy drew the bottle near , poured out another glassful of brandy , and drank it off . [He]6057-the spy saw that [the spy]6057-the spy was fearful of [his]6057-the spy drinking [himself]6057-the spy into a fit state for the immediate denunciation of [him]6057-the spy . Take time . ”[6057-the spy] It was a poorer hand than [he]6057-the spy suspected . [Mr. Barsad]222-mr. barsad saw losing cards in it that [Sydney Carton]177-carton knew nothing of . Thrown out of [his]222-mr. barsad honourable employment in [England]1-england , through too much unsuccessful hard swearing there -- not because [he]222-mr. barsad was not wanted [there]4887-there ; [our]4116-our English reasons for vaunting [our]4116-our superiority to secrecy and [spies]2331-spies are of very modern date -- [he]222-mr. barsad knew that [he]222-mr. barsad had crossed the Channel , and accepted service in [France]2-france : first , as [a tempter]4118-a tempter and [an eavesdropper]4119-an eavesdropper among [[his]222-mr. barsad own countrymen]4120-his own countrymen [there]4887-there : gradually , as [a tempter]4118-a tempter and [an eavesdropper]4119-an eavesdropper among [the natives]4124-the natives . [He]222-mr. barsad knew that under the overthrown government [he]222-mr. barsad had been [a spy upon [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine and [[Defarge]146-madame defarge ’s wine - shop]2877-defarge ’s wine - shop]4125-a spy upon saint antoine and defarge ’s wine - shop ; had received from [the watchful police]4127-the watchful police such heads of information concerning [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ’s imprisonment , release , and history , as should serve [him]222-mr. barsad for an introduction to familiar conversation with [the Defarges]218-the defarges ; and tried [them]4128-them on [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , and had broken down with [them]4128-them signally . [He]222-mr. barsad always remembered with fear and trembling , that [that terrible woman]4129-that terrible woman had knitted when [he]222-mr. barsad talked with [her]4129-that terrible woman , and had looked ominously at [him]222-mr. barsad as [her]4129-that terrible woman fingers moved . [He]222-mr. barsad had since seen [her]4129-that terrible woman , in [the Section of [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine]6913-the section of saint antoine , over and over again produce [her]4129-that terrible woman knitted registers , and denounce [people whose lives the guillotine then surely swallowed up]4131-people whose lives the guillotine then surely swallowed up . [He]222-mr. barsad knew , as every one employed as [he]222-mr. barsad was did , that [he]222-mr. barsad was never safe ; that flight was impossible ; that [he]222-mr. barsad was tied fast under the shadow of the axe ; and that in spite of [his]222-mr. barsad utmost tergiversation and treachery in furtherance of the reigning terror , a word might bring it down upon [him]222-mr. barsad . Once denounced , and on such grave grounds as had just now been suggested to [his]222-mr. barsad mind , [he]222-mr. barsad foresaw that [the dreadful woman of whose unrelenting character]4132-the dreadful woman of whose unrelenting character [he]222-mr. barsad had seen many proofs , would produce against [him]222-mr. barsad that fatal register , and would quash [his]222-mr. barsad last chance of life . [I]6057-the spy confess that [we]7057-we were so unpopular with [the outrageous mob]7058-the outrageous mob , that [I]6057-the spy only got away from [England]1-england at the risk of being ducked to death , and that [Cly]168-cly was so ferreted up and down , that [he]168-cly never would have got away at all but for that sham . Though how [this man]5081-this man knows it was a sham , is a wonder of wonders to [me]6057-the spy . ”[6057-the spy] “ Never [you]222-mr. barsad trouble [your]222-mr. barsad head about [this man]5081-this man , ”[156-mr. cruncher] retorted [the contentious Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher ; “ [you]222-mr. barsad ’ll have trouble enough with giving [your]222-mr. barsad attention to [that gentleman]5256-that gentleman . And look here ! Once more!”--Mr[156-mr. cruncher] . [Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher could not be restrained from making rather an ostentatious parade of [his]156-mr. cruncher liberality--“I’d catch hold of [your]222-mr. barsad throat and choke [you]222-mr. barsad for half a guinea . ”[156-mr. cruncher] [The Sheep of [the prisons]3566-the prisons]4153-the sheep of the prisons turned from [him]156-mr. cruncher to [Sydney Carton]177-carton , and said , with more decision , “ It has come to a point . [I]177-carton go on duty soon , and ca n’t overstay [my]177-carton time . [You]177-carton told [me]177-carton [you]177-carton had a proposal ; what is it ? Now , it is of no use asking too much of [me]177-carton . Ask [me]177-carton to do anything in [[my]177-carton office]7062-my office , putting [my]177-carton head in great extra danger , and [I]177-carton had better trust [my]177-carton life to the chances of a refusal than the chances of consent . In short , [I]177-carton should make that choice . [You]177-carton talk of desperation . [We]7063-we are all desperate here . Remember ! It being all spent , [he]177-carton said , rising : “ So far , [we]7067-we have spoken before [these two]7068-these two , because it was as well that the merits of the cards should not rest solely between [you]177-carton and [me]177-carton . Come into [the dark room]2867-the dark room here , and let [us]7067-we have one final word alone . ”[177-carton] CHAPTER IX . The Game Made While [Sydney Carton]177-carton and [the Sheep of [the prisons]3566-the prisons]4153-the sheep of the prisons were in [the adjoining dark room]4158-the adjoining dark room , speaking so low that not a sound was heard , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry looked at [Jerry]133-mr. lorry in considerable doubt and mistrust . [That honest tradesman]4159-that honest tradesman ’s manner of receiving the look , did not inspire confidence ; [he]133-mr. lorry changed the leg on which [he]133-mr. lorry rested , as often as if [he]133-mr. lorry had fifty of those limbs , and were trying them all ; [he]133-mr. lorry examined [his]133-mr. lorry finger - nails with a very questionable closeness of attention ; and whenever [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s eye caught [his]133-mr. lorry , [he]133-mr. lorry was taken with that peculiar kind of short cough requiring the hollow of a hand before it , which is seldom , if ever , known to be an infirmity attendant on perfect openness of character . “ [Jerry]133-mr. lorry , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “ Come here . ”[133-mr. lorry] [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher came forward sideways , with one of [his]156-mr. cruncher shoulders in advance of [him]156-mr. cruncher . “ What have [you]133-mr. lorry been , besides [a messenger]4927-a messenger ? ”[156-mr. cruncher] After some cogitation , accompanied with an intent look at [[his]156-mr. cruncher patron]4160-his patron , [Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher conceived the luminous idea of replying , “ Agicultooral character . ”[156-mr. cruncher] “ [My]133-mr. lorry mind misgives [me]133-mr. lorry much , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , angrily shaking a forefinger at [him]133-mr. lorry , “ that [you]133-mr. lorry have used [the respectable and great house of Tellson ’s]7071-the respectable and great house of tellson ’s as a blind , and that [you]133-mr. lorry have had an unlawful occupation of an infamous description . If [you]133-mr. lorry have , do n’t expect [me]133-mr. lorry to befriend [you]133-mr. lorry when [you]133-mr. lorry get back to [England]1-england . If [you]133-mr. lorry have , do n’t expect [me]133-mr. lorry to keep [your]133-mr. lorry secret . [Tellson]134-tellson ’s shall not be imposed upon . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [I]156-mr. cruncher hope , [sir]4862-sir , ”[156-mr. cruncher] pleaded [the abashed Mr. Cruncher]156-mr. cruncher , “ that [a gentleman like [yourself]4862-sir]7073-a gentleman like yourself wot [I]156-mr. cruncher ’ve had the honour of odd jobbing till [I]156-mr. cruncher ’m grey at it , would think twice about harming of [me]156-mr. cruncher , even if it wos so -- [I]156-mr. cruncher do n’t say it is , but even if it wos . And which it is to be took into account that if it wos , it would n’t , even then , be all o ’ one side . There ’d be two sides to it . There might be [medical doctors]7074-medical doctors at the present hour , a picking up [their]7074-medical doctors guineas where [a honest tradesman]5147-a honest tradesman do n’t pick up [his]5147-a honest tradesman fardens -- fardens ! no , nor yet [his]5147-a honest tradesman half fardens -- half fardens ! no , nor yet [his]5147-a honest tradesman quarter -- a banking away like smoke at [Tellson]134-tellson ’s , and a cocking [their]7074-medical doctors medical eyes at [that tradesman]7076-that tradesman on the sly , a going in and going out to [[their]7074-medical doctors own carriages]7077-their own carriages -- ah ! equally like smoke , if not more so . Well , that ’ ud be imposing , too , on [Tellson]134-tellson ’s . For [you]4862-sir can not sarse the goose and not the gander . And here ’s [Mrs. Cruncher]155-mrs. cruncher , or leastways wos in the Old [England]1-england times , and would be to - morrow , if cause given , a floppin ’ again the business to that degree as is ruinating -- stark ruinating ! Whereas [[them]7074-medical doctors [medical doctors]7074-medical doctors ’ wives]7078-them medical doctors ’ wives do n’t flop -- catch [’em]7080-’em at it ! Or , if [they]7074-medical doctors flop , [their]7074-medical doctors floppings goes in favour of [more patients]7081-more patients , and how can [you]4862-sir rightly have one without t’other ? Then , wot with [undertakers]7082-undertakers , and wot with [parish clerks]7083-parish clerks , and wot with [sextons]7084-sextons , and wot with [private watchmen]7085-private watchmen ( all awaricious and all in it ) , [a man]449-a man would n’t get much by it , even if it wos so . It was obviously the weakness of the position . There is no help for it . ”[177-carton] “ But access to [him]5091-the prisoner , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , “ if it should go ill before [the Tribunal]3583-the tribunal , will not save [him]5091-the prisoner . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [I]133-mr. lorry never said it would . ”[133-mr. lorry] [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s eyes gradually sought the fire ; [his]133-mr. lorry sympathy with [[his]133-mr. lorry darling]4165-his darling , and the heavy disappointment of [his]133-mr. lorry second arrest , gradually weakened [them]4166-them ; [he]133-mr. lorry was [an old man]4167-an old man now , overborne with anxiety of late , and [his]133-mr. lorry tears fell . “ [You]133-mr. lorry are [a good man]7111-a good man and [a true friend]7112-a true friend , ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , in an altered voice . “ Forgive [me]177-carton if [I]177-carton notice that [you]133-mr. lorry are affected . [I]177-carton could not see [[my]177-carton father]4969-my father weep , and sit by , careless . [You]133-mr. lorry are free from that misfortune , however . ”[177-carton] Though [he]133-mr. lorry said the last words , with a slip into [his]133-mr. lorry usual manner , there was a true feeling and respect both in [his]133-mr. lorry tone and in [his]133-mr. lorry touch , that [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , who had never seen the better side of [him]133-mr. lorry , was wholly unprepared for . [He]133-mr. lorry gave [him]133-mr. lorry [his]133-mr. lorry hand , and [Carton]177-carton gently pressed it . “ To return to poor [Darnay]162-darnay , ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton . “ Do n’t tell [Her]7115-her of this interview , or this arrangement . It would not enable [Her]7115-her to go to see [him]133-mr. lorry . [She]7115-her might think it was contrived , in case of the worse , to convey to [him]133-mr. lorry the means of anticipating the sentence . ”[177-carton] [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry had not thought of that , and [he]133-mr. lorry looked quickly at [Carton]177-carton to see if it were in [his]133-mr. lorry mind . It seemed to be ; [he]133-mr. lorry returned the look , and evidently understood it . “ [She]7115-her might think a thousand things , ”[177-carton] [Carton]177-carton said , “ and any of them would only add to [her]7115-her trouble . Do n’t speak of [me]177-carton to [her]7115-her . As [I]177-carton said to [you]177-carton when [I]177-carton first came , [I]177-carton had better not see [her]7115-her . [She]7115-her has such a strong attachment to [you]177-carton and reliance on [you]177-carton . How does [she]7115-her look ? ”[177-carton] “ Anxious and unhappy , but very beautiful . ”[177-carton] “ Ah ! ”[133-mr. lorry] It was a long , grieving sound , like a sigh -- almost like a sob . It attracted [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s eyes to [Carton]177-carton ’s face , which was turned to the fire . A light , or a shade ( [the old gentleman]4108-the old gentleman could not have said which ) , passed from it as swiftly as a change will sweep over [a hill - side]4169-a hill - side on a wild bright day , and [he]177-carton lifted [his]177-carton foot to put back one of the little flaming logs , which was tumbling forward . [He]177-carton wore the white riding - coat and top - boots , then in vogue , and the light of the fire touching their light surfaces made [him]177-carton look very pale , with [his]177-carton long brown hair , all untrimmed , hanging loose about [him]177-carton . [His]177-carton indifference to fire was sufficiently remarkable to elicit a word of remonstrance from [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ; [his]177-carton boot was still upon the hot embers of the flaming log , when it had broken under the weight of [his]177-carton foot . “ [I]177-carton forgot it , ”[177-carton] [he]177-carton said . [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s eyes were again attracted to [his]177-carton face . Taking note of the wasted air which clouded the naturally handsome features , and having the expression of [prisoners]5390-prisoners ’ faces fresh in [his]177-carton mind , [he]177-carton was strongly reminded of that expression . “ And [your]177-carton duties here have drawn to an end , [sir]4862-sir ? ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , turning to [him]177-carton . “ Yes . [I]177-carton was ready to go . ”[177-carton] [They]4171-they were both silent . “ [Yours]177-carton is a long life to look back upon , [sir]4862-sir ? ”[177-carton] said [Carton]177-carton , wistfully . “ [I]177-carton am in [my]177-carton seventy - eighth year . ”[177-carton] “ [You]177-carton have been useful all [your]177-carton life ; steadily and constantly occupied ; trusted , respected , and looked up to ? ”[177-carton] “ [I]177-carton have been [a man of business]4935-a man of business , ever since [I]177-carton have been [a man]449-a man . For , as [I]133-mr. lorry draw closer and closer to the end , [I]133-mr. lorry travel in the circle , nearer and nearer to the beginning . It seems to be one of the kind smoothings and preparings of the way . [My]133-mr. lorry heart is touched now , by many remembrances that had long fallen asleep , of [[my]133-mr. lorry pretty young mother]7131-my pretty young mother ( and [I]133-mr. lorry so old ! ) , and by many associations of the days when what [we]7132-we call [the World]118-the world was not so real with [me]133-mr. lorry , and [my]133-mr. lorry faults were not confirmed in [me]133-mr. lorry . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ [I]172-carton understand the feeling ! ”[172-carton] exclaimed [Carton]172-carton , with a bright flush . “ And [you]172-carton are the better for it ? ”[172-carton] “ [I]172-carton hope so . ”[172-carton] [Carton]172-carton terminated the conversation here , by rising to help [him]172-carton on with [his]172-carton outer coat ; “ But [you]172-carton , ”[133-mr. lorry] said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , reverting to the theme , “ [you]172-carton are young . ”[133-mr. lorry] “ Yes , ”[172-carton] said [Carton]172-carton . “ [I]172-carton am not old , but [my]172-carton young way was never the way to age . Let [me]172-carton follow in [her]4177-her steps . ”[172-carton] It was ten o’clock at night when [he]172-carton stood before [the prison of La Force]3388-the prison of la force , where [she]4177-her had stood hundreds of times . [A little wood - sawyer]4180-a little wood - sawyer , having closed [[his]4180-a little wood - sawyer shop]3758-his shop , was smoking [his]4180-a little wood - sawyer pipe at [[his]4180-a little wood - sawyer shop]3758-his shop - door . “ Good night , [citizen]3357-citizen , ”[177-carton] said [Sydney Carton]177-carton , pausing in going by ; for , [the man]472-the man eyed [him]172-carton inquisitively . “ Good night , [citizen]3357-citizen . ”[472-the man] “ How goes [the Republic]274-the republic ? ”[472-the man] “ [You]177-carton mean [the Guillotine]249-la guillotine . Then , traversing with the decided step of one who remembered the way well , [several dark and dirty streets]4189-several dark and dirty streets -- much dirtier than usual , for [the best public thoroughfares]4190-the best public thoroughfares remained uncleansed in those times of terror -- [he]177-carton stopped at [[a chemist]4191-a chemist ’s shop , which [the owner]4193-the owner was closing with [his]4193-the owner own hands]4192-a chemist ’s shop , which the owner was closing with his own hands . [A small , dim , crooked shop , kept in [a tortuous , up - hill thoroughfare]4195-a tortuous , up - hill thoroughfare , by [a small , dim , crooked man]4196-a small , dim , crooked man]4194-a small , dim , crooked shop , kept in a tortuous , up - hill thoroughfare , by a small , dim , crooked man . Giving [this citizen]6914-this citizen , too , good night , as [he]3164-the little man confronted [him]6914-this citizen at [his]3164-the little man counter , [he]3164-the little man laid the scrap of paper before [him]6914-this citizen . “ Whew ! ”[4198-the chemist] [the chemist]4198-the chemist whistled softly , as [he]4198-the chemist read it . “ Hi ! hi ! hi ! ”[4198-the chemist] [Sydney Carton]177-carton took no heed , and [the chemist]4198-the chemist said : “ For [you]177-carton , [citizen]3357-citizen ? ”[4198-the chemist] “ For [me]4198-the chemist . ”[4198-the chemist] “ [You]177-carton will be careful to keep them separate , [citizen]3357-citizen ? [You]177-carton know the consequences of mixing them ? ”[4198-the chemist] “ Perfectly . ”[4198-the chemist] Certain small packets were made and given to [him]177-carton . [He]177-carton put them , one by one , in the breast of [his]177-carton inner coat , counted out the money for [them]4200-them , and deliberately left [the shop]771-the shop . “ There is nothing more to do , ”[177-carton] said [he]177-carton , glancing upward at [the moon]4202-the moon , “ until to - morrow . [I]177-carton ca n’t sleep . ”[177-carton] It was not a reckless manner , the manner in which [he]177-carton said these words aloud under the fast - sailing clouds , nor was it more expressive of negligence than defiance . It was the settled manner of [a tired man , who had wandered and struggled and got lost]4203-a tired man , who had wandered and struggled and got lost , but who at length struck into [[his]177-carton road]2529-his road and saw its end . Long ago , when [he]177-carton had been famous among [[his]177-carton earliest competitors]4205-his earliest competitors as [a youth of great promise]4206-a youth of great promise , [he]177-carton had followed [[his]177-carton father]1015-his father to the grave . [[His]177-carton mother]1010-his mother had died , years before . These solemn words , which had been read at [[his]177-carton father]1015-his father ’s grave , arose in [his]177-carton mind as [he]177-carton went down [the dark streets]2792-the dark streets , among the heavy shadows , with the moon and the clouds sailing on high above [him]177-carton . “ [I]177-carton am [the resurrection]7155-the resurrection and the life , saith [the Lord]1901-the lord : [he]7157-he that believeth in [me]177-carton , though [he]7157-he were dead , yet shall [he]7157-he live : and whosoever liveth and believeth in [me]177-carton , shall never die . ”[177-carton] In [a city dominated by the axe]4211-a city dominated by the axe , alone at night , with natural sorrow rising in [him]177-carton for [the sixty - three who had been that day put to death]4212-the sixty - three who had been that day put to death , and for [[to - morrow]4213-to - morrow ’s victims]4214-to - morrow ’s victims then awaiting [their]4214-to - morrow ’s victims doom in [the prisons]3566-the prisons , and still of [to - morrow ’s and to - morrow]4216-to - morrow ’s and to - morrow ’s , the chain of association that brought the words [home]858-home , like [a rusty old ship]4218-a rusty old ship ’s anchor from [the deep]4219-the deep , might have been easily found . [He]177-carton did not seek it , but repeated them and went on . With a solemn interest in the lighted windows where [the people]717-the people were going to rest , forgetful through a few calm hours of the horrors surrounding [them]717-the people ; in [the towers of [the churches , where no prayers were said]4222-the churches , where no prayers were said]4221-the towers of the churches , where no prayers were said , for the popular revulsion had even travelled that length of self - destruction from years of [priestly impostors]4223-priestly impostors , [plunderers]4224-plunderers , and [profligates]4225-profligates ; in [the distant burial - places]4226-the distant burial - places , reserved , as [they]717-the people wrote upon the gates , for Eternal Sleep ; in [the abounding gaols]4227-the abounding gaols ; and in [the streets along which [the sixties rolled to a death which had become so common and material , that no sorrowful story of a haunting Spirit]4229-the sixties rolled to a death which had become so common and material , that no sorrowful story of a haunting spirit ever arose among [the people out of all the working of the Guillotine]4230-the people out of all the working of the guillotine]4228-the streets along which the sixties rolled to a death which had become so common and material , that no sorrowful story of a haunting spirit ever arose among the people out of all the working of the guillotine ; with a solemn interest in the whole life and death of [the city]1496-the city settling down to its short nightly pause in fury ; [Sydney Carton]177-carton crossed [the Seine]114-the seine again for [the lighter streets]4232-the lighter streets . [Few coaches]4233-few coaches were abroad , for [riders]4234-riders in [coaches]1236-coaches were liable to be suspected , and gentility hid its head in red nightcaps , and put on heavy shoes , and trudged . But , [the theatres]4236-the theatres were all well filled , and [the people]717-the people poured cheerfully out as [he]177-carton passed , and went chatting [home]858-home . At one of the theatre doors , there was [a little girl with [a mother]1738-a mother , looking for a way across [the street]662-the street through the mud]4239-a little girl with a mother , looking for a way across the street through the mud . [He]177-carton carried [the child]3495-the child over , and before the timid arm was loosed from [his]177-carton neck asked [her]3495-the child for a kiss . “ [I]177-carton am the resurrection and the life , saith [the Lord]1901-the lord : [he]177-carton that believeth in [me]177-carton , though [he]177-carton were dead , yet shall [he]177-carton live : and whosoever liveth and believeth in [me]177-carton , shall never die . ”[177-carton] Now , that [the streets]732-the streets were quiet , and the night wore on , the words were in the echoes of [his]177-carton feet , and were in the air . Perfectly calm and steady , [he]177-carton sometimes repeated them to [himself]177-carton as [he]177-carton walked ; but , [he]177-carton heard them always . The night wore out , and , as [he]177-carton stood upon [the bridge]3954-the bridge listening to the water as it splashed the river - walls of [the Island of [Paris]7-paris]4245-the island of paris , where the picturesque confusion of [houses]801-houses and [cathedral]4247-cathedral shone bright in the light of the moon , the day came coldly , looking like a dead face out of the sky . Then , the night , with the moon and the stars , turned pale and died , and for a little while it seemed as if Creation were delivered over to [Death]128-death ’s dominion . But , the glorious sun , rising , seemed to strike those words , that burden of the night , straight and warm to [his]177-carton heart in its long bright rays . And looking along them , with reverently shaded eyes , a bridge of light appeared to span the air between [him]177-carton and the sun , while [the river]1494-the river sparkled under it . The strong tide , so swift , so deep , and certain , was like [a congenial friend]4249-a congenial friend , in the morning stillness . [He]177-carton walked by [the stream]4250-the stream , far from [the houses]603-the houses , and in the light and warmth of the sun fell asleep on [the bank]531-the bank . When [he]177-carton awoke and was afoot again , [he]177-carton lingered there yet a little longer , watching an eddy that turned and turned purposeless , until [the stream]4250-the stream absorbed it , and carried it on to [the sea.--“Like]7159-the sea.--“like [me]177-carton . ”[177-carton] [A trading - boat]4254-a trading - boat , with a sail of the softened colour of a dead leaf , then glided into [his]177-carton view , floated by [him]177-carton , and died away . As its silent track in [the water]490-the water disappeared , the prayer that had broken up out of [his]177-carton heart for a merciful consideration of all [his]177-carton poor blindnesses and errors , ended in the words , “ [I]133-mr. lorry am the resurrection and the life . ”[133-mr. lorry] [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry was already out when [he]133-mr. lorry got back , and it was easy to surmise where [the good old man]4256-the good old man was gone . [Sydney Carton]177-carton drank nothing but a little coffee , ate some bread , and , having washed and changed to refresh [himself]177-carton , went out to [the place of trial]4257-the place of trial . [The court]4990-the court was all astir and a - buzz , when [the black sheep -- whom many fell away from in dread]4259-the black sheep -- whom many fell away from in dread -- pressed [him]177-carton into an obscure corner among [the crowd]1386-the crowd . [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry was [there]4887-there , and [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette was [there]4887-there . [She]4263-her was there , sitting beside [[her]4263-her father]5008-her father . When [[her]4263-her husband]770-her husband was brought in , [she]4263-her turned a look upon [him]770-her husband , so sustaining , so encouraging , so full of admiring love and pitying tenderness , yet so courageous for [his]770-her husband sake , that it called the healthy blood into [his]770-her husband face , brightened [his]770-her husband glance , and animated [his]770-her husband heart . If there had been any eyes to notice the influence of [her]4263-her look , on [Sydney Carton]177-carton , it would have been seen to be the same influence exactly . Before [that unjust Tribunal]4266-that unjust tribunal , there was little or no order of procedure , ensuring to [any accused person]4267-any accused person any reasonable hearing . There could have been no such Revolution , if all laws , forms , and ceremonies , had not first been so monstrously abused , that the suicidal vengeance of the Revolution was to scatter [them]4268-them all to the winds . Every eye was turned to [the jury]1124-the jury . [The same determined patriots]4270-the same determined patriots and [good republicans as yesterday and the day before , and to - morrow and the day after]4271-good republicans as yesterday and the day before , and to - morrow and the day after . Eager and prominent among [them]4270-the same determined patriots , [one man with a craving face]4272-one man with a craving face , and [his]770-her husband fingers perpetually hovering about [his]770-her husband lips , whose appearance gave great satisfaction to [the spectators]1139-the spectators . [A life - thirsting , cannibal - looking , bloody - minded juryman]4274-a life - thirsting , cannibal - looking , bloody - minded juryman , [the Jacques Three of [St. Antoine]119-st. antoine]4275-the jacques three of st. antoine . [The whole jury]4276-the whole jury , as [a jury of [dogs empannelled to try the deer]4278-dogs empannelled to try the deer]4277-a jury of dogs empannelled to try the deer . Every eye then turned to [the five judges]4279-the five judges and [the public prosecutor]3842-the public prosecutor . No favourable leaning in that quarter to - day . A fell , uncompromising , murderous business - meaning there . Every eye then sought some other eye in [the crowd]1386-the crowd , and gleamed at it approvingly ; and heads nodded at [one another]411-one another , before bending forward with a strained attention . [Charles Evrémonde]248-charles evrémonde , called [Darnay]162-darnay . Released yesterday . Reaccused and retaken yesterday . Indictment delivered to [him]162-darnay last night . Suspected and Denounced [enemy of [the Republic]3844-the republic]4283-enemy of the republic , [Aristocrat]3359-aristocrat , [one of [a family of tyrants]4287-a family of tyrants]4286-one of a family of tyrants , [one of a race proscribed , for that [they]4289-they had used [their]4289-they abolished privileges to the infamous oppression of [the people]717-the people]4288-one of a race proscribed , for that they had used their abolished privileges to the infamous oppression of the people . [Charles Evrémonde]248-charles evrémonde , called [Darnay]162-darnay , in right of such proscription , absolutely Dead in Law . To this effect , in as few or fewer words , [the Public Prosecutor]3842-the public prosecutor . [The President]3838-the president asked , was [the Accused]1126-the accused openly denounced or secretly ? “ Openly , [President]7160-president . ”[3838-the president] “ By whom ? ”[3838-the president] “ [Three voices]7161-three voices . [Ernest Defarge]221-ernest defarge , [wine - vendor of [St. Antoine]119-st. antoine]7162-wine - vendor of st. antoine . ”[3838-the president] “ Good . ”[3838-the president] “ [Thérèse Defarge]285-defarge , [[his]221-ernest defarge wife]4987-his wife . ”[3838-the president] “ Good . ”[3838-the president] “ [Alexandre Manette]234-alexandre manette , [physician]7164-physician . ”[3838-the president] A great uproar took place in [the court]4990-the court , and in the midst of it , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette was seen , pale and trembling , standing where [he]170-doctor manette had been seated . “ [President]7160-president , [I]170-doctor manette indignantly protest to [you]7160-president that this is a forgery and a fraud . [You]7160-president know [the accused]1126-the accused to be [the husband of [[my]170-doctor manette daughter]5576-my daughter]7167-the husband of my daughter . [[My]170-doctor manette daughter]5576-my daughter , and those dear to [her]5576-my daughter , are far dearer to [me]170-doctor manette than [my]170-doctor manette life . Who and where is [the false conspirator who says that [I]170-doctor manette denounce the husband of [[my]170-doctor manette child]2642-my child]7170-the false conspirator who says that i denounce the husband of my child ! ”[170-doctor manette] “ [Citizen Manette]286-citizen manette , be tranquil . To fail in submission to the authority of [the Tribunal]3583-the tribunal would be to put [yourself]286-citizen manette out of Law . As to what is dearer to [you]286-citizen manette than life , nothing can be so dear to [a good citizen]6464-a good citizen as [the Republic]3844-the republic . ”[3838-the president] Loud acclamations hailed this rebuke . [The President]3838-the president rang [his]3838-the president bell , and with warmth resumed . “ If [the Republic]274-the republic should demand of [you]286-citizen manette the sacrifice of [[your]286-citizen manette child]5567-your child [herself]5567-your child , [you]286-citizen manette would have no duty but to sacrifice [her]5567-your child . Listen to what is to follow . In the meanwhile , be silent ! ”[3838-the president] Frantic acclamations were again raised . [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette sat down , with [his]170-doctor manette eyes looking around , and [his]170-doctor manette lips trembling ; [[his]170-doctor manette daughter]889-his daughter drew closer to [him]170-doctor manette . [The craving man on the jury]4297-the craving man on the jury rubbed [his]4297-the craving man on the jury hands together , and restored the usual hand to [his]4297-the craving man on the jury mouth . [Defarge]285-defarge was produced , when [the court]4990-the court was quiet enough to admit of [his]285-defarge being heard , and rapidly expounded the story of the imprisonment , and of [his]285-defarge having been [a mere boy]4299-a mere boy in [the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s service , and of the release , and of the state of [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner when released and delivered to [him]285-defarge . This short examination followed , for [the court]4990-the court was quick with [its]4990-the court work . “ [You]170-doctor manette did good service at the taking of the Bastille , [citizen]3357-citizen ? ”[4990-the court] “ [I]1386-the crowd believe so . ”[1386-the crowd] Here , [an excited woman]4303-an excited woman screeched from [the crowd]1386-the crowd : “ [You]170-doctor manette were [one of [the best patriots there]7178-the best patriots there]7177-one of the best patriots there . Why not say so ? [You]170-doctor manette were [a cannonier that day there]7179-a cannonier that day there , and [you]170-doctor manette were among the first to enter [the accursed fortress]7180-the accursed fortress when it fell . [Patriots]6269-patriots , [I]4303-an excited woman speak the truth ! ”[4303-an excited woman] It was [The Vengeance who , amidst the warm commendations of [the audience]1353-the audience]4305-the vengeance who , amidst the warm commendations of the audience , thus assisted the proceedings . [The President]3838-the president rang [his]3838-the president bell ; but , [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance , warming with encouragement , shrieked , “ [I]236-the vengeance defy that bell ! ”[236-the vengeance] wherein [she]236-the vengeance was likewise much commended . “ Inform [the Tribunal]3583-the tribunal of what [you]170-doctor manette did that day within [the Bastille]2914-the bastille , [citizen]3357-citizen . ”[236-the vengeance] “ [I]285-defarge knew , ”[285-defarge] said [Defarge]285-defarge , looking down at [[his]285-defarge wife]4987-his wife , who stood at the bottom of the steps on which [he]285-defarge was raised , looking steadily up at [him]285-defarge ; “ [I]285-defarge knew that [this prisoner]3382-this prisoner , of whom [I]285-defarge speak , had been confined in [a cell known as [One Hundred and Five]32-one hundred and five , [North Tower]29-north tower]7186-a cell known as one hundred and five , north tower . [I]285-defarge knew it from [himself]3382-this prisoner . [He]3382-this prisoner knew [himself]3382-this prisoner by no other name than One Hundred and Five , [North Tower]29-north tower , when [he]3382-this prisoner made shoes under [my]285-defarge care . As [I]285-defarge serve [my]285-defarge gun that day , [I]285-defarge resolve , when [the place]791-the place shall fall , to examine [that cell]7188-that cell . It falls . [I]285-defarge mount to [the cell]6290-the cell , with [a fellow - citizen who is [one of [the Jury]1124-the jury , directed by [a gaoler]7193-a gaoler]7191-one of the jury , directed by a gaoler]7190-a fellow - citizen who is one of the jury , directed by a gaoler . [I]285-defarge examine it , very closely . In a hole in the chimney , where a stone has been worked out and replaced , [I]285-defarge find a written paper . This is that written paper . [I]285-defarge have made it [my]285-defarge business to examine some specimens of the writing of [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . This is the writing of [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette . [I]285-defarge confide this paper , in the writing of [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , to the hands of [the President]3838-the president . ”[285-defarge] “ Let it be read . ”[285-defarge] In a dead silence and stillness -- [the prisoner under trial]4309-the prisoner under trial looking lovingly at [[his]4309-the prisoner under trial wife]4987-his wife , [[his]4309-the prisoner under trial wife]4987-his wife only looking from [him]4309-the prisoner under trial to look with solicitude at [[her]4987-his wife father]5008-her father , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette keeping [his]170-doctor manette eyes fixed on [the reader]4313-the reader , [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge never taking [hers]146-madame defarge from [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner , [Defarge]146-madame defarge never taking [his]4309-the prisoner under trial from [[his]4309-the prisoner under trial feasting wife]4315-his feasting wife , and all the other eyes there intent upon [the Doctor]1514-the doctor , who saw none of [them]4317-them -- the paper was read , as follows . CHAPTER X. The Substance of the Shadow “ [I]146-madame defarge , [Alexandre Manette]234-alexandre manette , [unfortunate physician]7195-unfortunate physician , [native of [Beauvais]25-beauvais]7196-native of beauvais , and afterwards resident in [Paris]7-paris , write this melancholy paper in [[my]146-madame defarge doleful cell in [the Bastille]2914-the bastille]7197-my doleful cell in the bastille , during the last month of the year , 1767 . [I]146-madame defarge write it at stolen intervals , under every difficulty . [I]146-madame defarge design to secrete it in the wall of the chimney , where [I]146-madame defarge have slowly and laboriously made a place of concealment for it . [Some pitying hand]7199-some pitying hand may find it there , when [I]146-madame defarge and [my]146-madame defarge sorrows are dust . “[146-madame defarge] These words are formed by the rusty iron point with which [I]0-i write with difficulty in scrapings of soot and charcoal from the chimney , mixed with blood , in the last month of the tenth year of [my]0-i captivity . Hope has quite departed from [my]0-i breast . [I]0-i know from terrible warnings [I]0-i have noted in [myself]0-i that [my]0-i reason will not long remain unimpaired , but [I]0-i solemnly declare that [I]0-i am at this time in the possession of [my]0-i right mind -- that [my]0-i memory is exact and circumstantial -- and that [I]0-i write the truth as [I]0-i shall answer for these [my]0-i last recorded words , whether they be ever read by [men]568-men or not , at the Eternal Judgment - seat . “ One cloudy moonlight night , in the third week of December ( [I]381-the driver think the twenty - second of the month ) in the year 1757 , [I]381-the driver was walking on [a retired part of [the quay]7201-the quay]7200-a retired part of the quay by [the Seine]7202-the seine for the refreshment of the frosty air , at an hour ’s distance from [my]381-the driver place of residence in [the Street of [the School of Medicine]7204-the school of medicine]7203-the street of the school of medicine , when [a carriage]5109-a carriage came along behind [me]381-the driver , driven very fast . As [I]381-the driver stood aside to let [that carriage]7206-that carriage pass , apprehensive that it might otherwise run [me]381-the driver down , a head was put out at the window , and a voice called to [the driver]381-the driver to stop . “[381-the driver] [The carriage]917-the carriage stopped as soon as [the driver]381-the driver could rein in [his]381-the driver horses , and the same voice called to [me]0-i by [my]0-i name . [I]0-i answered . [The carriage]917-the carriage was then so far in advance of [me]0-i that [two gentlemen]4322-two gentlemen had time to open the door and alight before [I]0-i came up with it . “ [I]4965-one observed that [they]4322-two gentlemen were both wrapped in cloaks , and appeared to conceal [themselves]4322-two gentlemen . As [they]4322-two gentlemen stood side by side near the carriage door , [I]4965-one also observed that [they]4322-two gentlemen both looked of about [my]4965-one own age , or rather younger , and that [they]4322-two gentlemen were greatly alike , in stature , manner , voice , and ( as far as [I]4965-one could see ) face too . “[4965-one] ‘ [You]0-i are [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ? ’ said [one]4965-one . “ [I]4965-one am . ”[4965-one] “ ‘ [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , formerly of [Beauvais]25-beauvais , ’ said [the other]756-the other ; ‘ [the young physician]7209-the young physician , originally [an expert surgeon]7210-an expert surgeon , who within the last year or two has made a rising reputation in [Paris]7-paris ? ’ “[4965-one] ‘ [Gentlemen]4849-gentlemen , ’ [I]0-i returned , ‘ [I]0-i am [that Doctor Manette of whom [you]4849-gentlemen speak so graciously]170-doctor manette . ’ “ ‘ [We]4849-gentlemen have been to [[your]0-i residence]7211-your residence , ’ said [the first]1574-the first , ‘ and not being so fortunate as to find [you]0-i [there]4887-there , and being informed that [you]0-i were probably walking in this direction , [we]4849-gentlemen followed , in the hope of overtaking [you]0-i . Will [you]0-i please to enter [the carriage]917-the carriage ? ’ “[5188-both] The manner of [both]5188-both was imperious , and [they]5188-both both moved , as these words were spoken , so as to place [me]0-i between [themselves]5188-both and the carriage door . [They]5188-both were armed . [I]0-i was not . “ ‘ [Gentlemen]4849-gentlemen , ’ said [I]0-i , ‘ pardon [me]0-i ; but [I]0-i usually inquire who does [me]0-i the honour to seek [my]0-i assistance , and what is the nature of the case to which [I]0-i am summoned . ’ “[0-i] The reply to this was made by [him]4326-him who had spoken second . ‘ [Doctor]4327-doctor , [[your]4327-doctor clients]4328-your clients are [people of condition]4329-people of condition . As to the nature of the case , [our]4330-our confidence in [your]4327-doctor skill assures [us]4330-our that [you]4327-doctor will ascertain it for [yourself]4327-doctor better than [we]4330-our can describe it . Enough . Will [you]4327-doctor please to enter [the carriage]917-the carriage ? ’ “ [I]0-i could do nothing but comply , and [I]0-i entered [it]917-the carriage in silence . [They]4330-our both entered after [me]0-i -- the last springing in , after putting up the steps . [The carriage]917-the carriage turned about , and drove on at its former speed . “[0-i] [I]0-i repeat this conversation exactly as it occurred . [I]0-i have no doubt that it is , word for word , the same . [I]0-i describe everything exactly as it took place , constraining [my]0-i mind not to wander from the task . Where [I]0-i make the broken marks that follow here , [I]0-i leave off for the time , and put [my]0-i paper in its hiding - place . * * * * * “ [The carriage]917-the carriage left [the streets]732-the streets behind , passed [the North Barrier]121-the north barrier , and emerged upon [the country road]7219-the country road . At two - thirds of a league from [the Barrier]122-the barrier -- [I]472-the man did not estimate the distance at that time , but afterwards when [I]472-the man traversed [it]917-the carriage -- it struck out of [the main avenue]7220-the main avenue , and presently stopped at [a solitary house]7221-a solitary house , [We]7222-we all three alighted , and walked , by a damp soft footpath in [a garden where a neglected fountain had overflowed , to the door of [the house]951-the house]7223-a garden where a neglected fountain had overflowed , to the door of the house . It was not opened immediately , in answer to the ringing of the bell , and [one of [[my]472-the man two conductors]7226-my two conductors]7225-one of my two conductors struck [the man who opened it]7227-the man who opened it , with [his]472-the man heavy riding glove , across the face . “[472-the man] There was nothing in this action to attract [my]0-i particular attention , for [I]0-i had seen [common people]4332-common people struck more commonly than dogs . But , the other of the two , being angry likewise , struck [the man]472-the man in like manner with [his]472-the man arm ; the look and bearing of [the brothers]4334-the brothers were then so exactly alike , that [I]0-i then first perceived [them]4334-the brothers to be [twin brothers]4335-twin brothers . “ From the time of [our]7222-we alighting at the outer gate ( which [we]7222-we found locked , and which one of [the brothers]4334-the brothers had opened to admit [us]7222-we , and had relocked ) , [I]656-the patient had heard cries proceeding from [an upper chamber]7229-an upper chamber . [I]656-the patient was conducted to [this chamber]7230-this chamber straight , the cries growing louder as [we]7222-we ascended the stairs , and [I]656-the patient found [a patient in a high fever of the brain]7231-a patient in a high fever of the brain , lying on a bed . “[656-the patient] [The patient]656-the patient was [a woman of great beauty]4337-a woman of great beauty , and young ; assuredly not much past twenty . [Her]656-the patient hair was torn and ragged , and [her]656-the patient arms were bound to [her]656-the patient sides with sashes and handkerchiefs . [I]0-i noticed that these bonds were all portions of [a gentleman]5203-a gentleman ’s dress . On one of them , which was a fringed scarf for a dress of ceremony , [I]0-i saw the armorial bearings of [a Noble]4339-a noble , and the letter E. “ [I]0-i saw this , within the first minute of [my]0-i contemplation of [the patient]656-the patient ; for , in [her]656-the patient restless strivings [she]656-the patient had turned over on [her]656-the patient face on the edge of the bed , had drawn the end of the scarf into [her]656-the patient mouth , and was in danger of suffocation . [My]0-i first act was to put out [my]0-i hand to relieve [her]656-the patient breathing ; and in moving the scarf aside , the embroidery in the corner caught [my]0-i sight . “[0-i] [I]0-i turned [her]656-the patient gently over , placed [my]0-i hands upon [her]656-the patient breast to calm [her]656-the patient and keep [her]656-the patient down , and looked into [her]656-the patient face . [Her]656-the patient eyes were dilated and wild , and [she]656-the patient constantly uttered piercing shrieks , and repeated the words , ‘ [[My]0-i husband]5455-my husband , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , and [[my]0-i brother]5369-my brother ! ’ and then counted up to twelve , and said , ‘ Hush ! ’ For an instant , and no more , [she]656-the patient would pause to listen , and then the piercing shrieks would begin again , and [she]656-the patient would repeat the cry , ‘ [[My]0-i husband]5455-my husband , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , and [[my]0-i brother]5369-my brother ! ’ and would count up to twelve , and say , ‘ Hush ! ’ There was no variation in the order , or the manner . There was no cessation , but the regular moment ’s pause , in the utterance of these sounds . “ ‘ How long , ’ [I]4347-the elder asked , ‘ has this lasted ? ’ “[4347-the elder] To distinguish [the brothers]4334-the brothers , [I]0-i will call [them]4334-the brothers [the elder]4347-the elder and [the younger]4348-the younger ; by [the elder]4347-the elder , [I]0-i mean [him]4347-the elder who exercised the most authority . It was [the elder who replied , ‘ Since about this hour last night]4350-the elder who replied , ‘ since about this hour last night . ’ “ ‘ [She]656-the patient has [a husband]2583-a husband , [a father]5553-a father , and [a brother]6927-a brother ? ’ “[4350-the elder who replied , ‘ since about this hour last night] ‘ [A brother]6927-a brother . ’ “ ‘ [I]4347-the elder do not address [[her]656-the patient brother]1596-her brother ? ’ “[4347-the elder] [He]4347-the elder answered with great contempt , ‘ No . ’ “ ‘ [She]656-the patient has some recent association with the number twelve ? ’ “[4352-the younger brother] [The younger brother]4352-the younger brother impatiently rejoined , ‘ With twelve o’clock ? ’ “ ‘ See , [gentlemen]4849-gentlemen , ’ said [I]4352-the younger brother , still keeping [my]4352-the younger brother hands upon [her]656-the patient breast , ‘ how useless [I]4352-the younger brother am , as [you]4849-gentlemen have brought [me]4352-the younger brother ! If [I]4352-the younger brother had known what [I]4352-the younger brother was coming to see , [I]4352-the younger brother could have come provided . As it is , time must be lost . There are no medicines to be obtained in [this lonely place]7238-this lonely place . ’ “[4352-the younger brother] [The elder brother]4353-the elder brother looked to [the younger]4348-the younger , who said haughtily , ‘ There is a case of medicines here ; ’ and brought it from [a closet]4355-a closet , and put it on the table . * * * * * “ [I]4352-the younger brother opened some of the bottles , smelt them , and put the stoppers to [my]4352-the younger brother lips . If [I]4352-the younger brother had wanted to use anything save narcotic medicines that were poisons in [themselves]4356-themselves , [I]4352-the younger brother would not have administered any of those . “[4352-the younger brother] ‘ Do [you]4352-the younger brother doubt [them]4356-themselves ? ’ asked [the younger brother]4352-the younger brother . “ ‘ [You]4352-the younger brother see , [monsieur]5071-monsieur , [I]4352-the younger brother am going to use them , ’ [I]4352-the younger brother replied , and said no more . “[4352-the younger brother] [I]0-i made [the patient]656-the patient swallow , with great difficulty , and after many efforts , the dose that [I]0-i desired to give . As [I]0-i intended to repeat it after a while , and as it was necessary to watch its influence , [I]0-i then sat down by the side of the bed . There was [a timid and suppressed woman in attendance]4359-a timid and suppressed woman in attendance ( [wife of [the man down - stairs]4361-the man down - stairs]4360-wife of the man down - stairs ) , who had retreated into a corner . [The house]951-the house was damp and decayed , indifferently furnished -- evidently , recently occupied and temporarily used . Some thick old hangings had been nailed up before the windows , to deaden the sound of the shrieks . They continued to be uttered in [their]4356-themselves regular succession , with the cry , ‘ [[My]0-i husband]5455-my husband , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , and [[my]0-i brother]5369-my brother ! ’ the counting up to twelve , and ‘ Hush ! ’ The frenzy was so violent , that [I]0-i had not unfastened the bandages restraining the arms ; but , [I]0-i had looked to them , to see that they were not painful . The only spark of encouragement in the case , was , that [my]0-i hand upon [the sufferer]2737-the sufferer ’s breast had this much soothing influence , that for minutes at a time it tranquillised [the figure]6042-the figure . It had no effect upon the cries ; no pendulum could be more regular . “ For the reason that [my]0-i hand had this effect ( [I]0-i assume ) , [I]0-i had sat by the side of the bed for half an hour , with [the two brothers]7240-the two brothers looking on , before [the elder]4347-the elder said : “[0-i] ‘ There is [another patient]4368-another patient . ’ “ [I]0-i was startled , and asked , ‘ Is it a pressing case ? ’ “[0-i] ‘ [You]0-i had better see , ’ [he]4368-another patient carelessly answered ; and took up a light . * * * * * “ [The other patient]7242-the other patient lay in [a back room]7243-a back room across a second staircase , which was a species of loft over [a stable]7244-a stable . There was a low plastered ceiling to a part of [it]7243-a back room ; the rest was open , to the ridge of the tiled roof , and there were beams across . Hay and straw were stored in that portion of [the place]791-the place , fagots for firing , and a heap of apples in sand . [I]0-i had to pass through that part , to get at the other . [My]0-i memory is circumstantial and unshaken . [I]0-i try it with these details , and [I]0-i see them all , in this [[my]0-i cell in [the Bastille]2914-the bastille]7246-my cell in the bastille , near the close of the tenth year of [my]0-i captivity , as [I]0-i saw [them]7248-them all that night . “[0-i] On some hay on the ground , with a cushion thrown under [his]4368-another patient head , lay [a handsome peasant boy]4369-a handsome peasant boy -- [a boy of not more than seventeen at the most]4370-a boy of not more than seventeen at the most . [He]4368-another patient lay on [his]4368-another patient back , with [his]4368-another patient teeth set , [his]4368-another patient right hand clenched on [his]4368-another patient breast , and [his]4368-another patient glaring eyes looking straight upward . [I]0-i could not see where [his]4368-another patient wound was , as [I]0-i kneeled on one knee over [him]4368-another patient ; but , [I]0-i could see that [he]4368-another patient was dying of a wound from a sharp point . “ ‘ [I]4368-another patient am [a doctor]4946-a doctor , [[my]4368-another patient poor fellow]7250-my poor fellow , ’ said [I.]0-i ‘ Let [me]4368-another patient examine it . ’ “[4368-another patient] ‘ [I]0-i do not want it examined , ’ [he]4368-another patient answered ; ‘ let it be . ’ “ It was under [his]4368-another patient hand , and [I]4368-another patient soothed [him]4368-another patient to let [me]4368-another patient move [his]4368-another patient hand away . The wound was a sword - thrust , received from twenty to twenty - four hours before , but no skill could have saved [him]4368-another patient if it had been looked to without delay . [He]4368-another patient was then dying fast . As [I]4368-another patient turned [my]4368-another patient eyes to [the elder brother]4353-the elder brother , [I]4368-another patient saw [him]4353-the elder brother looking down at [this handsome boy whose life was ebbing out , as if [he]4368-another patient were a wounded bird , or hare , or rabbit]7252-this handsome boy whose life was ebbing out , as if he were a wounded bird , or hare , or rabbit ; not at all as if [he]4368-another patient were [a fellow - creature]7253-a fellow - creature . “[4368-another patient] ‘ How has this been done , [monsieur]5071-monsieur ? ’ said [I.]4372-my “ ‘ A crazed young common dog ! [A serf]7254-a serf ! Forced [[my]4372-my brother]5369-my brother to draw upon [him]5819-the boy , and has fallen by [[my]4372-my brother]5369-my brother ’s sword -- like [a gentleman]5203-a gentleman . ’ “[4372-my] There was no touch of pity , sorrow , or kindred humanity , in this answer . [The speaker]865-the speaker seemed to acknowledge that it was inconvenient to have that different order of creature dying there , and that it would have been better if [he]865-the speaker had died in the usual obscure routine of [his]865-the speaker vermin kind . [He]865-the speaker was quite incapable of any compassionate feeling about [the boy]5819-the boy , or about [his]5819-the boy fate . “ [The boy]5819-the boy ’s eyes had slowly moved to [him]865-the speaker as [he]865-the speaker had spoken , and they now slowly moved to [me]865-the speaker . “[865-the speaker] ‘ [Doctor]170-doctor manette , [they]4375-they are very proud , [these Nobles]4376-these nobles ; but [[we]4377-our common dogs]4378-we common dogs are proud too , sometimes . [They]4375-they plunder [us]4377-our , outrage [us]4377-our , beat [us]4377-our , kill [us]4377-our ; but [we]4377-our have a little pride left , sometimes . [She]4379-she -- have [you]170-doctor manette seen [her]4379-she , [Doctor]4327-doctor ? ’ “ The shrieks and the cries were audible there , though subdued by the distance . [He]865-the speaker referred to [them]4375-they , as if [she]4379-she were lying in [our]4377-our presence . “[0-i] [I]0-i said , ‘ [I]0-i have seen [her]4379-she . ’ “ ‘ [She]4379-she is [[my]4379-she sister]3018-my sister , [Doctor]170-doctor manette . [They]4375-they have had [their]4375-they shameful rights , [these Nobles]4376-these nobles , in the modesty and virtue of [[our]4377-our sisters]7261-our sisters , many years , but [we]4377-our have had [good girls]7262-good girls among [us]4377-our . [I]4379-she know it , and have heard [[my]4379-she father]4969-my father say so . [She]4379-she was [a good girl]7264-a good girl . [She]4379-she was betrothed to [a good young man]7265-a good young man , too : [a tenant of [his]7265-a good young man]7266-a tenant of his . [We]4377-our were [all tenants of [his]7265-a good young man]7267-all tenants of his -- [that man ’s who stands there]7268-that man ’s who stands there .
