[The other]756-the other is [[his]7265-a good young man brother]7270-his brother , [the worst of a bad race]7271-the worst of a bad race . ’ “[4379-she] It was with the greatest difficulty that [the boy]5819-the boy gathered bodily force to speak ; but , [his]5819-the boy spirit spoke with a dreadful emphasis . “ ‘ [We]4377-our were so robbed by [that man who stands there]7272-that man who stands there , as all [we]4377-our common dogs are by [those superior Beings]7273-those superior beings -- taxed by [him]7272-that man who stands there without mercy , obliged to work for [him]7272-that man who stands there without pay , obliged to grind [our]4377-our corn at [[his]7272-that man who stands there mill]7274-his mill , obliged to feed scores of [his]7272-that man who stands there tame birds on [our]4377-our wretched crops , and forbidden for [our]4377-our lives to keep a single tame bird of [our]4377-our own , pillaged and plundered to that degree that when [we]4377-our chanced to have a bit of meat , [we]4377-our ate it in fear , with the door barred and the shutters closed , that [[his]7272-that man who stands there people]7275-his people should not see it and take it from [us]4377-our -- [I]5819-the boy say , [we]4377-our were so robbed , and hunted , and were made so poor , that [[our]4377-our father]7276-our father told [us]4377-our it was a dreadful thing to bring [a child]894-a child into [the world]519-the world , and that what [we]4377-our should most pray for , was , that [[our]4377-our women]7279-our women might be barren and [our]4377-our miserable race die out ! ’ “[5819-the boy] [I]0-i had never before seen the sense of being oppressed , bursting forth like a fire . [I]0-i had supposed that it must be latent in [the people]717-the people somewhere ; but , [I]0-i had never seen it break out , until [I]0-i saw it in [the dying boy]4383-the dying boy . “ ‘ Nevertheless , [Doctor]170-doctor manette , [[my]5819-the boy sister]3018-my sister married . [He]4383-the dying boy was ailing at that time , [poor fellow]7281-poor fellow , and [she]3018-my sister married [[her]3018-my sister lover]7282-her lover , that [she]3018-my sister might tend and comfort [him]4383-the dying boy in [[our]4377-our cottage]7283-our cottage -- [[our]4377-our dog - hut]7284-our dog - hut , as [that man]2555-that man would call it . [She]3018-my sister had not been married many weeks , when [[that man]2555-that man ’s brother]7287-that man ’s brother saw [her]3018-my sister and admired [her]3018-my sister , and asked [that man]2555-that man to lend [her]3018-my sister to [him]2555-that man -- for what are [husbands]3032-husbands among [us]4377-our ! [He]2555-that man was willing enough , but [[my]5819-the boy sister]3018-my sister was good and virtuous , and hated [[his]2555-that man brother]7270-his brother with a hatred as strong as [mine]4385-mine . What did [the two]883-the two then , to persuade [[her]3018-my sister husband]770-her husband to use [his]770-her husband influence with [her]3018-my sister , to make [her]3018-my sister willing ? ’ “[5819-the boy] [The boy]5819-the boy ’s eyes , which had been fixed on [mine]4385-mine , slowly turned to [the looker - on]4386-the looker - on , and [I]0-i saw in the two faces that all [he]5819-the boy said was true . The two opposing kinds of pride confronting [one another]411-one another , [I]0-i can see , even in [this Bastille]4388-this bastille ; [the gentleman]4926-the gentleman ’s , all negligent indifference ; [the peasant]4390-the peasant ’s , all trodden - down sentiment , and passionate revenge . “ ‘ [You]0-i know , [Doctor]4327-doctor , that it is among the Rights of [these Nobles]4376-these nobles to harness [us]7296-us common dogs to carts , and drive [us]7296-us . [They]4376-these nobles so harnessed [him]5819-the boy and drove [him]5819-the boy . [You]0-i know that it is among [their]4376-these nobles Rights to keep [us]7296-us in [[their]4376-these nobles grounds]7297-their grounds all night , quieting the frogs , in order that [their]4376-these nobles noble sleep may not be disturbed . [They]4376-these nobles kept [him]5819-the boy out in the unwholesome mists at night , and ordered [him]5819-the boy back into [his]5819-the boy harness in the day . But [he]5819-the boy was not persuaded . No ! Taken out of harness one day at noon , to feed -- if [he]5819-the boy could find food -- [he]5819-the boy sobbed twelve times , once for every stroke of the bell , and died on [her]5819-the boy bosom . ’ “[4391-nothing human] [Nothing human]4391-nothing human could have held life in [the boy]5819-the boy but [his]5819-the boy determination to tell all [his]5819-the boy wrong . [He]5819-the boy forced back the gathering shadows of death , as [he]5819-the boy forced [his]5819-the boy clenched right hand to remain clenched , and to cover [his]5819-the boy wound . “ ‘ Then , with [that man]2555-that man ’s permission and even with [his]2555-that man aid , [[his]2555-that man brother]7270-his brother took [her]5819-the boy away ; in spite of what [I]5819-the boy know [she]5819-the boy must have told [[his]2555-that man brother]7270-his brother -- and what that is , will not be long unknown to [you]5819-the boy , [Doctor]4327-doctor , if it is now -- [[his]2555-that man brother]7270-his brother took [her]5819-the boy away -- for [his]2555-that man pleasure and diversion , for a little while . [I]5819-the boy saw [her]5819-the boy pass [me]5819-the boy on [the road]377-the road . When [I]5819-the boy took the tidings [home]858-home , [[our]7305-our father]7276-our father ’s heart burst ; [he]7276-our father never spoke one of the words that filled it . [I]5819-the boy took [[my]5819-the boy young sister]7307-my young sister ( for [I]5819-the boy have another ) to [a place beyond the reach of [this man]5081-this man]7308-a place beyond the reach of this man , and where , at least , [she]5819-the boy will never be _ [[his]7276-our father _ vassal]7310-his _ vassal . Then , [I]5819-the boy tracked [the brother]7311-the brother [here]4902-here , and last night climbed in -- [a common dog]7313-a common dog , but sword in hand.--Where is the loft window ? It was somewhere here ? ’ “[5819-the boy] [The room]565-the room was darkening to [his]4394-he sight ; [the world]519-the world was narrowing around [him]4394-he . [I]0-i glanced about [me]0-i , and saw that the hay and straw were trampled over the floor , as if there had been a struggle . “ ‘ [She]5819-the boy heard [me]0-i , and ran in . [I]0-i told [her]5819-the boy not to come near [us]7314-us till [he]4394-he was dead . [He]4394-he came in and first tossed [me]0-i some pieces of money ; then struck at [me]0-i with a whip . But [I]0-i , though [a common dog]7313-a common dog , so struck at [him]4394-he as to make [him]4394-he draw . Let [him]4394-he break into as many pieces as [he]4394-he will , the sword that [he]4394-he stained with [my]0-i common blood ; [he]4394-he drew to defend [himself]4394-he -- thrust at [me]0-i with all [his]4394-he skill for [his]4394-he life . ’ “[0-i] [My]0-i glance had fallen , but a few moments before , on the fragments of a broken sword , lying among the hay . That weapon was [a gentleman]5203-a gentleman ’s . In another place , lay an old sword that seemed to have been [a soldier]4397-a soldier ’s . “ ‘ Now , lift [me]0-i up , [Doctor]170-doctor manette ; lift [me]0-i up . Where is [he]4398-he ? ’ “[0-i] ‘ [He]4398-he is not here , ’ [I]0-i said , supporting [the boy]5819-the boy , and thinking that [he]5819-the boy referred to [the brother]7311-the brother . “ ‘ [He]4398-he ! Proud as [these nobles]4376-these nobles are , [he]4398-he is afraid to see [me]0-i . Where is [the man who was here]7317-the man who was here ? Turn [my]0-i face to [him]4398-he . ’ “[0-i] [I]0-i did so , raising [the boy]5819-the boy ’s head against [my]0-i knee . But , invested for the moment with extraordinary power , [he]5819-the boy raised [himself]5819-the boy completely : obliging [me]0-i to rise too , or [I]0-i could not have still supported [him]5819-the boy . “ ‘ [Marquis]193-monsieur the marquis , ’ said [the boy]5819-the boy , turned to [him]193-monsieur the marquis with [his]5819-the boy eyes opened wide , and [his]5819-the boy right hand raised , ‘ in the days when all these things are to be answered for , [I]4402-i summon [you]193-monsieur the marquis and [yours]193-monsieur the marquis , to the last of [[your]193-monsieur the marquis bad race]7319-your bad race , to answer for [them]7319-your bad race . [I]4402-i mark this cross of blood upon [you]193-monsieur the marquis , as a sign that [I]4402-i do it . In the days when all these things are to be answered for , [I]4402-i summon [[your]193-monsieur the marquis brother]6955-your brother , [the worst of the bad race]7321-the worst of the bad race , to answer for [them]7319-your bad race separately . [I]4402-i mark this cross of blood upon [him]4402-i , as a sign that [I]4402-i do it . ’ “[4402-i] Twice , [he]4402-i put [his]4402-i hand to the wound in [his]4402-i breast , and with [his]4402-i forefinger drew a cross in the air . [He]4402-i stood for an instant with the finger yet raised , and as it dropped , [he]4402-i dropped with it , and [I]0-i laid [him]4402-i down dead . * * * * * “ When [I]0-i returned to the bedside of [the young woman]7322-the young woman , [I]0-i found [her]7322-the young woman raving in precisely the same order of continuity . [I]0-i knew that this might last for many hours , and that it would probably end in the silence of the grave . “[0-i] [I]0-i repeated the medicines [I]0-i had given [her]4403-her , and [I]0-i sat at the side of the bed until the night was far advanced . [She]4403-her never abated the piercing quality of [her]4403-her shrieks , never stumbled in the distinctness or the order of [her]4403-her words . They were always ‘ [[My]0-i husband]5455-my husband , [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , and [[my]0-i brother]5369-my brother ! One , two , three , four , five , six , seven , eight , nine , ten , eleven , twelve . Hush ! ’ “ This lasted twenty - six hours from the time when [I]5455-my husband first saw [her]4403-her . [I]5455-my husband had come and gone twice , and was again sitting by [her]4403-her , when [she]4403-her began to falter . [I]5455-my husband did what little could be done to assist that opportunity , and by - and - bye [she]4403-her sank into a lethargy , and lay like the dead . “[5455-my husband] It was as if the wind and rain had lulled at last , after a long and fearful storm . [I]0-i released [her]4403-her arms , and called [the woman]1008-the woman to assist [me]0-i to compose [her]4403-her figure and the dress [she]4403-her had torn . It was then that [I]0-i knew [her]4403-her condition to be that of one in whom the first expectations of being [a mother]1738-a mother have arisen ; and it was then that [I]0-i lost the little hope [I]0-i had had of [her]4403-her . “ ‘ Is [she]4403-her dead ? ’ asked [the Marquis]1836-the marquis , whom [I]0-i will still describe as [the elder brother]4353-the elder brother , coming booted into [the room]565-the room from [his]1836-the marquis horse . “[0-i] ‘ Not dead , ’ said [I]0-i ; ‘ but like to die . ’ “ ‘ What strength there is in these common bodies ! ’ [he]4409-he said , looking down at [her]4403-her with some curiosity . “[0-i] ‘ There is prodigious strength , ’ [I]0-i answered [him]4409-he , ‘ in sorrow and despair . ’ “ [He]4409-he first laughed at [my]0-i words , and then frowned at them . [He]4409-he moved a chair with [his]4409-he foot near to [mine]0-i , ordered [the woman]1008-the woman away , and said in a subdued voice , “[0-i] ‘ [Doctor]4327-doctor , finding [[my]0-i brother]5369-my brother in this difficulty with these hinds , [I]0-i recommended that [your]4327-doctor aid should be invited . [Your]4327-doctor reputation is high , and , as [a young man with [your]4327-doctor fortune to make , [you]4327-doctor are probably mindful of [your]4327-doctor interest]4412-a young man with your fortune to make , you are probably mindful of your interest . The things that [you]4327-doctor see here , are things to be seen , and not spoken of . ’ “ [I]4327-doctor listened to [the patient]656-the patient ’s breathing , and avoided answering . “[4327-doctor] ‘ Do [you]4327-doctor honour [me]0-i with [your]4327-doctor attention , [Doctor]4327-doctor ? ’ “ ‘ [Monsieur]7328-monsieur , ’ said [I]4327-doctor , ‘ in [my]4327-doctor profession , the communications of [patients]7329-patients are always received in confidence . ’ [I]4327-doctor was guarded in [my]4327-doctor answer , for [I]4327-doctor was troubled in [my]4327-doctor mind with what [I]4327-doctor had heard and seen . “[4327-doctor] [Her]4414-her breathing was so difficult to trace , that [I]0-i carefully tried the pulse and the heart . There was life , and no more . Looking round as [I]0-i resumed [my]0-i seat , [I]0-i found [both the brothers]4415-both the brothers intent upon [me]0-i . * * * * * “ [I]4414-her write with so much difficulty , the cold is so severe , [I]4414-her am so fearful of being detected and consigned to [an underground cell]7330-an underground cell and total darkness , that [I]4414-her must abridge this narrative . There is no confusion or failure in [my]4414-her memory ; it can recall , and could detail , every word that was ever spoken between [me]4414-her and [those brothers]7331-those brothers . “[4414-her] [She]4414-her lingered for a week . Towards the last , [I]0-i could understand some few syllables that [she]4414-her said to [me]0-i , by placing [my]0-i ear close to [her]4414-her lips . [She]4414-her asked [me]0-i where [she]4414-her was , and [I]0-i told [her]4414-her ; who [I]0-i was , and [I]0-i told [her]4414-her . It was in vain that [I]0-i asked [her]4414-her for [her]4414-her family name . [She]4414-her faintly shook [her]4414-her head upon the pillow , and kept [her]4414-her secret , as [the boy]5819-the boy had done . “ [I]4414-her had no opportunity of asking [her]4414-her any question , until [I]4414-her had told [the brothers]4334-the brothers [she]4414-her was sinking fast , and could not live another day . Until then , though [no one]330-no one was ever presented to [her]4414-her consciousness save [the woman]1008-the woman and [myself]4414-her , [one or other of [them]4417-them]7335-one or other of them had always jealously sat behind the curtain at the head of the bed when [I]4414-her was [there]4887-there . But when it came to that , [they]4417-them seemed careless what communication [I]4414-her might hold with [her]4414-her ; as if -- the thought passed through [my]4414-her mind -- [I]4414-her were dying too . “[4414-her] [I]0-i always observed that [[their]4417-them pride]4418-their pride bitterly resented [the younger brother]4352-the younger brother ’s ( as [I]0-i call [him]4352-the younger brother ) having crossed swords with [a peasant]1992-a peasant , and that [peasant]4421-peasant [a boy]6350-a boy . The only consideration that appeared to affect the mind of [either of [them]4417-them]4423-either of them was the consideration that this was highly degrading to [the family]5478-the family , and was ridiculous . As often as [I]0-i caught [the younger brother]4352-the younger brother ’s eyes , [their]4417-them expression reminded [me]0-i that [he]4352-the younger brother disliked [me]0-i deeply , for knowing what [I]0-i knew from [the boy]5819-the boy . [He]4352-the younger brother was smoother and more polite to [me]0-i than [the elder]4347-the elder ; but [I]0-i saw this . [I]0-i also saw that [I]0-i was an incumbrance in the mind of [the elder]4347-the elder , too . “ [[My]4334-the brothers patient]7337-my patient died , two hours before midnight -- at a time , by [my]4334-the brothers watch , answering almost to the minute when [I]4334-the brothers had first seen [her]7337-my patient . [I]4334-the brothers was alone with [her]7337-my patient , when [her]7337-my patient forlorn young head drooped gently on one side , and all [her]7337-my patient earthly wrongs and sorrows ended . “[4334-the brothers] [The brothers]4334-the brothers were waiting in [a room down - stairs]4430-a room down - stairs , impatient to ride away . [I]0-i had heard [them]4334-the brothers , alone at the bedside , striking [their]4334-the brothers boots with [their]4334-the brothers riding - whips , and loitering up and down . “ ‘ At last [she]4431-she is dead ? ’ said [the elder]4347-the elder , when [I]4334-the brothers went in . “[4334-the brothers] ‘ [She]4431-she is dead , ’ said [I.]0-i “ ‘ [I]4432-he congratulate [you]4334-the brothers , [[my]4432-he brother]5369-my brother , ’ were [his]4432-he words as [he]4432-he turned round . “[4432-he] [He]4432-he had before offered [me]0-i money , which [I]0-i had postponed taking . [He]4432-he now gave [me]0-i a rouleau of gold . [I]0-i took it from [his]4432-he hand , but laid it on the table . [I]0-i had considered the question , and had resolved to accept nothing . “ ‘ Pray excuse [me]4433-i , ’ said [I.]4433-i ‘ Under the circumstances , no . ’ “[4433-i] [They]4433-i exchanged looks , but bent [their]4433-i heads to [me]0-i as [I]0-i bent [mine]0-i to [them]4433-i , and [we]4434-we parted without another word on either side . * * * * * “ [I]4433-i am weary , weary , weary -- worn down by misery . [I]4433-i can not read what [I]4433-i have written with this gaunt hand . “[4433-i] Early in the morning , the rouleau of gold was left at [my]0-i door in a little box , with [my]0-i name on the outside . From the first , [I]0-i had anxiously considered what [I]0-i ought to do . [I]0-i decided , that day , to write privately to [the Minister]1852-the minister , stating the nature of the two cases to which [I]0-i had been summoned , and the place to which [I]0-i had gone : in effect , stating all the circumstances . [I]0-i knew what Court influence was , and what the immunities of [the Nobles]4436-the nobles were , and [I]0-i expected that the matter would never be heard of ; but , [I]0-i wished to relieve [my]0-i own mind . [I]0-i had kept the matter a profound secret , even from [[my]0-i wife]5044-my wife ; and this , too , [I]0-i resolved to state in [my]0-i letter . [I]0-i had no apprehension whatever of [my]0-i real danger ; but [I]0-i was conscious that there might be danger for [others]672-others , if [others]672-others were compromised by possessing the knowledge that [I]0-i possessed . “ [I]0-i was much engaged that day , and could not complete [my]0-i letter that night . [I]0-i rose long before [my]0-i usual time next morning to finish it . It was the last day of the year . The letter was lying before [me]0-i just completed , when [I]0-i was told that [a lady]5075-a lady waited , who wished to see [me]0-i . * * * * * “[0-i] [I]0-i am growing more and more unequal to the task [I]0-i have set [myself]0-i . It is so cold , so dark , [my]0-i senses are so benumbed , and the gloom upon [me]0-i is so dreadful . “ [The lady]2231-the lady was young , engaging , and handsome , but not marked for long life . [She]2231-the lady was in great agitation . [She]2231-the lady presented [herself]2231-the lady to [me]0-i as [the wife of [the Marquis St. Evrémonde]287-the marquis st. evrémonde]7342-the wife of the marquis st. evrémonde . [I]0-i connected the title by which [the boy]5819-the boy had addressed [the elder brother]4353-the elder brother , with the initial letter embroidered on the scarf , and had no difficulty in arriving at the conclusion that [I]0-i had seen that nobleman very lately . “[0-i] [My]0-i memory is still accurate , but [I]0-i can not write the words of [our]4440-our conversation . [I]0-i suspect that [I]0-i am watched more closely than [I]0-i was , and [I]0-i know not at what times [I]0-i may be watched . [She]4441-her had in part suspected , and in part discovered , the main facts of the cruel story , of [[her]4441-her husband]770-her husband ’s share in it , and [my]0-i being resorted to . [She]4441-her did not know that [the girl]4443-the girl was dead . [Her]4441-her hope had been , [she]4441-her said in great distress , to show [her]4441-her , in secret , [a woman]1959-a woman ’s sympathy . [Her]4441-her hope had been to avert the wrath of [Heaven]225-heaven from [a House that had long been hateful to the suffering many]4445-a house that had long been hateful to the suffering many . “ [She]4441-her had reasons for believing that there was [a young sister]7345-a young sister living , and [her]4441-her greatest desire was , to help [that sister]7346-that sister . [I]4441-her could tell [her]4441-her nothing but that there was such [a sister]7347-a sister ; beyond that , [I]4441-her knew nothing . [Her]4441-her inducement to come to [me]4441-her , relying on [my]4441-her confidence , had been the hope that [I]4441-her could tell [her]4441-her the name and place of [abode]7348-abode . Whereas , to this wretched hour [I]4441-her am ignorant of both . * * * * * “[4441-her] These scraps of paper fail [me]0-i . One was taken from [me]0-i , with a warning , yesterday . [I]0-i must finish [my]0-i record to - day . “ [She]4441-her was [a good , compassionate lady]7349-a good , compassionate lady , and not happy in [her]4441-her marriage . How could [she]4441-her be ! [The brother]7311-the brother distrusted and disliked [her]4441-her , and [his]7311-the brother influence was all opposed to [her]4441-her ; [she]4441-her stood in dread of [him]7311-the brother , and in dread of [[her]4441-her husband]770-her husband too . When [I]4447-her handed [her]4441-her down to the door , there was [a child]894-a child , [a pretty boy from two to three years old]7353-a pretty boy from two to three years old , in [[her]4447-her carriage]7354-her carriage . “[4447-her] ‘ For [his]4446-his sake , [Doctor]170-doctor manette , ’ [she]4447-her said , pointing to [him]4446-his in tears , ‘ [I]0-i would do all [I]0-i can to make what poor amends [I]0-i can . [He]4446-his will never prosper in [his]4446-his inheritance otherwise . [I]0-i have a presentiment that if no other innocent atonement is made for this , it will one day be required of [him]4446-his . What [I]0-i have left to call [my]0-i own -- it is little beyond the worth of a few jewels -- [I]0-i will make it the first charge of [his]4446-his life to bestow , with the compassion and lamenting of [[his]4446-his dead mother]4448-his dead mother , on [this injured family]4449-this injured family , if [the sister]4450-the sister can be discovered . ’ “ [She]4447-her kissed [the boy]5819-the boy , and said , caressing [him]5819-the boy , ‘ It is for [thine]7356-thine own dear sake . [Thou]7356-thine wilt be faithful , [little Charles]248-charles evrémonde ? ’ [The child]3495-the child answered [her]4447-her bravely , ‘ Yes ! ’ [I]4450-the sister kissed [her]4447-her hand , and [she]4447-her took [him]5819-the boy in [her]4447-her arms , and went away caressing [him]5819-the boy . [I]4450-the sister never saw [her]4447-her more . “[4450-the sister] As [she]4450-the sister had mentioned [[her]4450-the sister husband]770-her husband ’s name in the faith that [I]0-i knew it , [I]0-i added no mention of it to [my]0-i letter . [I]0-i sealed [my]0-i letter , and , not trusting it out of [my]0-i own hands , delivered it [myself]0-i that day . “ That night , the last night of the year , towards nine o’clock , [a man in a black dress]7358-a man in a black dress rang at [my]4452-my gate , demanded to see [me]4452-my , and softly followed [[my]4452-my servant]7359-my servant , [Ernest Defarge]221-ernest defarge , [a youth]319-a youth , up [- stairs]4173-- stairs . When [[my]4452-my servant]7359-my servant came into [the room]565-the room where [I]4452-my sat with [[my]4452-my wife]5044-my wife -- O [[my]4452-my wife]5044-my wife , beloved of [my]4452-my heart ! [[My]4452-my fair young English wife!--we]7366-my fair young english wife!--we saw [the man]472-the man , who was supposed to be at the gate , standing silent behind [him]472-the man . “[4452-my] An urgent case in [the Rue St. Honore]123-the rue st. honore , [he]4452-my said . It would not detain [me]0-i , [he]4452-my had [a coach]926-a coach in waiting . “ It brought [me]4452-my [here]4902-here , it brought [me]4452-my to [[my]4452-my grave]7369-my grave . When [I]4452-my was clear of [the house]951-the house , a black muffler was drawn tightly over [my]4452-my mouth from behind , and [my]4452-my arms were pinioned . [The two brothers]7240-the two brothers crossed [the road]377-the road from a dark corner , and identified [me]4452-my with a single gesture . [The Marquis]1836-the marquis took from [his]1836-the marquis pocket the letter [I]4452-my had written , showed it [me]4452-my , burnt it in the light of a lantern that was held , and extinguished the ashes with [his]1836-the marquis foot . Not a word was spoken . [I]4452-my was brought [here]4902-here , [I]4452-my was brought to [[my]4452-my living grave]7375-my living grave . “[4452-my] If it had pleased _ [God]149-god _ to put it in the hard heart of [either of [the brothers]4334-the brothers]4454-either of the brothers , in all these frightful years , to grant [me]0-i any tidings of [[my]0-i dearest wife]4456-my dearest wife -- so much as to let [me]0-i know by a word whether alive or dead -- [I]0-i might have thought that [He]4457-he had not quite abandoned [them]4334-the brothers . But , now [I]0-i believe that the mark of the red cross is fatal to [them]4334-the brothers , and that [they]4334-the brothers have no part in [His]4457-he mercies . And [them]4334-the brothers and [[their]4334-the brothers descendants]4458-their descendants , to the last of [[their]4334-the brothers race]4459-their race , [I]0-i , [Alexandre Manette]234-alexandre manette , [unhappy prisoner]4460-unhappy prisoner , do this last night of the year 1767 , in [my]0-i unbearable agony , denounce to the times when all these things shall be answered for . [I]0-i denounce them to [Heaven]298-heaven and to [earth]1323-earth . ” A terrible sound arose when the reading of this document was done . A sound of craving and eagerness that had nothing articulate in it but blood . The narrative called up the most revengeful passions of the time , and there was not a head in [the nation]3920-the nation but must have dropped before it . Little need , in presence of that tribunal and that auditory , to show how [the Defarges]218-the defarges had not made the paper public , with the other captured Bastille memorials borne in procession , and had kept it , biding [their]4334-the brothers time . Little need to show that [this detested family]7377-this detested family name had long been anathematised by [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine , and was wrought into the fatal register . [The man]472-the man never trod ground whose virtues and services would have sustained [him]472-the man in [that place]6627-that place that day , against such denunciation . And all the worse for [the doomed man]7380-the doomed man , that [the denouncer]7381-the denouncer was [a well - known citizen]7382-a well - known citizen , [[his]472-the man own attached friend]7383-his own attached friend , [the father of [[his]472-the man wife]4987-his wife]7384-the father of his wife . One of the frenzied aspirations of [the populace]3564-the populace was , for imitations of the questionable public virtues of antiquity , and for sacrifices and self - immolations on [the people]717-the people ’s altar . Therefore when [the President]3838-the president said ( else had [his]3838-the president own head quivered on [his]3838-the president shoulders ) , that [the good physician of [the Republic]3844-the republic]7389-the good physician of the republic would deserve better still of [the Republic]3844-the republic by rooting out [an obnoxious family of Aristocrats]7392-an obnoxious family of aristocrats , and would doubtless feel a sacred glow and joy in making [[his]472-the man daughter]889-his daughter [a widow]7394-a widow and [[her]7394-a widow child]689-her child [an orphan]4923-an orphan , there was wild excitement , patriotic fervour , not a touch of human sympathy . “[4464-that doctor] Much influence around [him]4463-him , has [that Doctor]4464-that doctor ? ” murmured [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , smiling to [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance . “[4464-that doctor] Save [him]4463-him now , [[my]0-i Doctor]4465-my doctor , save [him]4463-him ! ” At [every juryman]7397-every juryman ’s vote , there was a roar . Another and another . Roar and roar . Unanimously voted . At heart and by descent [an Aristocrat]2572-an aristocrat , [an enemy of [the Republic]3844-the republic]7399-an enemy of the republic , [a notorious oppressor of [the People]717-the people]7401-a notorious oppressor of the people . Back to [the Conciergerie]288-the conciergerie , and Death within four - and - twenty hours ! CHAPTER XI . Dusk [The wretched wife of [the innocent man thus doomed to die]7404-the innocent man thus doomed to die]7403-the wretched wife of the innocent man thus doomed to die , fell under the sentence , as if [she]7403-the wretched wife of the innocent man thus doomed to die had been mortally stricken . But , [she]7403-the wretched wife of the innocent man thus doomed to die uttered no sound ; and so strong was the voice within [her]7403-the wretched wife of the innocent man thus doomed to die , representing that it was [she]7403-the wretched wife of the innocent man thus doomed to die of all [the world]519-the world who must uphold [him]4463-him in [his]4463-him misery and not augment it , that it quickly raised [her]7403-the wretched wife of the innocent man thus doomed to die , even from that shock . [The Judges]7406-the judges having to take part in a public demonstration out of doors , [the Tribunal]3583-the tribunal adjourned . The quick noise and movement of [the court]4990-the court ’s emptying itself by many passages had not ceased , when [Lucie]174-lucie stood stretching out [her]174-lucie arms towards [[her]174-lucie husband]770-her husband , with nothing in [her]174-lucie face but love and consolation . “[4464-that doctor] If [I]0-i might touch [him]4466-him ! If [I]0-i might embrace [him]4466-him once ! O , [good citizens]4467-good citizens , if [you]4467-good citizens would have so much compassion for [us]4468-us ! ” There was but [a gaoler]7193-a gaoler left , along with two of [the four men who had taken [him]4466-him last night]7411-the four men who had taken him last night , and [Barsad]222-mr. barsad . [The people]717-the people had all poured out to the show in [the streets]732-the streets . [Barsad]222-mr. barsad proposed to [the rest]367-the rest , “[4469-her] Let [her]4469-her embrace [him]4466-him then ; it is but a moment . ” [It]7415-it was silently acquiesced in , and [they]4468-us passed [her]4469-her over the seats in [the hall]1556-the hall to a raised place , where [he]4466-him , by leaning over [the dock]1060-the dock , could fold [her]4469-her in [his]4466-him arms . “[4469-her] Farewell , [dear darling of [my]0-i soul]4470-dear darling of my soul . [My]0-i parting blessing on [my]0-i love . [We]4471-we shall meet again , where [the weary]4472-the weary are at rest ! ” [They]7418-they were [[her]4469-her husband]770-her husband ’s words , as [he]770-her husband held [her]4469-her to [his]770-her husband bosom . “[0-i] [I]0-i can bear it , dear [Charles]248-charles evrémonde . [I]0-i am supported from above : do n’t suffer for [me]0-i . A parting blessing for [[our]4471-we child]6781-our child . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i send it to [her]6781-our child by [you]248-charles evrémonde . [I]0-i kiss [her]6781-our child by [you]248-charles evrémonde . [I]0-i say farewell to [her]6781-our child by [you]248-charles evrémonde . ” “[0-i] [[My]0-i husband]5455-my husband . No ! A moment ! ” [He]5455-my husband was tearing [himself]5455-my husband apart from [her]6781-our child . “[4471-we] [We]4471-we shall not be separated long . [I]0-i feel that this will break [my]0-i heart by - and - bye ; but [I]0-i will do [my]0-i duty while [I]0-i can , and when [I]0-i leave [her]6781-our child , [God]149-god will raise up [friends]859-friends for [her]6781-our child , as [He]149-god did for [me]0-i . ” [[Her]6781-our child father]5008-her father had followed [her]6781-our child , and would have fallen on [his]5008-her father knees to [both of [them]7421-both of them]7421-both of them , but that [Darnay]162-darnay put out a hand and seized [him]5008-her father , crying : “[149-god] No , no ! What have [you]4476-you done , what have [you]4476-you done , that [you]4476-you should kneel to [us]4477-we ! [We]4477-we know now , what a struggle [you]4476-you made of old . [We]4477-we know , now what [you]4476-you underwent when [you]4476-you suspected [my]0-i descent , and when [you]4476-you knew it . [We]4477-we know now , the natural antipathy [you]4476-you strove against , and conquered , for [her]4478-her dear sake . [We]4477-we thank [you]4476-you with all [our]4477-we hearts , and all [our]4477-we love and duty . Heaven be with [you]4476-you ! ” [[Her]4478-her father]5008-her father ’s only answer was to draw [his]5008-her father hands through [his]5008-her father white hair , and wring them with a shriek of anguish . “[4476-you] It could not be otherwise , ” said [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner . “[4476-you] All things have worked together as they have fallen out . It was the always - vain endeavour to discharge [[my]0-i poor mother]5106-my poor mother ’s trust that first brought [my]0-i fatal presence near [you]4476-you . Good could never come of such evil , a happier end was not in nature to so unhappy a beginning . Be comforted , and forgive [me]0-i . Heaven bless [you]4476-you ! ” As [he]5008-her father was drawn away , [[his]5008-her father wife]4987-his wife released [him]5008-her father , and stood looking after [him]5008-her father with [her]4987-his wife hands touching [one another]411-one another in the attitude of prayer , and with a radiant look upon [her]4987-his wife face , in which there was even a comforting smile . As [he]5008-her father went out at [the prisoners]1059-the prisoners ’ door , [she]4987-his wife turned , laid [her]4987-his wife head lovingly on [[her]4987-his wife father]5008-her father ’s breast , tried to speak to [him]5008-her father , and fell at [his]5008-her father feet . Then , issuing from the obscure corner from which [he]5008-her father had never moved , [Sydney Carton]177-carton came and took [her]4987-his wife up . Only [[her]4987-his wife father]5008-her father and [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry were with [her]4987-his wife . [His]5008-her father arm trembled as it raised [her]4987-his wife , and supported [her]4987-his wife head . Yet , there was an air about [him]5008-her father that was not all of pity -- that had a flush of pride in it . “[4476-you] Shall [I]0-i take [her]4480-her to [a coach]926-a coach ? [I]0-i shall never feel [her]4480-her weight . ” [He]5008-her father carried [her]4987-his wife lightly to the door , and laid [her]4987-his wife tenderly down in [a coach]926-a coach . [[Her]4987-his wife father]5008-her father and [[their]7431-their old friend]7432-their old friend got into [it]926-a coach , and [he]5008-her father took [his]5008-her father seat beside [the driver]381-the driver . When [they]7431-their arrived at the gateway where [he]5008-her father had paused in the dark not many hours before , to picture to [himself]5008-her father on which of the rough stones of [the street]662-the street [her]4987-his wife feet had trodden , [he]5008-her father lifted [her]4987-his wife again , and carried [her]4987-his wife up the staircase to [[their]7431-their rooms]3960-their rooms . There , [he]5008-her father laid [her]4987-his wife down on a couch , where [[her]4987-his wife child]689-her child and [Miss Pross]183-miss pross wept over [her]4987-his wife . “[0-i] Do n’t recall [her]4482-her to [herself]4482-her , ” [he]5008-her father said , softly , to [the latter]809-the latter , “[4482-her] [she]4482-her is better so . Do n’t revive [her]4482-her to consciousness , while [she]4482-her only faints . ” “[177-carton] Oh , [Carton]177-carton , [Carton]177-carton , [dear Carton]177-carton ! ” cried [little Lucie]174-lucie , springing up and throwing [her]174-lucie arms passionately round [him]5008-her father , in a burst of grief . “[177-carton] Now that [you]177-carton have come , [I]0-i think [you]177-carton will do something to help [mamma]289-mamma , something to save [papa]4483-papa ! O , look at [her]4482-her , [dear Carton]177-carton ! Can [you]177-carton , of [all the people who love [her]4482-her]4484-all the people who love her , bear to see [her]4482-her so ? ” [He]0-i bent over [the child]3495-the child , and laid [her]3495-the child blooming cheek against [his]0-i face . [He]0-i put [her]3495-the child gently from [him]0-i , and looked at [[her]3495-the child unconscious mother]7439-her unconscious mother . “[177-carton] Before [I]0-i go , ” [he]0-i said , and paused--“I[177-carton] may kiss [her]4482-her ? ” It was remembered afterwards that when [he]0-i bent down and touched [her]3495-the child face with [his]0-i lips , [he]0-i murmured some words . [The child]3495-the child , who was nearest to [him]0-i , told [them]7441-them afterwards , and told [[her]3495-the child grandchildren]7442-her grandchildren when [she]3495-the child was [a handsome old lady]7443-a handsome old lady , that [she]3495-the child heard [him]0-i say , “[4482-her] A life [you]4485-you love . ” When [he]0-i had gone out into [the next room]5486-the next room , [he]0-i turned suddenly on [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry and [[her]3495-the child father]5008-her father , who were following , and said to [the latter]809-the latter : “[4482-her] [You]4485-you had great influence but yesterday , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ; let it at least be tried . [These judges]4486-these judges , and all [the men in power]4487-the men in power , are very friendly to [you]4485-you , and very recognisant of [your]4485-you services ; are [they]4486-these judges not ? ” “[4486-these judges] Nothing connected with [Charles]162-darnay was concealed from [me]0-i . [I]0-i had the strongest assurances that [I]0-i should save [him]162-darnay ; and [I]0-i did . ” [He]0-i returned the answer in great trouble , and very slowly . “[4488-them] Try [them]4488-them again . The hours between this and to - morrow afternoon are few and short , but try . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i intend to try . [I]0-i will not rest a moment . ” “[0-i] That ’s well . [I]0-i have known such energy as [yours]4485-you do great things before now -- though never , ” [he]0-i added , with a smile and a sigh together , “[4485-you] such great things as this . But try ! Of little worth as life is when [we]4489-we misuse it , it is worth that effort . It would cost nothing to lay down if it were not . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i will go , ” said [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette , “[0-i] to [the Prosecutor]4490-the prosecutor and [the President]3838-the president straight , and [I]0-i will go to [others whom it]4492-others whom it is better not to name . [I]0-i will write too , and -- But stay ! There is a Celebration in [the streets]732-the streets , and [no one]330-no one will be accessible until dark . ” “[4490-the prosecutor] That ’s true . Well ! It is a forlorn hope at the best , and not much the forlorner for being delayed till dark . [I]0-i should like to know how [you]4485-you speed ; though , mind ! [I]0-i expect nothing ! When are [you]4485-you likely to have seen these dread powers , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette ? ” “[4485-you] Immediately after dark , [I]0-i should hope . Within an hour or two from this . ” “[0-i] It will be dark soon after four . Let [us]4489-we stretch the hour or two . If [I]0-i go to [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s at nine , shall [I]0-i hear what [you]4485-you have done , either from [[our]4489-we friend]4495-our friend or from [yourself]4485-you ? ” “[0-i] Yes . ” “[0-i] May [you]4485-you prosper ! ” [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry followed [Sydney]177-carton to the outer door , and , touching [him]177-carton on the shoulder as [he]177-carton was going away , caused [him]177-carton to turn . “[0-i] [I]0-i have no hope , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , in a low and sorrowful whisper . “[0-i] Nor have [I.]0-i ” “[0-i] If [any one of [these men]2922-these men]4496-any one of these men , or [all of [these men]2922-these men]4498-all of these men , were disposed to spare [him]133-mr. lorry -- which is a large supposition ; for what is [his]133-mr. lorry life , or [any man]2277-any man ’s to them!--I doubt if [they]2922-these men durst spare [him]133-mr. lorry after the demonstration in [the court]4990-the court . ” “[4502-i.] And so do [I.]4502-i. [I]0-i heard the fall of the axe in that sound . ” [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry leaned [his]133-mr. lorry arm upon the door - post , and bowed [his]133-mr. lorry face upon it . “[0-i] Do n’t despond , ” said [Carton]177-carton , very gently ; “[0-i] do n’t grieve . [I]0-i encouraged [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette in this idea , because [I]0-i felt that it might one day be consolatory to [her]4503-her . Otherwise , [she]4503-her might think ‘ [his]133-mr. lorry life was wantonly thrown away or wasted , ’ and that might trouble [her]4503-her . ” “[4503-her] Yes , yes , yes , ” returned [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , drying [his]133-mr. lorry eyes , “[0-i] [you]0-i are right . But [he]133-mr. lorry will perish ; there is no real hope . ” “[133-mr. lorry] Yes . [He]133-mr. lorry will perish : there is no real hope , ” echoed [Carton]177-carton . And walked with a settled step , down - [stairs]967-stairs . CHAPTER XII . [Darkness Sydney Carton]177-carton paused in [the street]662-the street , not quite decided where to go . “[133-mr. lorry] At [[Tellson]134-tellson ’s banking - house]4504-tellson ’s banking - house at nine , ” [he]0-i said , with a musing face . “[133-mr. lorry] Shall [I]0-i do well , in the mean time , to show [myself]0-i ? [I]0-i think so . It is best that [these people]6564-these people should know there is [such a man as [I]0-i here]4506-such a man as i here ; it is a sound precaution , and may be a necessary preparation . But care , care , care ! Let [me]0-i think it out ! ” Checking [his]0-i steps which had begun to tend towards an object , [he]0-i took a turn or two in [the already darkening street]7449-the already darkening street , and traced the thought in [his]0-i mind to its possible consequences . [His]0-i first impression was confirmed . “[6564-these people] It is best , ” [he]0-i said , finally resolved , “[6564-these people] that [these people]6564-these people should know there is [such a man as [I]0-i here]4506-such a man as i here . ” And [he]0-i turned [his]0-i face towards [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine . [Defarge]146-madame defarge had described [himself]146-madame defarge , that day , as [the keeper of [a wine - shop in [the Saint Antoine suburb]7452-the saint antoine suburb]7451-a wine - shop in the saint antoine suburb]7450-the keeper of a wine - shop in the saint antoine suburb . It was not difficult for one who knew [the city]1496-the city well , to find [[his]0-i house]3187-his house without asking any question . Having ascertained [its]3187-his house situation , [Carton]177-carton came out of [those closer streets]7455-those closer streets again , and dined at [a place of refreshment]7456-a place of refreshment and fell sound asleep after dinner . For the first time in many years , [he]177-carton had no strong drink . Since last night [he]177-carton had taken nothing but a little light thin wine , and last night [he]177-carton had dropped the brandy slowly down on [[Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s hearth]7457-mr. lorry ’s hearth like [a man who had done with it]7458-a man who had done with it . It was as late as seven o’clock when [he]177-carton awoke refreshed , and went out into [the streets]732-the streets again . As [he]177-carton passed along towards [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine , [he]177-carton stopped at [a shop]7460-a shop - window where there was a mirror , and slightly altered the disordered arrangement of [his]177-carton loose cravat , and [his]177-carton coat - collar , and [his]177-carton wild hair . This done , [he]177-carton went on direct to [[Defarge]146-madame defarge ’s]7461-defarge ’s , and went in . There happened to be [no customer]7462-no customer in [the shop]771-the shop but [Jacques Three]148-jacques , of the restless fingers and the croaking voice . [This man]5081-this man , whom [he]177-carton had seen upon [the Jury]1124-the jury , stood drinking at the little counter , in conversation with [the Defarges]218-the defarges , [man]5564-man and [wife]6006-wife . [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance assisted in the conversation , like [a regular member of the establishment]7468-a regular member of the establishment . As [Carton]177-carton walked in , took [his]177-carton seat and asked ( in very indifferent French ) for a small measure of wine , [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge cast a careless glance at [him]177-carton , and then a keener , and then a keener , and then advanced to [him]177-carton [herself]146-madame defarge , and asked [him]177-carton what it was [he]177-carton had ordered . [He]177-carton repeated what [he]177-carton had already said . “[4506-such a man as i here] English ? ” asked [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , inquisitively raising [her]146-madame defarge dark eyebrows . After looking at [her]146-madame defarge , as if the sound of even a single French word were slow to express itself to [him]177-carton , [he]177-carton answered , in [his]177-carton former strong foreign accent . “[4506-such a man as i here] Yes , [madame]5936-madame , yes . [I]0-i am English ! ” [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge returned to [her]5936-madame counter to get the wine , and , as [he]177-carton took up a Jacobin journal and feigned to pore over it puzzling out its meaning , [he]177-carton heard [her]5936-madame say , “[0-i] [I]0-i swear to [you]0-i , like [Evrémonde]248-charles evrémonde ! ” [Defarge]146-madame defarge brought [him]177-carton the wine , and gave [him]177-carton Good Evening . “[248-charles evrémonde] How ? ” “[248-charles evrémonde] Good evening . ” “[248-charles evrémonde] Oh ! Good evening , [citizen]3357-citizen , ” filling [his]177-carton glass . “[3357-citizen] Ah ! and good wine . [I]0-i drink to [the Republic]3844-the republic . ” [Defarge]146-madame defarge went back to the counter , and said , “[3844-the republic] Certainly , a little like . ” [Madame]146-madame defarge sternly retorted , “[0-i] [I]0-i tell [you]0-i a good deal like . ” [Jacques Three]148-jacques pacifically remarked , “[0-i] [He]4512-he is so much in [your]0-i mind , see [you]0-i , [madame]5936-madame . ” [The amiable Vengeance]236-the vengeance added , with a laugh , “[5936-madame] Yes , [my]0-i faith ! And [you]0-i are looking forward with so much pleasure to seeing [him]4512-he once more to - morrow ! ” [Carton]177-carton followed the lines and words of [his]177-carton paper , with a slow forefinger , and with a studious and absorbed face . [They]7469-they were all leaning [their]7469-they arms on the counter close together , speaking low . After a silence of a few moments , during which [they]7469-they all looked towards [him]177-carton without disturbing [his]177-carton outward attention from [the Jacobin editor]7470-the jacobin editor , [they]7469-they resumed [their]7469-they conversation . “[5936-madame] It is true what [madame]5936-madame says , ” observed [Jacques Three]148-jacques . “[5936-madame] Why stop ? There is great force in that . Why stop ? ” “[5936-madame] Well , well , ” reasoned [Defarge]146-madame defarge , “[5936-madame] but [one]4965-one must stop somewhere . After all , the question is still where ? ” “[5936-madame] At extermination , ” said [madame]5936-madame . “[5936-madame] Magnificent ! ” croaked [Jacques Three]148-jacques . [The Vengeance]2997-the vengeance , also , highly approved . “[5936-madame] Extermination is good doctrine , [[my]0-i wife]5044-my wife , ” said [Defarge]146-madame defarge , rather troubled ; “[5044-my wife] in general , [I]0-i say nothing against it . But [this Doctor]4996-this doctor has suffered much ; [you]5044-my wife have seen [him]4996-this doctor to - day ; [you]5044-my wife have observed [his]4996-this doctor face when the paper was read . ” “[5044-my wife] [I]0-i have observed [his]4996-this doctor face ! ” repeated [madame]5936-madame , contemptuously and angrily . “[0-i] Yes . [I]0-i have observed [his]4996-this doctor face . [I]0-i have observed [his]4996-this doctor face to be not the face of [a true friend of [the Republic]3844-the republic]4518-a true friend of the republic . Let [him]4996-this doctor take care of [his]4996-this doctor face ! ” “[4996-this doctor] And [you]5044-my wife have observed , [[my]0-i wife]5044-my wife , ” said [Defarge]146-madame defarge , in a deprecatory manner , “[5044-my wife] the anguish of [[his]4996-this doctor daughter]889-his daughter , which must be a dreadful anguish to [him]4996-this doctor ! ” “[0-i] [I]0-i have observed [[his]4996-this doctor daughter]889-his daughter , ” repeated [madame]5936-madame ; “[0-i] yes , [I]0-i have observed [[his]4996-this doctor daughter]889-his daughter , more times than one . [I]0-i have observed [her]889-his daughter to - day , and [I]0-i have observed [her]889-his daughter other days . [I]0-i have observed [her]889-his daughter in [the court]4990-the court , and [I]0-i have observed [her]889-his daughter in [the street]662-the street by [the prison]2442-the prison . Let [me]0-i but lift [my]0-i finger-- ! ” [She]889-his daughter seemed to raise it ( [the listener]7475-the listener ’s eyes were always on [his]0-i paper ) , and to let it fall with a rattle on the ledge before [her]889-his daughter , as if the axe had dropped . “[4527-the citizeness] [The citizeness]4527-the citizeness is superb ! ” croaked [the Juryman]7476-the juryman . “[889-his daughter] [She]889-his daughter is [an Angel]2822-an angel ! ” said [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance , and embraced [her]889-his daughter . “[2822-an angel] As to [thee]4529-you , ” pursued [madame]5936-madame , implacably , addressing [[her]5936-madame husband]770-her husband , “[4529-you] if it depended on [thee]4529-you -- which , happily , it does not -- [thou]4529-you wouldst rescue [this man]5081-this man even now . ” “[4529-you] No ! ” protested [Defarge]146-madame defarge . “[4529-you] Not if to lift this glass would do it ! But [I]0-i would leave the matter there . [I]0-i say , stop there . ” “[0-i] See [you]4529-you then , [Jacques]148-jacques , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , wrathfully ; “[148-jacques] and see [you]4529-you , too , [[my]0-i little Vengeance]4531-my little vengeance ; see [you]4529-you both ! Listen ! For other crimes as [tyrants]4532-tyrants and [oppressors]4533-oppressors , [I]0-i have this race a long time on [my]0-i register , doomed to destruction and extermination . Ask [[my]0-i husband]5455-my husband , is that so . ” “[5455-my husband] It is so , ” assented [Defarge]146-madame defarge , without being asked . “[5455-my husband] In the beginning of the great days , when [the Bastille]86-the bastille falls , [he]5455-my husband finds this paper of to - day , and [he]5455-my husband brings it [home]858-home , and in the middle of the night when [this place]6772-this place is clear and shut , [we]4537-we read it , here on this spot , by the light of this lamp . Ask [him]5455-my husband , is that so . ” “[5455-my husband] It is so , ” assented [Defarge]146-madame defarge . “[0-i] That night , [I]0-i tell [him]5455-my husband , when the paper is read through , and the lamp is burnt out , and the day is gleaming in above those shutters and between those iron bars , that [I]0-i have now a secret to communicate . Ask [him]5455-my husband , is that so . ” “[5455-my husband] It is so , ” assented [Defarge]146-madame defarge again . “[0-i] [I]0-i communicate to [him]5455-my husband that secret . [I]0-i smite this bosom with these two hands as [I]0-i smite it now , and [I]0-i tell [him]5455-my husband , ‘ [Defarge]146-madame defarge , [I]0-i was brought up among [the fishermen of [the sea - shore]3646-the sea - shore]4538-the fishermen of the sea - shore , and [that peasant family so injured by the two Evrémonde brothers]4540-that peasant family so injured by the two evrémonde brothers , as that Bastille paper describes , is [[my]0-i family]4541-my family . [Defarge]146-madame defarge , [that sister of [the mortally wounded boy upon the ground]4543-the mortally wounded boy upon the ground]4542-that sister of the mortally wounded boy upon the ground was [[my]0-i sister]3018-my sister , [that husband]2794-that husband was [[my]0-i sister ’s husband]4546-my sister ’s husband , [that unborn child]4547-that unborn child was [[their]4548-their child]4549-their child , [that brother]4550-that brother was [[my]0-i brother]5369-my brother , [that father]7102-that father was [[my]0-i father]4969-my father , those dead are [my]0-i dead , and that summons to answer for those things descends to [me]0-i ! ’ Ask [him]2794-that husband , is that so . ” “[2794-that husband] It is so , ” assented [Defarge]146-madame defarge once more . “[2794-that husband] Then tell Wind and Fire where to stop , ” returned [madame]5936-madame ; “[2794-that husband] but do n’t tell [me]0-i . ” Both [[her]5936-madame hearers]7480-her hearers derived a horrible enjoyment from the deadly nature of [her]5936-madame wrath -- [the listener]7475-the listener could feel how white [she]5936-madame was , without seeing [her]5936-madame -- and both highly commended it . [Defarge]146-madame defarge , [a weak minority]7482-a weak minority , interposed a few words for the memory of [the compassionate wife of [the Marquis]1836-the marquis]7483-the compassionate wife of the marquis ; but only elicited from [[his]0-i own wife]1699-his own wife a repetition of [her]1699-his own wife last reply . “[2794-that husband] Tell the Wind and the Fire where to stop ; not [me]0-i ! ” [Customers]4941-customers entered , and [the group]1401-the group was broken up . [The English customer]7488-the english customer paid for what [he]7488-the english customer had had , perplexedly counted [his]7488-the english customer change , and asked , as [a stranger]1557-a stranger , to be directed towards [the National Palace]4053-the national palace . [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge took [him]7488-the english customer to the door , and put [her]146-madame defarge arm on [his]7488-the english customer , in pointing out [the road]377-the road . [The English customer]7488-the english customer was not without [his]7488-the english customer reflections then , that it might be a good deed to seize that arm , lift it , and strike under it sharp and deep . But , [he]7488-the english customer went [his]7488-the english customer way , and was soon swallowed up in the shadow of [the prison wall]3746-the prison wall . At the appointed hour , [he]7488-the english customer emerged from [it]3746-the prison wall to present [himself]7488-the english customer in [[Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry ’s room]7494-mr. lorry ’s room again , where [he]7488-the english customer found [the old gentleman]4108-the old gentleman walking to and fro in restless anxiety . [He]7488-the english customer said [he]7488-the english customer had been with [Lucie]174-lucie until just now , and had only left [her]174-lucie for a few minutes , to come and keep [his]7488-the english customer appointment . [[Her]174-lucie father]5008-her father had not been seen , since [he]7488-the english customer quitted [the banking - house]3518-the banking - house towards four o’clock . [She]174-lucie had some faint hopes that [his]7488-the english customer mediation might save [Charles]248-charles evrémonde , but they were very slight . [He]7488-the english customer had been more than five hours gone : where could [he]7488-the english customer be ? [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry waited until ten ; but , [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette not returning , and [he]7488-the english customer being unwilling to leave [Lucie]174-lucie any longer , it was arranged that [he]7488-the english customer should go back to [her]174-lucie , and come to [the banking - house]3518-the banking - house again at midnight . In the meanwhile , [Carton]177-carton would wait alone by the fire for [the Doctor]1514-the doctor . [He]177-carton waited and waited , and the clock struck twelve ; but [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette did not come back . [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry returned , and found no tidings of [him]7488-the english customer , and brought none . Where could [he]7488-the english customer be ? [They]7500-they were discussing this question , and were almost building up some weak structure of hope on [his]7488-the english customer prolonged absence , when [they]7500-they heard [him]7488-the english customer on the stairs . The instant [he]7488-the english customer entered [the room]565-the room , it was plain that all was lost . Whether [he]7488-the english customer had really been to [any one]2697-any one , or whether [he]7488-the english customer had been all that time traversing [the streets]732-the streets , was never known . As [he]7488-the english customer stood staring at [them]7500-they , [they]7500-they asked [him]7488-the english customer no question , for [his]7488-the english customer face told [them]7500-they everything . “[0-i] [I]0-i can not find it , ” said [he]7488-the english customer , “[0-i] and [I]0-i must have it . Where is it ? ” [His]7488-the english customer head and throat were bare , and , as [he]7488-the english customer spoke with a helpless look straying all around , [he]7488-the english customer took [his]7488-the english customer coat off , and let it drop on the floor . “[0-i] Where is [[my]0-i bench]4554-my bench ? [I]0-i have been looking everywhere for [[my]0-i bench]4554-my bench , and [I]0-i ca n’t find it . What have [they]4556-they done with [my]0-i work ? Time presses : [I]0-i must finish those shoes . ” [They]7500-they looked at [one another]411-one another , and [their]7500-they hearts died within [them]7500-they . “[0-i] Come , come ! ” said [he]7488-the english customer , in a whimpering miserable way ; “[0-i] let [me]0-i get to work . Give [me]0-i [my]0-i work . ” Receiving no answer , [he]7488-the english customer tore [his]7488-the english customer hair , and beat [his]7488-the english customer feet upon the ground , like [a distracted child]7505-a distracted child . “[0-i] Do n’t torture [a poor forlorn wretch]4557-a poor forlorn wretch , ” [he]7488-the english customer implored [them]7500-they , with a dreadful cry ; “[0-i] but give [me]0-i [my]0-i work ! What is to become of [us]4558-they , if those shoes are not done to - night ? ” Lost , utterly lost ! It was so clearly beyond hope to reason with [him]7488-the english customer , or try to restore [him]7488-the english customer , that -- as if by agreement -- [they]7500-they each put a hand upon [his]7488-the english customer shoulder , and soothed [him]7488-the english customer to sit down before the fire , with a promise that [he]7488-the english customer should have [his]7488-the english customer work presently . [He]7488-the english customer sank into the chair , and brooded over the embers , and shed tears . As if all that had happened since the garret time were a momentary fancy , or a dream , [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry saw [him]7488-the english customer shrink into the exact figure that [Defarge]146-madame defarge had had in keeping . Affected , and impressed with terror as [they]4558-they both were , by this spectacle of ruin , it was not a time to yield to such emotions . [[His]7488-the english customer lonely daughter]7506-his lonely daughter , bereft of [her]7506-his lonely daughter final hope and reliance , appealed to [them]4558-they both too strongly . Again , as if by agreement , [they]4558-they looked at [one another]411-one another with one meaning in [their]4558-they faces . [Carton]177-carton was the first to speak : “[4560-her] The last chance is gone : it was not much . Yes ; [he]4559-he had better be taken to [her]4560-her . But , before [you]4561-you go , will [you]4561-you , for a moment , steadily attend to [me]0-i ? Do n’t ask [me]0-i why [I]0-i make the stipulations [I]0-i am going to make , and exact the promise [I]0-i am going to exact ; [I]0-i have a reason -- a good one . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i do not doubt it , ” answered [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry . “[0-i] Say on . ” [The figure in the chair between [them]4558-they]7508-the figure in the chair between them , was all the time monotonously rocking itself to and fro , and moaning . [They]4558-they spoke in such a tone as [they]4558-they would have used if [they]4558-they had been watching by a sick - bed in the night . [Carton]177-carton stooped to pick up the coat , which lay almost entangling [his]177-carton feet . As [he]177-carton did so , a small case in which [the Doctor]1514-the doctor was accustomed to carry the lists of [his]1514-the doctor day ’s duties , fell lightly on the floor . [Carton]177-carton took it up , and there was a folded paper in it . “[0-i] [We]4562-we should look at this ! ” [he]177-carton said . [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry nodded [his]133-mr. lorry consent . [He]133-mr. lorry opened it , and exclaimed , “[4562-we] Thank _ [God]149-god ! _ ” “[149-god] What is it ? ” asked [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , eagerly . “[149-god] A moment ! Let [me]0-i speak of it in its place . First , ” [he]0-i put [his]0-i hand in [his]0-i coat , and took another paper from it , “[4562-we] that is the certificate which enables [me]0-i to pass out of [this city]497-this city . Look at it . [You]4564-you see -- [Sydney Carton]177-carton , [an Englishman]5026-an englishman ? ” [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry held it open in [his]0-i hand , gazing in [his]0-i earnest face . “[5026-an englishman] Keep it for [me]0-i until to - morrow . [I]0-i shall see [him]177-carton to - morrow , [you]4564-you remember , and [I]0-i had better not take it into [the prison]2442-the prison . ” “[0-i] Why not ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i do n’t know ; [I]0-i prefer not to do so . Now , take this paper that [Doctor Manette]170-doctor manette has carried about [him]177-carton . It is a similar certificate , enabling [him]177-carton and [[his]177-carton daughter]889-his daughter and [[her]889-his daughter child]689-her child , at any time , to pass the barrier and [the frontier]4569-the frontier ! [You]4564-you see ? ” “[4564-you] Yes ! ” “[4564-you] Perhaps [he]177-carton obtained it as [his]177-carton last and utmost precaution against evil , yesterday . When is it dated ? But no matter ; do n’t stay to look ; put it up carefully with [mine]0-i and [your]4564-you own . Now , observe ! [I]0-i never doubted until within this hour or two , that [he]177-carton had , or could have such a paper . It is good , until recalled . But it may be soon recalled , and , [I]0-i have reason to think , will be . ” “[4570-they] [They]4570-they are not in danger ? ” “[4570-they] [They]4570-they are in great danger . [They]4570-they are in danger of denunciation by [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge . [I]0-i know it from [her]146-madame defarge own lips . [I]0-i have overheard words of [that woman]4571-that woman ’s , to - night , which have presented [their]4570-they danger to [me]0-i in strong colours . [I]0-i have lost no time , and since then , [I]0-i have seen [the spy]6057-the spy . [He]6057-the spy confirms [me]0-i . [He]6057-the spy knows that [a wood - sawyer]4573-a wood - sawyer , living by [the prison wall]3746-the prison wall , is under the control of [the Defarges]218-the defarges , and has been rehearsed by [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge as to [his]6057-the spy having seen [Her”--he]146-madame defarge never mentioned [Lucie]174-lucie ’s name--“making[146-madame defarge] signs and signals to [prisoners]5390-prisoners . It is easy to foresee that the pretence will be the common one , a prison plot , and that it will involve [her]146-madame defarge life -- and perhaps [[her]146-madame defarge child’s]4576-her child’s -- and perhaps [[her]146-madame defarge father’s]4577-her father’s -- for both have been seen with [her]146-madame defarge at [that place]6627-that place . Do n’t look so horrified . [You]0-i will save [them]4579-them all . ” “[0-i] Heaven grant [I]0-i may , [Carton]177-carton ! But how ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am going to tell [you]0-i how . It will depend on [you]0-i , and it could depend on [no better man]3784-no better man . This new denunciation will certainly not take place until after to - morrow ; probably not until two or three days afterwards ; more probably a week afterwards . [You]0-i know it is a capital crime , to mourn for , or sympathise with , [a victim of the Guillotine]4581-a victim of the guillotine . [She]146-madame defarge and [[her]146-madame defarge father]5008-her father would unquestionably be guilty of this crime , and [this woman]3973-this woman ( the inveteracy of whose pursuit can not be described ) would wait to add that strength to [her]3973-this woman case , and make [herself]3973-this woman doubly sure . [You]0-i follow [me]0-i ? ” “[0-i] So attentively , and with so much confidence in what [you]0-i say , that for the moment [I]0-i lose sight , ” touching the back of [the Doctor]1514-the doctor ’s chair , “[0-i] even of this distress . ” “[0-i] [You]0-i have money , and can buy the means of travelling to [the seacoast]4584-the seacoast as quickly as the journey can be made . [Your]0-i preparations have been completed for some days , to return to [England]1-england . Early to - morrow have [your]0-i horses ready , so that [they]4585-they may be in starting trim at two o’clock in the afternoon . ” “[3973-this woman] It shall be done ! ” [His]0-i manner was so fervent and inspiring , that [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry caught the flame , and was as quick as youth . “[3973-this woman] [You]0-i are [a noble heart]4586-a noble heart . Did [I]0-i say [we]4587-we could depend upon [no better man]3784-no better man ? Tell [her]3973-this woman , to - night , what [you]0-i know of [her]3973-this woman danger as involving [[her]3973-this woman child]689-her child and [[her]3973-this woman father]5008-her father . Dwell upon that , for [she]3973-this woman would lay [her]3973-this woman own fair head beside [[her]3973-this woman husband]770-her husband ’s cheerfully . ” [He]770-her husband faltered for an instant ; then went on as before . “[3973-this woman] For the sake of [[her]3973-this woman child]689-her child and [[her]3973-this woman father]5008-her father , press upon [her]3973-this woman the necessity of leaving [Paris]7-paris , with [them]4594-them and [you]0-i , at that hour . Tell [her]3973-this woman that it was [[her]3973-this woman husband]770-her husband ’s last arrangement . Tell [her]3973-this woman that more depends upon it than [she]3973-this woman dare believe , or hope . [You]0-i think that [[her]3973-this woman father]5008-her father , even in this sad state , will submit [himself]5008-her father to [her]3973-this woman ; do [you]0-i not ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am sure of it . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i thought so . Quietly and steadily have all these arrangements made in [the courtyard]915-the courtyard [here]4902-here , even to the taking of [your]0-i own seat in [the carriage]917-the carriage . The moment [I]0-i come to [you]0-i , take [me]0-i in , and drive away . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i understand that [I]0-i wait for [you]0-i under all circumstances ? ” “[0-i] [You]0-i have [my]0-i certificate in [your]0-i hand with the rest , [you]0-i know , and will reserve [[my]0-i place]4600-my place . Wait for nothing but to have [[my]0-i place]4600-my place occupied , and then for [England]1-england ! ” “[0-i] Why , then , ” said [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , grasping [his]133-mr. lorry eager but so firm and steady hand , “[0-i] it does not all depend on [one old man]2483-one old man , but [I]0-i shall have [a young and ardent man]4603-a young and ardent man at [my]0-i side . ” “[4603-a young and ardent man] By the help of [Heaven]225-heaven [you]0-i shall ! Promise [me]0-i solemnly that nothing will influence [you]0-i to alter the course on which [we]4604-we now stand pledged to [one another]411-one another . ” “[177-carton] Nothing , [Carton]177-carton . ” “[177-carton] Remember these words to - morrow : change the course , or delay in it -- for any reason -- and no life can possibly be saved , and many lives must inevitably be sacrificed . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i will remember them . [I]0-i hope to do [my]0-i part faithfully . ” “[0-i] And [I]0-i hope to do [mine]0-i . Now , good bye ! ” Though [he]133-mr. lorry said it with a grave smile of earnestness , and though [he]133-mr. lorry even put [the old man]3445-the old man ’s hand to [his]133-mr. lorry lips , [he]133-mr. lorry did not part from [him]3445-the old man then . [He]133-mr. lorry helped [him]3445-the old man so far to arouse [the rocking figure before the dying embers]7512-the rocking figure before the dying embers , as to get a cloak and hat put upon it , and to tempt [it]7512-the rocking figure before the dying embers forth to find where the bench and work were hidden that it still moaningly besought to have . [He]133-mr. lorry walked on the other side of [it]7512-the rocking figure before the dying embers and protected it to [the courtyard of [the house]951-the house where the afflicted heart -- so happy in the memorable time when [he]133-mr. lorry had revealed [his]133-mr. lorry own desolate heart to it]7513-the courtyard of the house where the afflicted heart -- so happy in the memorable time when he had revealed his own desolate heart to it -- outwatched the awful night . [He]133-mr. lorry entered [the courtyard]915-the courtyard and remained there for a few moments alone , looking up at the light in the window of [[her]3445-the old man room]2680-her room . Before [he]133-mr. lorry went away , [he]133-mr. lorry breathed a blessing towards it , and a Farewell . CHAPTER XIII . Fifty - two In [the black prison of the Conciergerie]7517-the black prison of the conciergerie , [the doomed of the day]7518-the doomed of the day awaited [their]7518-the doomed of the day fate . [They]7518-the doomed of the day were in number as the weeks of the year . [Fifty - two]7519-fifty - two were to roll that afternoon on the life - tide of [the city]1496-the city to [the boundless everlasting sea]7521-the boundless everlasting sea . Before [[their]7518-the doomed of the day cells]3575-their cells were quit of [them]7518-the doomed of the day , [new occupants]7523-new occupants were appointed ; before [their]7518-the doomed of the day blood ran into the blood spilled yesterday , the blood that was to mingle with [theirs]7518-the doomed of the day to - morrow was already set apart . [Two score and twelve]7524-two score and twelve were told off . From [the farmer - general of seventy , whose riches could not buy [his]7525-the farmer - general of seventy , whose riches could not buy his life life]7525-the farmer - general of seventy , whose riches could not buy his life , to [the seamstress of twenty , whose poverty and obscurity could not save [her]7526-the seamstress of twenty , whose poverty and obscurity could not save her]7526-the seamstress of twenty , whose poverty and obscurity could not save her . Physical diseases , engendered in the vices and neglects of [men]568-men , will seize on [victims of all degrees]7528-victims of all degrees ; and the frightful moral disorder , born of unspeakable suffering , intolerable oppression , and heartless indifference , smote equally without distinction . [Charles Darnay]162-darnay , alone in [a cell]6288-a cell , had sustained [himself]162-darnay with no flattering delusion since [he]162-darnay came to [it]6288-a cell from [the Tribunal]116-the tribunal . In every line of the narrative [he]162-darnay had heard , [he]162-darnay had heard [his]162-darnay condemnation . [He]162-darnay had fully comprehended that no personal influence could possibly save [him]162-darnay , that [he]162-darnay was virtually sentenced by [the millions]7530-the millions , and that units could avail [him]162-darnay nothing . Nevertheless , it was not easy , with the face of [[his]162-darnay beloved wife]7531-his beloved wife fresh before [him]162-darnay , to compose [his]162-darnay mind to what it must bear . [His]162-darnay hold on life was strong , and it was very , very hard , to loosen ; by gradual efforts and degrees unclosed a little here , it clenched the tighter there ; and when [he]162-darnay brought [his]162-darnay strength to bear on that hand and it yielded , this was closed again . There was a hurry , too , in all [his]162-darnay thoughts , a turbulent and heated working of [his]162-darnay heart , that contended against resignation . If , for a moment , [he]162-darnay did feel resigned , then [[his]162-darnay wife]4987-his wife and [child who had to live after [him]162-darnay]7533-child who had to live after him , seemed to protest and to make it a selfish thing . But , all this was at first . Before long , the consideration that there was no disgrace in the fate [he]162-darnay must meet , and that numbers went [the same road]7534-the same road wrongfully , and trod it firmly every day , sprang up to stimulate [him]162-darnay . Next followed the thought that much of the future peace of mind enjoyable by [the dear ones]7535-the dear ones , depended on [his]162-darnay quiet fortitude . So , by degrees [he]162-darnay calmed into the better state , when [he]162-darnay could raise [his]162-darnay thoughts much higher , and draw comfort down . Before it had set in dark on the night of [his]162-darnay condemnation , [he]162-darnay had travelled thus far on [his]162-darnay last way . Being allowed to purchase the means of writing , and a light , [he]162-darnay sat down to write until such time as the prison lamps should be extinguished . [He]162-darnay wrote a long letter to [Lucie]174-lucie , showing [her]174-lucie that [he]162-darnay had known nothing of [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father ’s imprisonment , until [he]162-darnay had heard of it from [herself]174-lucie , and that [he]162-darnay had been as ignorant as [she]174-lucie of [[his]162-darnay father]1015-his father ’s and [uncle]7538-uncle ’s responsibility for that misery , until the paper had been read . [He]162-darnay had already explained to [her]174-lucie that [his]162-darnay concealment from [herself]174-lucie of the name [he]162-darnay had relinquished , was the one condition -- fully intelligible now -- that [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father had attached to [their]7540-their betrothal , and was the one promise [he]162-darnay had still exacted on the morning of [their]7540-their marriage . [He]162-darnay entreated [her]174-lucie , for [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father ’s sake , never to seek to know whether [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father had become oblivious of the existence of the paper , or had had it recalled to [him]162-darnay ( for the moment , or for good ) , by the story of the Tower , on that old Sunday under the dear old plane - tree in [the garden]1626-the garden . If [he]162-darnay had preserved any definite remembrance of it , there could be no doubt that [he]162-darnay had supposed it destroyed with [the Bastille]86-the bastille , when [he]162-darnay had found no mention of it among the relics of prisoners which [the populace]3564-the populace had discovered [there]4887-there , and which had been described to [all the world]7546-all the world . [He]162-darnay besought [her]174-lucie -- though [he]162-darnay added that [he]162-darnay knew it was needless -- to console [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father , by impressing [him]162-darnay through every tender means [she]174-lucie could think of , with the truth that [he]162-darnay had done nothing for which [he]162-darnay could justly reproach [himself]162-darnay , but had uniformly forgotten [himself]162-darnay for [their]7548-their joint sakes . Next to [her]174-lucie preservation of [his]162-darnay own last grateful love and blessing , and [her]174-lucie overcoming of [her]174-lucie sorrow , to devote [herself]174-lucie to [[their]7548-their dear child]6445-their dear child , [he]162-darnay adjured [her]174-lucie , as [they]7548-their would meet in [Heaven]298-heaven , to comfort [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father . To [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father [himself]162-darnay , [he]162-darnay wrote in the same strain ; but , [he]162-darnay told [[her]174-lucie father]5008-her father that [he]162-darnay expressly confided [[his]162-darnay wife]4987-his wife and [child]5132-child to [his]162-darnay care . And [he]162-darnay told [him]5008-her father this , very strongly , with the hope of rousing [him]5008-her father from any despondency or dangerous retrospect towards which [he]162-darnay foresaw [he]162-darnay might be tending . To [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , [he]162-darnay commended [them]7556-them all , and explained [his]162-darnay worldly affairs . That done , with many added sentences of grateful friendship and warm attachment , all was done . [He]162-darnay never thought of [Carton]177-carton . [His]162-darnay mind was so full of the others , that [he]162-darnay never once thought of [him]177-carton . [He]162-darnay had time to finish these letters before the lights were put out . When [he]162-darnay lay down on [his]162-darnay straw bed , [he]162-darnay thought [he]162-darnay had done with [this world]976-this world . But , it beckoned [him]162-darnay back in [his]162-darnay sleep , and showed itself in shining forms . Free and happy , back in [the old house in [Soho]58-soho]7558-the old house in soho ( though [it]7558-the old house in soho had nothing in [it]7558-the old house in soho like [the real house]7559-the real house ) , unaccountably released and light of heart , [he]162-darnay was with [Lucie]174-lucie again , and [she]174-lucie told [him]162-darnay it was all a dream , and [he]162-darnay had never gone away . A pause of forgetfulness , and then [he]162-darnay had even suffered , and had come back to [her]174-lucie , dead and at peace , and yet there was no difference in [him]162-darnay . Another pause of oblivion , and [he]162-darnay awoke in the sombre morning , unconscious where [he]162-darnay was or what had happened , until it flashed upon [his]162-darnay mind , “[0-i] this is the day of [my]0-i death ! ” Thus , had [he]162-darnay come through the hours , to the day when the fifty - two heads were to fall . And now , while [he]162-darnay was composed , and hoped that [he]162-darnay could meet the end with quiet heroism , a new action began in [his]162-darnay waking thoughts , which was very difficult to master . [He]162-darnay had never seen the instrument that was to terminate [his]162-darnay life . How high it was from the ground , how many steps it had , where [he]162-darnay would be stood , how [he]162-darnay would be touched , whether the touching hands would be dyed red , which way [his]162-darnay face would be turned , whether [he]162-darnay would be the first , or might be the last : these and many similar questions , in nowise directed by [his]162-darnay will , obtruded themselves over and over again , countless times . Neither were they connected with fear : [he]162-darnay was conscious of no fear .
