Rather , they originated in a strange besetting desire to know what to do when the time came ; a desire gigantically disproportionate to the few swift moments to which it referred ; a wondering that was more like the wondering of some other spirit within [his]162-darnay , than [his]162-darnay own . The hours went on as [he]162-darnay walked to and fro , and the clocks struck the numbers [he]162-darnay would never hear again . Nine gone for ever , ten gone for ever , eleven gone for ever , twelve coming on to pass away . After a hard contest with that eccentric action of thought which had last perplexed [him]162-darnay , [he]162-darnay had got the better of it . [He]162-darnay walked up and down , softly repeating their names to [himself]162-darnay . The worst of the strife was over . [He]162-darnay could walk up and down , free from distracting fancies , praying for [himself]162-darnay and for [them]7560-them . Twelve gone for ever . [He]162-darnay had been apprised that the final hour was Three , and [he]162-darnay knew [he]162-darnay would be summoned some time earlier , inasmuch as the tumbrils jolted heavily and slowly through [the streets]732-the streets . Therefore , [he]162-darnay resolved to keep Two before [his]162-darnay mind , as the hour , and so to strengthen [himself]162-darnay in the interval that [he]162-darnay might be able , after that time , to strengthen [others]672-others . Walking regularly to and fro with [his]162-darnay arms folded on [his]162-darnay breast , [a very different man from [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner , who had walked to and fro at [La Force]99-la force]7563-a very different man from the prisoner , who had walked to and fro at la force , [he]162-darnay heard [One]212-jacques one struck away from [him]162-darnay , without surprise . The hour had measured like most other hours . Devoutly thankful to [Heaven]225-heaven for [his]162-darnay recovered self - possession , [he]162-darnay thought , “[0-i] There is but another now , ” and turned to walk again . Footsteps in [the stone passage]7565-the stone passage outside the door . [He]162-darnay stopped . The key was put in the lock , and turned . Before the door was opened , or as it opened , [a man]449-a man said in a low voice , in English : “[4606-he] [He]4606-he has never seen [me]0-i [here]4902-here ; [I]0-i have kept out of [his]4606-he way . Go [you]4608-you in alone ; [I]0-i wait near . Lose no time ! ” The door was quickly opened and closed , and there stood before [him]162-darnay face to face , quiet , intent upon [him]162-darnay , with the light of a smile on [his]0-i features , and a cautionary finger on [his]0-i lip , [Sydney Carton]177-carton . There was something so bright and remarkable in [his]0-i look , that , for the first moment , [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner misdoubted [him]0-i to be an apparition of [his]5091-the prisoner own imagining . But , [he]0-i spoke , and it was [his]0-i voice ; [he]0-i took [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner ’s hand , and it was [his]0-i real grasp . “[0-i] Of [all the people upon earth]4609-all the people upon earth , [you]4608-you least expected to see [me]0-i ? ” [he]0-i said . “[4608-you] [I]0-i could not believe it to be [you]4608-you . [I]0-i can scarcely believe it now . [You]4608-you are not”--the apprehension came suddenly into [his]0-i mind--“a[7003-prisoner] [prisoner]7003-prisoner ? ” “[7003-prisoner] No . [I]0-i am accidentally possessed of a power over [one of [the keepers here]4612-the keepers here]4611-one of the keepers here , and in virtue of it [I]0-i stand before [you]4608-you . [I]0-i come from [her]4611-one of the keepers here -- [[your]4608-you wife]3387-your wife , dear [Darnay]162-darnay . ” [The prisoner]5091-the prisoner wrung [his]5091-the prisoner hand . “[0-i] [I]0-i bring [you]4608-you a request from [her]4611-one of the keepers here . ” “[4611-one of the keepers here] What is it ? ” “[4611-one of the keepers here] A most earnest , pressing , and emphatic entreaty , addressed to [you]4608-you in the most pathetic tones of the voice so dear to [you]4608-you , that [you]4608-you well remember . ” [The prisoner]5091-the prisoner turned [his]5091-the prisoner face partly aside . “[4608-you] [You]4608-you have no time to ask [me]0-i why [I]0-i bring it , or what it means ; [I]0-i have no time to tell [you]4608-you . [You]4608-you must comply with it -- take off those boots [you]4608-you wear , and draw on these of [mine]0-i . ” There was a chair against the wall of [the cell]6290-the cell , behind [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner . [Carton]177-carton , pressing forward , had already , with the speed of lightning , got [him]5091-the prisoner down into it , and stood over [him]5091-the prisoner , barefoot . “[4608-you] Draw on these boots of [mine]0-i . Put [your]4608-you hands to them ; put [your]4608-you will to them . Quick ! ” “[177-carton] [Carton]177-carton , there is no escaping from [this place]6772-this place ; it never can be done . [You]4608-you will only die with [me]0-i . It is madness . ” “[0-i] It would be madness if [I]0-i asked [you]4608-you to escape ; but do [I]0-i ? When [I]0-i ask [you]4608-you to pass out at that door , tell [me]0-i it is madness and remain [here]4902-here . Change that cravat for this of [mine]0-i , that coat for this of [mine]0-i . While [you]4608-you do it , let [me]0-i take this ribbon from [your]4608-you hair , and shake out [your]4608-you hair like this of mine ! ” With wonderful quickness , and with a strength both of will and action , that appeared quite supernatural , [he]0-i forced all these changes upon [him]0-i . [The prisoner]5091-the prisoner was like [a young child]7574-a young child in [his]0-i hands . “[177-carton] [Carton]177-carton ! [Dear Carton]172-carton ! It is madness . It can not be accomplished , it never can be done , it has been attempted , and has always failed . [I]0-i implore [you]4608-you not to add [your]4608-you death to the bitterness of [mine]0-i . ” “[0-i] Do [I]0-i ask [you]4608-you , [[my]0-i dear [Darnay]162-darnay]4616-my dear darnay , to pass the door ? When [I]0-i ask that , refuse . There are pen and ink and paper on this table . Is [your]4608-you hand steady enough to write ? ” “[4608-you] It was when [you]4608-you came in . ” “[4608-you] Steady it again , and write what [I]0-i shall dictate . Quick , [friend]5569-friend , quick ! ” Pressing [his]0-i hand to [his]0-i bewildered head , [Darnay]162-darnay sat down at the table . [Carton]172-carton , with [his]172-carton right hand in [his]172-carton breast , stood close beside [him]162-darnay . “[5569-friend] Write exactly as [I]0-i speak . ” “[0-i] To whom do [I]0-i address it ? ” “[0-i] To [no one]330-no one . ” [Carton]172-carton still had [his]172-carton hand in [his]172-carton breast . “[0-i] Do [I]0-i date it ? ” “[0-i] No . ” [The prisoner]5091-the prisoner looked up , at each question . [Carton]172-carton , standing over [him]5091-the prisoner with [his]172-carton hand in [his]172-carton breast , looked down . “[0-i] ‘ If [you]5569-friend remember , ’ ” said [Carton]172-carton , dictating , “[0-i] ‘ the words that passed between [us]4619-us , long ago , [you]5569-friend will readily comprehend this when [you]5569-friend see it . [You]5569-friend do remember them , [I]0-i know . It is not in [your]5569-friend nature to forget them . ’ ” [He]0-i was drawing [his]0-i hand from [his]0-i breast ; [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner chancing to look up in [his]5091-the prisoner hurried wonder as [he]0-i wrote , the hand stopped , closing upon something . “[0-i] Have [you]0-i written ‘ forget them ’ ? ” [Carton]172-carton asked . “[0-i] [I]0-i have . Is that a weapon in [your]0-i hand ? ” “[0-i] No ; [I]0-i am not armed . ” “[0-i] What is it in [your]0-i hand ? ” “[5569-friend] [You]5569-friend shall know directly . Write on ; there are but a few words more . ” [He]0-i dictated again . “[0-i] ‘ [I]0-i am thankful that the time has come , when [I]0-i can prove them . That [I]0-i do so is no subject for regret or grief . ’ ” As [he]0-i said these words with [his]0-i eyes fixed on [the writer]7577-the writer , [his]0-i hand slowly and softly moved down close to [the writer]7577-the writer ’s face . The pen dropped from [Darnay]162-darnay ’s fingers on the table , and [he]0-i looked about [him]0-i vacantly . “[0-i] What vapour is that ? ” [he]0-i asked . “[0-i] Vapour ? ” “[0-i] Something that crossed [me]0-i ? ” “[0-i] [I]0-i am conscious of nothing ; there can be nothing here . Take up the pen and finish . Hurry , hurry ! ” As if [his]0-i memory were impaired , or [his]0-i faculties disordered , [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner made an effort to rally [his]0-i attention . As [he]0-i looked at [Carton]172-carton with clouded eyes and with an altered manner of breathing , [Carton]172-carton -- [his]172-carton hand again in [his]172-carton breast -- looked steadily at [him]0-i . “[0-i] Hurry , hurry ! ” [The prisoner]5091-the prisoner bent over the paper , once more . “[0-i] ‘ If it had been otherwise ; ’ ” [Carton]172-carton ’s hand was again watchfully and softly stealing down ; “[0-i] ‘ [I]0-i never should have used the longer opportunity . If it had been otherwise ; ’ ” the hand was at [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner ’s face ; “[0-i] ‘ [I]0-i should but have had so much the more to answer for . If it had been otherwise-- ’ ” [Carton]172-carton looked at the pen and saw it was trailing off into unintelligible signs . [Carton]172-carton ’s hand moved back to [his]172-carton breast no more . [The prisoner]5091-the prisoner sprang up with a reproachful look , but [Carton]172-carton ’s hand was close and firm at [his]172-carton nostrils , and [Carton]172-carton ’s left arm caught [him]172-carton round the waist . For a few seconds [he]172-carton faintly struggled with [the man who had come to lay down [his]172-carton life for [him]172-carton]7583-the man who had come to lay down his life for him ; but , within a minute or so , [he]172-carton was stretched insensible on the ground . Quickly , but with hands as true to the purpose as [his]172-carton heart was , [Carton]172-carton dressed [himself]172-carton in the clothes [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner had laid aside , combed back [his]172-carton hair , and tied it with the ribbon [the prisoner]5091-the prisoner had worn . Then , [he]172-carton softly called , “[0-i] Enter there ! Come in ! ” and [the Spy]6057-the spy presented [himself]6057-the spy . “[4620-you] [You]4620-you see ? ” said [Carton]172-carton , looking up , as [he]172-carton kneeled on one knee beside [the insensible figure]7587-the insensible figure , putting the paper in the breast : “[4620-you] is [your]4620-you hazard very great ? ” “[172-carton] [Mr. Carton]172-carton , ” [the Spy]6057-the spy answered , with a timid snap of [his]6057-the spy fingers , “[172-carton] [my]0-i hazard is not _ that _ , in the thick of business here , if [you]172-carton are true to the whole of [your]172-carton bargain . ” “[172-carton] Do n’t fear [me]0-i . [I]0-i will be true to the death . ” “[172-carton] [You]172-carton must be , [Mr. Carton]172-carton , if the tale of fifty - two is to be right . Being made right by [you]172-carton in that dress , [I]0-i shall have no fear . ” “[0-i] Have no fear ! [I]0-i shall soon be out of the way of harming [you]172-carton , and the rest will soon be far from here , please [God]149-god ! Now , get assistance and take [me]0-i to [the coach]376-the coach . ” “[172-carton] [You]172-carton ? ” said [the Spy]6057-the spy nervously . “[4622-him] [Him]4622-him , [man]5564-man , with whom [I]0-i have exchanged . [You]172-carton go out at the gate by which [you]172-carton brought [me]0-i in ? ” “[172-carton] Of course . ” “[172-carton] [I]0-i was weak and faint when [you]172-carton brought [me]0-i in , and [I]0-i am fainter now [you]172-carton take [me]0-i out . The parting interview has overpowered [me]0-i . Such a thing has happened here , often , and too often . [Your]172-carton life is in [your]172-carton own hands . Quick ! Call assistance ! ” “[172-carton] [You]172-carton swear not to betray [me]0-i ? ” said [the trembling Spy]7590-the trembling spy , as [he]0-i paused for a last moment . “[172-carton] [Man]5564-man , [man]5564-man ! ” returned [Carton]172-carton , stamping [his]172-carton foot ; “[5564-man] have [I]0-i sworn by no solemn vow already , to go through with this , that [you]5564-man waste the precious moments now ? Take [him]4626-him [yourself]172-carton to [the courtyard [you]172-carton know of]4627-the courtyard you know of , place [him]4626-him [yourself]172-carton in [the carriage]917-the carriage , show [him]4626-him [yourself]172-carton to [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , tell [him]4626-him [yourself]172-carton to give [him]4626-him no restorative but air , and to remember [my]0-i words of last night , and [his]4626-him promise of last night , and drive away ! ” [The Spy]6057-the spy withdrew , and [Carton]172-carton seated [himself]172-carton at the table , resting [his]172-carton forehead on [his]172-carton hands . [The Spy]6057-the spy returned immediately , with [two men]6052-two men . “[4626-him] How , then ? ” said one of [them]6052-two men , contemplating [the fallen figure]7594-the fallen figure . “[4626-him] So afflicted to find that [[his]4626-him friend]1325-his friend has drawn a prize in the lottery of [Sainte Guillotine]291-sainte guillotine ? ” “[6917-a good patriot] [A good patriot]6917-a good patriot , ” said [the other]756-the other , “[6917-a good patriot] could hardly have been more afflicted if [the Aristocrat]4631-the aristocrat had drawn a blank . ” [They]6052-two men raised [the unconscious figure]7596-the unconscious figure , placed it on a litter [they]6052-two men had brought to the door , and bent to carry it away . “[4631-the aristocrat] The time is short , [Evrémonde]248-charles evrémonde , ” said [the Spy]6057-the spy , in a warning voice . “[248-charles evrémonde] [I]0-i know it well , ” answered [Carton]172-carton . “[0-i] Be careful of [[my]0-i friend]492-my friend , [I]0-i entreat [you]4633-you , and leave [me]0-i . ” “[0-i] Come , then , [[my]0-i children]4634-my children , ” said [Barsad]222-mr. barsad . “[4634-my children] Lift [him]492-my friend , and come away ! ” The door closed , and [Carton]172-carton was left alone . Straining [his]172-carton powers of listening to the utmost , [he]172-carton listened for any sound that might denote suspicion or alarm . There was none . Keys turned , doors clashed , footsteps passed along [distant passages]7598-distant passages : no cry was raised , or hurry made , that seemed unusual . Breathing more freely in a little while , [he]172-carton sat down at the table , and listened again until the clock struck Two . Sounds that [he]172-carton was not afraid of , for [he]172-carton divined their meaning , then began to be audible . Several doors were opened in succession , and finally [his]172-carton own . [A gaoler]7193-a gaoler , with a list in [his]0-i hand , looked in , merely saying , “[4634-my children] Follow [me]0-i , [Evrémonde]248-charles evrémonde ! ” and [he]172-carton followed into [a large dark room]7600-a large dark room , at a distance . It was a dark winter day , and what with the shadows within , and what with the shadows without , [he]172-carton could but dimly discern [the others who were brought [there]4887-there to have [their]7601-the others who were brought there to have their arms bound arms bound]7601-the others who were brought there to have their arms bound . [Some]2119-some were standing ; [some]2119-some seated . [Some]2119-some were lamenting , and in restless motion ; but , these were few . [The great majority]7606-the great majority were silent and still , looking fixedly at the ground . As [he]172-carton stood by the wall in a dim corner , while some of [the fifty - two]7607-the fifty - two were brought in after [him]172-carton , [one man]1440-one man stopped in passing , to embrace [him]172-carton , as having a knowledge of [him]172-carton . It thrilled [him]172-carton with a great dread of discovery ; but [the man]472-the man went on . A very few moments after that , [a young woman , with a slight girlish form , a sweet spare face in which there was no vestige of colour , and large widely opened patient eyes]7610-a young woman , with a slight girlish form , a sweet spare face in which there was no vestige of colour , and large widely opened patient eyes , rose from the seat where [he]172-carton had observed [her]7610-a young woman , with a slight girlish form , a sweet spare face in which there was no vestige of colour , and large widely opened patient eyes sitting , and came to speak to [him]272-evrémonde . “[248-charles evrémonde] [Citizen Evrémonde]272-evrémonde , ” [she]7610-a young woman , with a slight girlish form , a sweet spare face in which there was no vestige of colour , and large widely opened patient eyes said , touching [him]272-evrémonde with [her]7610-a young woman , with a slight girlish form , a sweet spare face in which there was no vestige of colour , and large widely opened patient eyes cold hand . “[272-evrémonde] [I]0-i am [a poor little seamstress , who was with [you]272-evrémonde in [La Force]99-la force]4635-a poor little seamstress , who was with you in la force . ” [He]272-evrémonde murmured for answer : “[0-i] True . [I]0-i forget what [you]0-i were accused of ? ” “[0-i] Plots . Though [the just Heaven]4636-the just heaven knows that [I]0-i am innocent of any . Is it likely ? Who would think of plotting with [a poor little weak creature like [me]0-i]4637-a poor little weak creature like me ? ” The forlorn smile with which [she]7610-a young woman , with a slight girlish form , a sweet spare face in which there was no vestige of colour , and large widely opened patient eyes said it , so touched [him]272-evrémonde , that tears started from [his]272-evrémonde eyes . “[0-i] [I]0-i am not afraid to die , [Citizen Evrémonde]4638-citizen evrémonde , but [I]0-i have done nothing . [I]0-i am not unwilling to die , if the Republic which is to do so much good to [[us]4639-us poor]4640-us poor , will profit by [my]0-i death ; but [I]0-i do not know how that can be , [Citizen Evrémonde]272-evrémonde . [Such a poor weak little creature]4641-such a poor weak little creature ! ” As the last thing on [earth]1323-earth that [his]4638-citizen evrémonde heart was to warm and soften to , it warmed and softened to [this pitiable girl]7612-this pitiable girl . “[0-i] [I]0-i heard [you]4638-citizen evrémonde were released , [Citizen Evrémonde]272-evrémonde . [I]0-i hoped it was true ? ” “[0-i] It was . But , [I]0-i was again taken and condemned . ” “[0-i] If [I]0-i may ride with [you]4638-citizen evrémonde , [Citizen Evrémonde]272-evrémonde , will [you]4638-citizen evrémonde let [me]0-i hold [your]4638-citizen evrémonde hand ? [I]0-i am not afraid , but [I]0-i am little and weak , and it will give [me]0-i more courage . ” As the patient eyes were lifted to [his]4638-citizen evrémonde face , [he]4638-citizen evrémonde saw a sudden doubt in them , and then astonishment . [He]4638-citizen evrémonde pressed the work - worn , hunger - worn young fingers , and touched [his]4638-citizen evrémonde lips . “[4638-citizen evrémonde] Are [you]4638-citizen evrémonde dying for [him]4642-him ? ” [she]4646-my poor sister whispered . “[4638-citizen evrémonde] And [[his]4642-him wife]4987-his wife and [child]5132-child . Yes , [[my]0-i poor sister]4646-my poor sister ; to the last . ” * * * * * The same shadows that are falling on [the prison]2442-the prison , are falling , in that same hour of the early afternoon , on the Barrier with [the crowd about it]7614-the crowd about it , when [a coach]926-a coach going out of [Paris]7-paris drives up to be examined . “[4638-citizen evrémonde] Who goes [here]4902-here ? Whom have [we]4648-we within ? Papers ! ” The papers are handed out , and read . “[234-alexandre manette] [Alexandre Manette]234-alexandre manette . [Physician]7164-physician . French . Which is [he]4642-him ? ” This is [he]4642-him ; [this helpless , inarticulately murmuring , wandering old man]7616-this helpless , inarticulately murmuring , wandering old man pointed out . “[4650-the citizen - doctor] Apparently [the Citizen - Doctor]4650-the citizen - doctor is not in [his]4642-him right mind ? The Revolution - fever will have been too much for [him]4642-him ? ” Greatly too much for [him]4642-him . “[4650-the citizen - doctor] Hah ! [Many]1898-many suffer with it . [Lucie]174-lucie . [Banker]292-banker . English . Which is [he]4659-advocate ? ” “[4659-advocate] [I]0-i am [he]4659-advocate . [It]133-mr. lorry is [Jarvis Lorry]133-mr. lorry who has alighted and stands with [his]133-mr. lorry hand on the coach door , replying to [a group of [officials]7622-officials]7621-a group of officials . [They]7621-a group of officials leisurely walk round [the carriage]917-the carriage and leisurely mount the box , to look at what little luggage [it]917-the carriage carries on the roof ; [the country - people hanging about]7624-the country - people hanging about , press nearer to the coach doors and greedily stare in ; [a little child]7625-a little child , carried by [[its]7625-a little child mother]7626-its mother , has [its]7625-a little child short arm held out for [it]7625-a little child , that it may touch [the wife of [an aristocrat who has gone to the Guillotine]7628-an aristocrat who has gone to the guillotine]7627-the wife of an aristocrat who has gone to the guillotine . “[133-mr. lorry] Behold [your]0-i papers , [Jarvis Lorry]133-mr. lorry , countersigned . ” “[133-mr. lorry] [One]4965-one can depart , [citizen]3357-citizen ? ” “[4965-one] [One]4965-one can depart . A good journey ! ” “[0-i] [I]0-i salute [you]0-i , citizens.--And the first danger passed ! ” These are again the words of [Jarvis Lorry]133-mr. lorry , as [he]133-mr. lorry clasps [his]133-mr. lorry hands , and looks upward . There is terror in [the carriage]917-the carriage , there is weeping , there is the heavy breathing of [the insensible traveller]7630-the insensible traveller . “[0-i] Are [we]4668-we not going too slowly ? Can [they]4669-they not be induced to go faster ? ” asks [Lucie]174-lucie , clinging to [the old man]3445-the old man . “[4669-they] It would seem like flight , [[my]0-i darling]2648-my darling . [I]0-i must not urge [them]4669-they too much ; it would rouse suspicion . ” “[0-i] Look back , look back , and see if [we]4668-we are pursued ! ” “[0-i] [The road]377-the road is clear , [[my]0-i dearest]6244-my dearest . So far , [we]4668-we are not pursued . ” Houses in twos and threes pass by [us]4668-we , [solitary farms]7632-solitary farms , [ruinous buildings]7633-ruinous buildings , [dye - works]7634-dye - works , [tanneries]7635-tanneries , and [the like , open country]7636-the like , open country , avenues of leafless trees . The hard uneven pavement is under [us]4668-we , the soft deep mud is on either side . Sometimes , [we]4668-we strike into the skirting mud , to avoid the stones that clatter [us]4668-we and shake [us]4668-we ; sometimes , [we]4668-we stick in ruts and sloughs there . The agony of [our]4668-we impatience is then so great , that in [our]4668-we wild alarm and hurry [we]4668-we are for getting out and running -- hiding -- doing anything but stopping . Out of [the open country]7637-the open country , in again among [ruinous buildings]7633-ruinous buildings , [solitary farms]7632-solitary farms , [dye - works]7634-dye - works , [tanneries]7635-tanneries , and the like , [cottages in twos and threes , avenues of leafless trees]7642-cottages in twos and threes , avenues of leafless trees . Have [these men]2922-these men deceived [us]4668-we , and taken [us]4668-we back by [another road]7644-another road ? Is not this [the same place]2865-the same place twice over ? Thank Heaven , no . [A village]7646-a village . Look back , look back , and see if [we]4668-we are pursued ! Hush ! [the posting - house]1919-the posting - house . Leisurely , [our]4668-we four horses are taken out ; leisurely , [the coach]376-the coach stands in [the little street]2150-the little street , bereft of horses , and with no likelihood upon it of ever moving again ; leisurely , the new horses come into visible existence , one by one ; leisurely , [the new postilions]7650-the new postilions follow , sucking and plaiting the lashes of [their]7650-the new postilions whips ; leisurely , [the old postilions]7651-the old postilions count [their]7651-the old postilions money , make wrong additions , and arrive at dissatisfied results . All the time , [our]4668-we overfraught hearts are beating at a rate that would far outstrip the fastest gallop of the fastest horses ever foaled . At length [the new postilions]7650-the new postilions are in [their]7650-the new postilions saddles , and the old are left behind . [We]4668-we are through [the village]1888-the village , up [the hill]375-the hill , and down [the hill]375-the hill , and on [the low watery grounds]7656-the low watery grounds . Suddenly , [the postilions]1953-the postilions exchange speech with animated gesticulation , and the horses are pulled up , almost on [their]4675-they haunches . [We]4668-we are pursued ? “[4675-they] Ho ! Within [the carriage]917-the carriage [there]4887-there . Speak then ! ” “[4675-they] What is it ? ” asks [Mr. Lorry]133-mr. lorry , looking out at window . “[4675-they] How many did [they]4675-they say ? ” “[4675-they] [I]0-i do not understand [you]0-i . ” “[4675-they] --At the last post . How many to the Guillotine to - day ? ” “[4675-they] Fifty - two . ” “[4675-they] [I]0-i said so ! A brave number ! [[My]0-i fellow - citizen]4676-my fellow - citizen here would have it forty - two ; ten more heads are worth having . [The Guillotine]291-sainte guillotine goes handsomely . [I]0-i love it . Hi forward . Whoop ! ” The night comes on dark . [He]0-i moves more ; [he]0-i is beginning to revive , and to speak intelligibly ; [he]0-i thinks [they]4675-they are still together ; [he]0-i asks [him]0-i , by [his]0-i name , what [he]0-i has in [his]0-i hand . O pity [us]7658-us , [kind Heaven]225-heaven , and help [us]7658-us ! Look out , look out , and see if [we]7658-us are pursued . The wind is rushing after [us]7658-us , and the clouds are flying after [us]7658-us , and the moon is plunging after [us]7658-us , and the whole wild night is in pursuit of [us]7658-us ; but , so far , [we]7658-us are pursued by nothing else . CHAPTER XIV . The Knitting Done In that same juncture of time when [the Fifty - Two]7607-the fifty - two awaited [their]7607-the fifty - two fate [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge held darkly ominous council with [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance and [Jacques Three]148-jacques of [the Revolutionary Jury]7660-the revolutionary jury . Not in [the wine - shop]661-the wine - shop did [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge confer with [these ministers]7662-these ministers , but in [the shed of [the wood - sawyer]3734-the wood - sawyer]7663-the shed of the wood - sawyer , erst [a mender of [roads]2089-roads]5864-a mender of roads . [The sawyer]7667-the sawyer [himself]7667-the sawyer did not participate in the conference , but abided at a little distance , like [an outer satellite who was not to speak until required , or to offer an opinion until invited]7668-an outer satellite who was not to speak until required , or to offer an opinion until invited . “[146-madame defarge] But [[our]4677-our [Defarge]146-madame defarge]4678-our defarge , ” said [Jacques Three]148-jacques , “[146-madame defarge] is undoubtedly [a good Republican]4657-a good republican ? Eh ? ” “[4657-a good republican] There is no better , ” [the voluble Vengeance]7669-the voluble vengeance protested in [her]7669-the voluble vengeance shrill notes , “[4657-a good republican] in [France]2-france . ” “[4657-a good republican] Peace , [little Vengeance]236-the vengeance , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , laying [her]146-madame defarge hand with a slight frown on [[her]146-madame defarge lieutenant]7670-her lieutenant ’s lips , “[0-i] hear [me]0-i speak . [[My]0-i husband]5455-my husband , [fellow - citizen]4681-fellow - citizen , is [a good Republican]4657-a good republican and [a bold man]4683-a bold man ; [he]5455-my husband has deserved well of [the Republic]3844-the republic , and possesses its confidence . But [[my]0-i husband]5455-my husband has [his]5455-my husband weaknesses , and [he]5455-my husband is so weak as to relent towards [this Doctor]4996-this doctor . ” “[5455-my husband] It is a great pity , ” croaked [Jacques Three]148-jacques , dubiously shaking [his]148-jacques head , with [his]148-jacques cruel fingers at [his]148-jacques hungry mouth ; “[6464-a good citizen] it is not quite like [a good citizen]6464-a good citizen ; it is a thing to regret . ” “[4688-you] See [you]4688-you , ” said [madame]5936-madame , “[4688-you] [I]0-i care nothing for [this Doctor]4996-this doctor , [I.]0-i [He]4996-this doctor may wear [his]4996-this doctor head or lose it , for any interest [I]0-i have in [him]4996-this doctor ; it is all one to [me]0-i . But , [the Evrémonde people]4690-the evrémonde people are to be exterminated , and [the wife]4691-the wife and [child]5132-child must follow [the husband]6089-the husband and [father]5144-father . ” “[4996-this doctor] [She]4996-this doctor has a fine head for it , ” croaked [Jacques Three]148-jacques . “[4996-this doctor] [I]0-i have seen blue eyes and golden hair there , and they looked charming when [Samson]283-samson held them up . ” [Ogre]293-ogre that [he]4996-this doctor was , [he]4996-this doctor spoke like an epicure . [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge cast down [her]146-madame defarge eyes , and reflected a little . “[283-samson] [The child]3495-the child also , ” observed [Jacques Three]148-jacques , with a meditative enjoyment of [his]148-jacques words , “[3495-the child] has golden hair and blue eyes . And [we]4696-we seldom have [a child there]4697-a child there . It is a pretty sight ! ” “[283-samson] In a word , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , coming out of [her]146-madame defarge short abstraction , “[283-samson] [I]0-i can not trust [[my]0-i husband]5455-my husband in this matter . Not only do [I]0-i feel , since last night , that [I]0-i dare not confide to [him]5455-my husband the details of [my]0-i projects ; but also [I]0-i feel that if [I]0-i delay , there is danger of [his]5455-my husband giving warning , and then [they]4699-they might escape . ” “[5455-my husband] That must never be , ” croaked [Jacques Three]148-jacques ; “[5455-my husband] [no one]330-no one must escape . [We]4696-we have not half enough as it is . [We]4696-we ought to have six score a day . ” “[5455-my husband] In a word , ” [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge went on , “[5455-my husband] [[my]0-i husband]5455-my husband has not [my]0-i reason for pursuing [this family]4702-this family to annihilation , and [I]0-i have not [his]5455-my husband reason for regarding [this Doctor]4996-this doctor with any sensibility . [I]0-i must act for [myself]0-i , therefore . Come hither , [little citizen]4704-little citizen . ” [The wood - sawyer]3734-the wood - sawyer , who held [her]4996-this doctor in the respect , and [himself]3734-the wood - sawyer in the submission , of mortal fear , advanced with [his]3734-the wood - sawyer hand to [his]3734-the wood - sawyer red cap . “[4704-little citizen] Touching those signals , [little citizen]4704-little citizen , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , sternly , “[4996-this doctor] that [she]4996-this doctor made to [the prisoners]1059-the prisoners ; [you]4704-little citizen are ready to bear witness to [them]1059-the prisoners this very day ? ” “[4704-little citizen] Ay , ay , why not ! ” cried [the sawyer]7667-the sawyer . “[4704-little citizen] Every day , in all weathers , from two to four , always signalling , sometimes with [the little one]4707-the little one , sometimes without . [I]0-i know what [I]0-i know . [I]0-i have seen with [my]0-i eyes . ” [He]7667-the sawyer made all manner of gestures while [he]7667-the sawyer spoke , as if in incidental imitation of some few of the great diversity of signals that [he]7667-the sawyer had never seen . “[0-i] Clearly plots , ” said [Jacques Three]148-jacques . “[0-i] Transparently ! ” “[1124-the jury] There is no doubt of [the Jury]1124-the jury ? ” inquired [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , letting [her]146-madame defarge eyes turn to [him]7667-the sawyer with a gloomy smile . “[1124-the jury] Rely upon the patriotic Jury , [dear citizeness]4709-dear citizeness . [I]0-i answer for [[my]0-i fellow - Jurymen]4710-my fellow - jurymen . ” “[0-i] Now , let [me]0-i see , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , pondering again . “[0-i] Yet once more ! Can [I]0-i spare [this Doctor]4996-this doctor to [[my]0-i husband]5455-my husband ? [I]0-i have no feeling either way . Can [I]0-i spare [him]4996-this doctor ? ” “[4996-this doctor] [He]4996-this doctor would count as one head , ” observed [Jacques Three]148-jacques , in a low voice . “[4996-this doctor] [We]4713-we really have not heads enough ; it would be a pity , [I]0-i think . ” “[4996-this doctor] [He]4996-this doctor was signalling with [her]4996-this doctor when [I]0-i saw [her]4996-this doctor , ” argued [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge ; “[4996-this doctor] [I]0-i can not speak of one without [the other]756-the other ; and [I]0-i must not be silent , and trust the case wholly to [him]4996-this doctor , [this little citizen]4715-this little citizen here . For , [I]0-i am not [a bad witness]4716-a bad witness . ” [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance and [Jacques Three]148-jacques vied with [each other]1035-each other in [their]1035-each other fervent protestations that [she]4996-this doctor was the most admirable and marvellous of [witnesses]5177-witnesses . [The little citizen]7676-the little citizen , not to be outdone , declared [her]4996-this doctor to be [a celestial witness]7677-a celestial witness . “[0-i] [He]4996-this doctor must take [his]4996-this doctor chance , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge . “[4996-this doctor] No , [I]0-i can not spare [him]4996-this doctor ! [You]0-i are engaged at three o’clock ; [you]0-i are going to see the batch of to - day executed.--You ? ” The question was addressed to [the wood - sawyer]3734-the wood - sawyer , who hurriedly replied in the affirmative : seizing the occasion to add that [he]4996-this doctor was the most ardent of [Republicans]7679-republicans , and that [he]4996-this doctor would be in effect the most desolate of [Republicans]7679-republicans , if anything prevented [him]4996-this doctor from enjoying the pleasure of smoking [his]4996-this doctor afternoon pipe in the contemplation of [the droll national barber]7681-the droll national barber . [He]4996-this doctor was so very demonstrative herein , that [he]4996-this doctor might have been suspected ( perhaps was , by the dark eyes that looked contemptuously at [him]4996-this doctor out of [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge ’s head ) of having [his]4996-this doctor small individual fears for [his]4996-this doctor own personal safety , every hour in the day . “[0-i] [I]0-i , ” said [madame]5936-madame , “[0-i] am equally engaged at the same place . After it is over -- say at eight to - night -- come [you]0-i to [me]0-i , in [Saint Antoine]144-saint antoine , and [we]4717-we will give information against [these people]6564-these people at [[my]0-i Section]4719-my section . ” [The wood - sawyer]3734-the wood - sawyer said [he]4996-this doctor would be proud and flattered to attend [the citizeness]4527-the citizeness . [The citizeness]4527-the citizeness looking at [him]4996-this doctor , [he]4996-this doctor became embarrassed , evaded [her]4527-the citizeness glance as a small dog would have done , retreated among [his]4996-this doctor wood , and hid [his]4996-this doctor confusion over the handle of [his]4996-this doctor saw . [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge beckoned [the Juryman]7476-the juryman and [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance a little nearer to the door , and there expounded [her]146-madame defarge further views to [them]7476-the juryman thus : “[4720-her] [She]4720-her will now be at [home]858-home , awaiting the moment of [his]4722-his death . [She]4720-her will be mourning and grieving . [She]4720-her will be in a state of mind to impeach [the justice of [the Republic]3844-the republic]4723-the justice of the republic . [She]4720-her will be full of sympathy with [its enemies]4725-its enemies . [I]0-i will go to [her]4720-her . ” “[0-i] What [an admirable woman]4726-an admirable woman ; what [an adorable woman]4727-an adorable woman ! ” exclaimed [Jacques Three]148-jacques , rapturously . “[4727-an adorable woman] Ah , [[my]0-i cherished]4728-my cherished ! ” cried [The Vengeance]236-the vengeance ; and embraced [her]4720-her . “[0-i] Take [you]4729-you [my]0-i knitting , ” said [Madame Defarge]146-madame defarge , placing it in [[her]146-madame defarge lieutenant]7670-her lieutenant ’s hands , “[0-i] and have it ready for [me]0-i in [my]0-i usual seat .
